title: Clean, small, and efficient bunk bed room!
text:
Very efficient sized and organized rooms, exactly as advertised. My husband and I opted for the bunk bed room to save some money, and it was totally worth it. We were fine with a very small room and we were pleasantly surprised that the bathroom was a decent size. 

Matthew checked us in and was very helpful and accommodating. 

The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfy. We loved having our own tvs too. We will absolutely stay here again.

title: Best value in the city!
text: Do you hang out in your hotel room when you visit NYC? Most answer no which is why you should stay at Pod 39! Can’t beat location, cozy clean room, and best of all your wallet will be happy. All Pods are good, liked this one the best!

title: Great Location
text: Very enjoyable stay - made even better by the wonderful staff - Eddie, Christine, Matthew and Nate.  All were very friendly, welcoming and helpful!  Enjoyed having a coffee and pastry in the AM (free coffee) as well as drinks at night in the bar.  There's a pool table, skiball and ping pong in the game room - very fun.  Room, yes was small, but you're in NYC!  Room was clean, had numerous outlets (could use second by bed, only one side had an outlet).  Front desk provided free ponchos for the rainy day and also 25% off coupon for the Allerton. Location is great - 5 minute walk to GCT and subway lines.  Highly recommend for a brief stay!

title: Fancy Prison cell
text: Don't stay here, spend the extra $20-$40 and stay in a Marriot Courtyard, there's plenty of them in NYC. That's usually where I stay and I thought I'd try something different. Big mistake! Terrible bed, claustrophobic room, couldn't even see if it was raining or sunny, windows had no view of anything, can't explain, but it was completely obstructed, when I walked into the room, which is literally a box 10x10 with bed, toilet & shower. If you're doing a noisy #2, anyone in the hall can hear you. I could hear the guy across the hall or next door having a shower. Not worth the money!!!! Oh, and the cleaning lady came and knocked on my door at 8:15 to clean the room, luckily I was actually just about to leave and not sitting on the toilet, but checkout is supposed to be 11am. WTF There's cameras everywhere in the hallways, so they must have seen me leave around 7am to go get a redeye at Starbucks, but then not seen me come back. So you're being watched, or not, if you stay choose to stay here. Only upside is there are 2 Starbucks within a 2-3 min walk from here.

title: Very good
text: I really like the hotel. It was very vlean and comfortable. The pillows were better then the pillows I sleep with at home. The manager is a very nice guy and was teally caring about our short stay in the big apple. The lobby was very clean and i lobed the pool table

title: Hard to beat the value
text:
Great location, and surprisingly pleasant vibe! Cool lounge area next door to their bar, and lots of varied restaurant offerings very near by. Grand Central is a 4 minute walk. 
The rooms are very compact, but the bed was really comfortable. Everything was clean, and the bathroom, while tiny, worked just fine. The shower was a bit tight....but when you price other options in the area, this really stands out as a great value...especially for solo travelers.

title: So far so good
text: Location is good staff are friendly. Of course room is small like a hell as you are at Manhattan. The AC is very noisy, the people outside are very noisy. Be aware if you are a light sleeper. The pumping is not good too.

title: Excellent
text: This hotel has an excellent location, the staff are helpful and great. It is easier to arrive using public transport. And it is not so far from the Grand Central Station. It is clase to several interesting places

title: You can do it
text: We enjoyed our stay, but the double room is way too small for two adults plus luggage. We got fresh towels every day and the staff was very helpful and friendly. If you want to stroll through NYC without staying long in your room, than it’s the perfect stay.

title: My #1 choice in NYC!
text: My favorite place to stay in New York City. Comfortable & clean  rooms, and very friendly staff. Wonderful lounge and bar area. Great customer service. Highly recommended for the budget conscious traveler.

title: Nice hotel
text: For me, it was a good hotel. I can use it again it’s close to everywhere and the receptionist are helpers and give good advisers. I hope that the housekeeper can Take the Dirty, towels, Every time they left the dirty towels once in the bathroom,

title: Good price for location
text: Very well located 5min away from grand central. Good hotel to take a rest, sleep and shower given Manhattan current prices. Good value for money. Average clean (some hairs on the sheets once or twice).

title: Honestly, I had low expectations but I was shocked by how good it was!
text:
Honestly, I read the reviews and was unsure of how clean it would be but my expectations were surpassed by far. Housekeeping ensured the room was absolutely spotless. I was in room 701 (kindly upgraded) and I was convinced if find some sort of mould on the shower curtain or something but no, it's probably the cleanest room I've stayed in, especially at a budget hotel. The staff are really welcoming and kind. The location was great to.

I stayed for work and the location was perfect. The rooms don't get much natural light but I was only there to sleep and it was great. 

For noise, I didn't hear much from others or in the hallways. The only noise I heard was when the room above used the shower. I'd recommend this place if you're looking for an affordable place to rest your head.

title: Great hotel with friendly staff
text: I am always happy to stay at the Pod! the hotel has friendly staff, a great location and good extra services such as gym access. can highly recommend and will definitely come back again. If there is something i need, the staff is always happy to help.

title: Gem of Great Value
text: My daughter and I needed an affordable place to stay while we were delegates at a UN event. We went into our stay knowing it would be tiny, but we would not be in our room except to sleep. The room was tiny, but that was not a problem. The bunk beds were comfortable. The shower was excellent. The private bath was a huge plus (why we chose this location over another). The staff were very responsive when we needed anything. I was sad the rooftop deck was closed while we were there, but truth be told, I was too tired once I got back to our room to even venture up there. I forgot that coffee and tea in the morning was included and spent too much on buying it before I remembered. That was not their fault, just writing so you'll remember!

title: Highly recommended
text:
Very nice, hospitable hotel. And the location is very central. Reception staff very helpful and friendly. We have received good tips/information. The room was very nice and quiet, with good beds, wonderful shower and very clean, with clean towels every day.
Jenaé at the front desk also very kindly helped us book a taxi for our return trip to JFK. The taxi had a fixed price $90. The driver Carlos Arango was also very friendly.
In short, I would definitely recommend this hotel

title: Good hotel and very kind staff
text: The hotel was well located in Midtown Manhattan. Very friendly and helpfull staff (thanks for helping us out with the taxi Jenaé!) The room was good and clean with a very nice shower. The rooftopbar wasn't open yet but the bar below was nice and barfood was available. I would recommend this hotel for a nice stay in Manhattan.

title: Happy solo stay
text: Pod39 is a perfect hotel for a solo trip. My room was small but very clean. There was enough space for my luggage. The bed was nice and the bathroom was beautiful. There was also a locker, which was really nice for things like my electronics and passport. The only thing I missed was a little fridge, that would’ve been nice.

title: Amazing Stay in NYC
text: The stay was absolutely wonderful. The room was clean and everything you would need was provided. The staff were also very helpful with any questions and made check-in and check-out an easy affair. I felt safe and taken care of. Thank you, Pod 39.

title: Lovely Solo-Stay in NYC
text: Everything was clean, the rooms are a bit small but perfect for solo travelers, staff is extremely friendly and helpful, and I especially enjoyed the shower and bed after a long day of roaming the city.

title: Bad expérience the room looked like it was moldy I sneezed all night and the room was so small that I couldn't take adva
text: the room looked like it was moldy I sneezed all night and the room was so small that I couldn't take advantage of it. I arrived at 2 a.m. to leave at 10 a.m. I paid $211, it’s incredible at that price

title: Excellent position
text:
Very convenient, strategic location a stone's throw from Empire, Grand Central station, Times Square and Summit.
Room 1224 has some problems with soundproofing, at night you could hear some sort of external turbine working. Apart from that everything was fine

title: Amazing price value
text: The staff was exceptionally friendly. And price value is great. The neighborhood is quiet and felt safe all times of night and day. It's still in walking distance from all my business meetings. I will definitely come back.

title: Great stay
text: Great place to stay, room cleaned daily and right in the middle of manhattan. Had everything we could need and provided complimentary tea/coffee every morning which was a lovely touch. Would happily stay here again and recommend to others visiting.

title: Good time , good vibes, great gym
text:
Good time.  Friendly staff, nice gym (made my day😃)
Comfortable bed, clean room, 
Perfect location, a lot of great restaurants in the near ,
Roof top with a excellent view , I have a great  time in NY🥳

title: Excellent would book again
text: The price for the location is absolutely unbeatable. The room was quite small but we knew that in advance and the space was definitely enough for our stay. If I’ll go to NYC again I’ll look for a room in a Pod Hotel again!

title: Good place, but had a bad experience the last time
text:
i guess it was my 5th time in Pod's NYC, always a great experience, except for the last time when a housekeeper stole (and returned after 1 day) a necklace.
I still strongly recommend Pod 39 and Pod 42 because i guess it doesnt reflect all the staff which always treated my and my friends the best they could

title: Awful hotel- do not stay here
text: Awful hotel, looks like a prison cell. Blood down the metal room doors. No room to stretch your arms without touching either side of room. Staff were abrupt. Doors do not close properly. Do not stay here unless you’re used to sleeping in a prison cell.

title: Yet again, a wonderful stay at Pod39!
text: Brilliant time at Pod39. Have stayed several times and the hotel continues to deliver on value, friendliness, cleanliness and location. Easy to check in, room kept clean throughout visit and reception and bar team brilliant. I will be back for another stay. Have yet to try other pods as pod39 is so wonderful. Would highly recommend.

title: Dust and Cold
text:
We were dust allergic and the carpet got a lot of dust, causing throat and eyes itchnesses, and lack of sleep therefore. 

Room felt cold all our stay long, we had to ask on the desk for two extra blankets.

title: Stay in Pod 39
text: I recommend this place 100%, excellent service, comfortable and clean rooms and the area is very safe and close to different tourist places, you can walk to the subway station and you have different places to eat in the area.

title: Convenient Location, Tiny Room, Great for Solo Travellers
text: Pod 39 is located on Lexington Ave and 39 St. Super close to Grand Central Terminal. Subway, Path trains, and the Newark Airport Express shuttle buses are nearby and accessible. The room was tiny with a single bed and a desk, but it was NYC. Good for solo travellers and those who don’t have a lot of luggages. The hotel had a great scent.

title: A good hotel with a perfect location
text: The hotel location is great, it is close to the subway and there are many restaurants and nice things to do in the neighborhood. The room was cleaned up everyday and in a very good way. The room was very good, it was very comfortable and had everything necessary, a good bathroom, a good bed and space for storage. I really enjoyed my time there and would easily comeback.

title: 2nd Stay at Pod 39
text: 706 needs another bedside table/shelf. No tissues in room this time. Love the concept. Beds very comfortable. Prices vary so keep an eye out!  Love the client diversity.  Missed the outdoor space this time.

title: Great hotel! Great value!
text: Size of the room was limiting, but perfect for the price considering everything else was above par. The free coffee and tea in the morning was a very nice plus. When we arrived we were also able to check in a few hours early, and they even upgraded our room to a queen sized bed!

title: vacances
text: J'ai passé une très bonne semaine au Pod 39 . L'accueil est chaleureux. La chambre double était de bonne taille pour moi seule et propre. Le ménage est fait tous les jours. Hôtel que je conseille et bien placé.

title: Perfect with ideal location
text:
Though the room was a bit small for the suitcases, but the room with double room with attached bathroom was really comfortable and nice.

The bed had a drawer wherein the suitcases can be stored - we noticed when we were leaving.

The reception lent us an adapter without which we could not have functioned.

The rooms are made every day and the towels are also changed daily.
The location is perfect !
The soup and sandwich in the menu was great !

title: Super hôtel
text: L' emplacement est excellent, la literie est confortable et les chambres sont propres et silencieuses. Le rapport qualité/prix est excellent. Le métro est à 5 mn. Times Square est à 10 mn à pied. A conseiller vivement

title: My number 1 choice when staying in NYC
text: My favourite hotel in NYC! Jenae and the team made my stay impeccable and because of that I will be back again. Fantastic room, clean amenities and wonderful staff.  thank you Pod 39 for always providing me with a wonderful experience when I’m staying in NYC

title: Great spot in NYC
text: Wonderful hotel with friendly staff, clean rooms, good value, great location, restaurant adjacent, and a bonus with common room (seating area, ping pong, billiards, morning coffee). I will stay here again and I highly recommend it!

title: Loved it
text: Over all , it was good. Only thing that bothered me was the mattress. It was just too soft so I kept sinking in the middle. There was some splash stains on the doorknob from inside the room. Didn’t really bother me. I liked my stay.

title: Definitely coming back!
text: From the moment I walked into the hotels lobby KJay and Jenae, the staff were so kind. I didn’t know what to expect because I’ve never stayed at a Pod before. Customer service really goes a long way in your hotel experience. They have made this stay warm and hospitable. Thank you to both of them.

title: NY welcome
text: Cross between hostel and hotel  - all you need for a short stay. Great vibe, very clean, all you need, nothing you don't. Excellent location. A nice mix of young and mature guests, singles couples and groups.

title: great location great price
text:
very close to central station - super friendly stuff 
rooftop was closed due to construction :/
the rooms have everything you need - including a hairdryer and safe
we managed to reschedule our check-out one hour later (which wasn't a problem at all) so that we can go straight to the airport

title: Mitigé
text: Alors un avis mitigé… petite chambre mais très bien aménagé très propre et très pratique notre chambre sur l’arrière était très bruyante ( ventilation) ont nous a changé très rapidement de chambre… pour une autre plus grande … mais toujours sur l’arrière donc à peine un peu moins bruyante le lobby est très sympa très douillet . Le roof top était en travaux et de toute façon c’était l’hiver… mais il est très sympa. Système de petits déjeuners succinct mais pratique avant de sortir avec un vrai petit dej américain ( murray Hill dîner par exemple) bon le personnel… mitigé également que se soit à l’accueil ou au bar certains souriant et dispo d’autre plus … moins … bon dans l’ensemble hôtel pratique bien placé et finalement confiant mais un peu sans âme ( nous avions réservé 3 chambre les plus petites des enfants n’étaient pas/moins bruyantes et une donnée sur l’empire state)

title: Lo consiglio
text: Davvero ottimo per tanti motivi: posizione, spazi comuni dove puoi anche giocare a ping pong, ambiente pulito e stanze pulite. Vi consiglio di pagare in anticipo durante la prenotazione online o con carta di credito all'arrivo: come in altri luoghi non accettano contanti

title: Avaliação de Ricardo Damiano
text: This was our second trip to the US and first time in New York.  We were very pleased with the service at the hotel, especially the bar attendant on the first three days, for her kindness, politeness and friendliness.  Even though we were not fluent in English, we were able to communicate with the hotel staff due to their patience with us.

title: Juan Pablo
text: 1st time in NY was a very good experience for all my family the only thing that me and brother socks disappear from the room, that’s the only thing that I have to say, in general all the expierence was ok

title: Hits all the marks
text: If you are looking for value in NYC and a great location, this spot is perfect. The rooms themselves are small but perfectly functional. The staff was very helpful and friendly, and the communal spots made up for the smallness of the rooms.

title: Ottima posizione e buon rapporto qualità/prezzo
text: In reception è sempre presente un addetto in grado di dare risposta a tutte le domande. Stanza non molto grande ma dotata di tutti i comfort. Ottima la posizione che permette di raggiungere anche a piedi molte attrazioni di NY. Graditissima la disponibilità abbondante di biancheria da bagno. Una unica pecca, ma forse non dipendente dall'hotel: non è stato possibile fare colazione, servita nel lounge al piano terra, in quanto l'addetto non si è dimostrato disponibile. Abbiamo aspettato circa 15 minuti senza riuscire ad acquistare nulla da mangiare. Barista non disponibile.

title: Perfect Hotel in Manhattan
text: Next time, I will not search for another hotel. Pod 39 is with its location, friendly staff and clean/modern rooms perfect. Thanks a lot also for the free coffee, tea, and milk in the morning. I recommend this hotel to everyone

title: Best value in the city
text: I’m a huge fan of the Pod. Stayed at all locations in the city and this is my favorite. Great location and vibe. Grand Central a few blocks away. Neighborhood safe and relatively quiet. Nice room on first floor to hang out with friends.

title: Great Stay
text: Very helpful and happy staff, welcoming and polite. well serviced rooms, clean and adequate. Relaxing communal areas, great stay. Location is good, close to all travel and short walk to Times Square. I would recommend this Hotel as a great base to visit New York if you are sightseeing and needing a comfortable and welcoming stay.

title: Camera 1004
text: Camere molto piccole, consigliamo la Queen Pod, perché è la meno piccola tra le presenti. Siamo arrivati in questo hotel con prenotazione di agenzia ma, la nostra richiesta  di cambiare camera è stata subito accolta, per questo ringraziamo Jenaè persona  attenta, sorridente, gentile. Le camere si riscaldano in fretta ma il condizionatore è rumoroso. Presente in bagno shampoo, docciaschiuma e conditioner. Presente anche phon. Assenza di doccino e armadio. Presenza di cassaforte, presa USB molto utile, cambio asciugamani ogni giorno. Rooftop non accessibile per lavori in corso. Posizione ottimo vicino a Gran Central Station. Caffè, latte, the e acqua disponibile gratuitamente dalle ore 07:00-11:00 presso Allerton Club interno alla struttura. Possibilità di colazioni dolci e salate(venerdì-sabato-domenica) a prezzi minori rispetto al resto della città.

title: Warm and Welcoming
text: Wonderful location and warm, welcoming staff. Jenae (at the front desk) made it feel like we were coming home after each wonderful day of exploring NYC! Though the rooms are small, the price was right and I would not hesitate to book this property again.

title: Great place to stay if you are visiting NY
text: Visiting New York from Pod 39 is very convenient. The location is great, close to Central station and general objectives in Manhattan. The price is better than the other options in the same area. Rooms are small but have everything you need.

title: Great location!
text:
Great location with reasonable price in Manhattan. Just 3 min walk to grand central station!
The staffs and housekeepers are friendly and helpful
The room might be small but everything work properly.
The bed and pillows are comfortable.
Nice view on the 17th floor.

title: Great location for a very nice little hotel
text: We’ve heard about the hotel from our friends who stayed here a year ago. It has a great location (less than 10 minutes from Grand Central) and very reasonable price for center-Manhattan. The rooms are quite small, but you don’t really need much, and there was enough space for us to store two suitcases. And our room was upgraded free of charge, which was also great. The beds are comfortable and the bathroom just big enough. Oh, and did I say the room has a view on the Empire State Building? Great!

title: Great nyc hotel
text: Eddie checked us in and he was very nice and welcoming. This was our 4th time staying at pod 39. Location is great. Rooms are clean. Small, so don’t bring too much. When we checked into our room we noticed it had a bad smell, they conveniently changed our room for us. They have a nice lounge area, big screen projector, and games. Would stay here again.

title: Great stay
text:
Nice hotel, great location. Small détails than Can be improved : the mattress is of poor quality (too thin) and the cover is too thin too. 
Cool to have free guided tour with the others POD hotels. Could stay here again.

title: Great in everything. love it
text: We love it so much. Everything is great. We will recommend it to our friends and we will definitely come back someday. From the front desk they arw so friendly. Place is 100 percent good. Room is so clean

title: Very loud ventilation system
text:
It was hard to get sleep because of the noise from the ventilation system. And unfortunately too cold to turn it off. The headboard on the bed was up against the windows, which was also very cold..
The room was clean and very fine for two people (if your are a couple).

title: Central location with an attractive price.
text: The rooms are relatively small but sufficient and clean. The staff is friendly and helpful. The attached cafe/bar offers snacks and drinks at reasonable prices. The location is ideal, both for business and sightseeing. 5 mins to Grand Central Station.

title: Jail, cell room,
text: Definitely a no-frills for a reason the bed was horrible. It was like sleeping in the jail, cell. Service was horrible to get something to eat. There’s no bottled water, but just city water place is not that great what I got was not worth the price

title: Great Location
text: Great location near Grand Central. Small rooms perfect for short stay or budget stay. Very clean. Downstairs hang out area and bar (roof top terrace closed at time as was -6 and snowing and undergoing refurb). Excellent for backpacker type stay for folk of all ages.

title: Crociera a New York
text: Soggiornato in questo hotel per qualche giorno per motivi di lavoro. la filosofia del posto può sembrare strano ma in linea con la città. le camere sono piccolissime con un letto a castello ed un piccolo bagno che sembra di essere nella cuccetta di una nave. l’essenziale ma c’è tutto. La cosa assolutamente negativa è il sistema di ventilazione che vista la tipologia di camere e se chiudete gli occhi con il rumore che fa vi sembrerà di essere in navigazione su una nave. Quando di notte si accende il riscaldamento trema pure il letto. Fate assolutamente qualcosa per sistemare questo problema perché l’albergo di per sé funziona bene. Persona cordiale e gentile. Non è presente la colazione se non solo tè e caffè gratis. Ma con tutto quello che si trova al di fuori dell’hotel non è un problema.

title: basics covered and for the price, you can’t beat it
text: i wouldn’t expect extras and fluff and overtly friendly staff but they were pleasant enough. housekeeping staff was incredibly warm and welcoming however and room is always clean and comfortable. wish the hours of bar and restaurant were more clearly posted but i’ll definitely be back in warm weather to enjoy rooftop!

title: Highly recommended
text: Great location. Friendly and professional staff. Clean and well-thought-out rooms. Yes, the rooms are on the smaller side but that's the norm in Manhattan and this hotel used the space very well. There are plenty of places to put your stuff. The lobby is really nice. Really don't have any complaints except I wish the rooftop was open but hopefully they'll be done with renovations on it soon! We would definitely stay here again!

title: Cheap and good location, but super basic
text: It was cheap and in a good location, so that’s two big ticks. However the negatives include no sense of ‘vibe’ (ie super boring lobby with staff okay-ish), rooms obviously very small with very basic facilities (thus the cheap price), but really loud heating (not great if you’re a light sleeper) and bedding wasn’t as warm as needed to be

title: Bien situé, super hôtel
text: J’y suis allée 4 nuits avec mon fils de 17 ans. Hôtel confortable, personnels courtois et aidants. Nous avons pris le transport en commun qui passe tout près de l’hôtel, à 2 pas de Grand Central. Nous avions la vue sur l’Empire State et le Chrysler de notre chambre. Le Quartier était calme. Nous étions à quelques minutes de marche de Time square et du Rockefeller center. Je recommande fortement l’hôtel, je vais assurément y retourner.

title: Weekend trip to NYC
text: The Hotel is very nice for the value, I booked the single pod room which was smaller than expected but it has everything you need, and the water pressure for showers was AMAZING which is pretty uncommon in NYC. The Hotel is very close to Grand Central. Cleaning Service comes to your rook everyday, they didn't change the sheets but they did make the bed & empty out trash cans.

title: Affordable and great stay!
text: I came to visit overnight, checked in around 1600, luckily I got myself a single pod, the front staff was very helpful and kind. I don’t really know my way around the city so the guy in the front, I believe his name was Eddie, he was very sweet, he called me a cab as I checked out. I will be returning to the pod hotel. The coffee too at the cafe it’s delicious, hope to come back again around July ✨ thank you!

title: Winter NYC New Year
text: It was a pleasure to return to POD39 (after the interruption of the COVID Pandemic). Well located for our purposes and the familiar levels of compactness and service suited our needs. A great springboard and base for theatre and for using the subway system.

title: Clean, inexpensive home base for exploring Manhattan
text:
Pod 39 was perfect for my 3-day (2-night) trip to New York. My single pod was tiny like a dorm room, probably smaller than my office at work, but all I was doing there was sleeping and showering so I didn't care about the size. It was clean and efficiently laid out. I did not smell anyone breaking the no smoking rule (and I have an extremely keen sniffer). I was on the 9th floor and I think my room faced the back. It was quiet - although note that my stay was on weeknights, not sure if it gets louder on weekends. I saw mostly young and middle aged people there - I'm in my early 50s and did not feel out of place.

My main reason for travel was to attend a concert at Madison Square Garden so I wanted accommodations within quick walking distance - knowing it would be late when the concert let out. This spot is a super quick walk from Grand Central Station - Google says 7 minutes, that sounds about right. A change in my flights ended up putting me at Penn station for arrival instead, but even that wasn't too far a walk with carry-on luggage. Lots of amenities all around and this central location was a great starting point for my daily adventures. It was helpful that they will hold your luggage for you before or after check-out (just not overnight).

I can't comment on the rooftop bar, because it it's closed for the winter - I knew that in advance. I didn't spend much time in the lounge but ate my breakfast there one morning, it has a cozy vibe. When I checked in, staff gave me a 25% discount card for the Allerton Club which I think is new and maybe connects to the lounge. Might have used it after my concert but there wasn't enough time before it closed for the night.

Only a few things preventing me from giving this hotel a 5 rating. 1. The mattress was too soft for me...I prefer a very very firm mattress. 2. My nose is quite sensitive so the scent of the soap and shampoo in the room made it twitch. It wasn't overwhelming, though, and I was able to open the window for a few minutes each time I came in to let the room air out. 3. The last time I looked at the website not long before my trip, it said there's a complimentary breakfast of coffee, tea, pastries, fruit and yogurt - but only the coffee/tea was free. I paid a reasonable price for yogurt with fruit/granola both mornings but it would have been nice to have been notified about the change.

All in all, this hotel is great value for the cost. I would stay there again. If you're the kind of person who feels the hotel is a big part of your travel experience, this probably isn't the place for you. But I would recommend it to anyone who is most interested in exploring the city and only using a hotel as a place to sleep and get clean.

title: Excellent value
text: I was pleasantly surprised with how nice this hotel is, given the very reasonable price for NYC, especially when booking ahead a couple of weeks. The room was small, but clean, quiet, and comfortable as a place to sleep and shower. Great central location.

title: Rooms Are Very Tiny
text: I like the Pod, stayed there many times, but this time I got a room with a double bed.  The room seemed small but maybe it’s me getting older and needing more space.  There were few outlets to charge my iPad and iPhone.  The ports by the bed seemed not to work.  The heater blew warm air on my head.

title: Pod 39 is Great!
text: I stayed here for a couple of nights right before Christmas of 2023. I traveled to NYC to visit a long-time friend of mine, and Pod 39 seemed like a good value for the price and location. As it turns out, it was an exceptional value! The staff was friendly and informative, checking in and out was quick and easy, and I even got a free upgrade to a room with a queen size bed over the standard pod room that I had booked online. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Amazing stay
text: You can walk to the Grand Central Terminal, time square, Empire State, Summit, and many of other city attraction. The location is perfect. The room is not big, both enough for a short trip of a couple

title: Christmas Stay
text: Very enjoyable experience, staff highly profesional and assisted with all questions, room was very clean and amenities cosy, the hotel is very close to all places of interest within walking distance, I will stay again next time I am in town.

title: Funky well positioned hotel
text: Excellent service the rooms were very clean, my wife are both in our 60’s and have travelled extensively and found the staff friendly and ultra polite and fantastic facilities. Well worth it and would highly recommend it for all ages and trips.

title: Christmas Stay - Great Location
text: Had a very enjoyable time when I stayed over four days recently during Christmas. Yes, the rooms are quite compact and small (I had a double to myself) but it was enough space for me to still have an enjoyable time. The size of the shower was a bit comical because of how compact it was and that I couldn't really raise my arms to wash my hair. The wifi wasn't the greatest in my room, but worked well in the common areas. The location was great with the proximity to Grand Central. Several places nearby to eat at and the downstairs has a decent breakfast. I went to the Allerton Club twice for a drink/food and really enjoyed it. Shoutout to the server there, she was very efficient and friendly.

title: Muy bien ubicado, azotea y pub interesantes
text:
Muy buen situado, lo más importante diría que es que está a cinco minutos andando de Grand Central Station. Ideal si se va a estar todo el día visitando la ciudad y apenas se pisa el hotel más que para dormir.

La habitación era pequeña y no tenía armario (hay colgadores que salen de la pared para ahorrar espacio). El baño está en paralelo a la cama con una mampara de por medio, aunque es bastante cómodo y tiene buena ducha. La limpiaban a diario.

El hotel en sí es sencillo, pero tiene una buena azotea (en invierno difícil de disfrutar) y un pub dentro del mismo que está estupendo: grande, bonito, con diferentes ambientes y alguna máquina para jugar con amigos. Por las mañanas hasta cierta hora se puede desayunar algo sencillo.

El personal muy atento y agradable, el último día nos guardaron las maletas hasta que volvimos a por ellas.

title: Rapporto qualità prezzo eccellente
text: Hotel in ottima posizione, prezzi alti perché era capodanno ma comunque un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Stanze piccole ma pulitissime e ottimo servizio. Carino l’allerton club, il rooftop purtroppo d’inverno è chiuso ma d’estate vale sicuramente la pena andarci. Sicuramente un hotel che consiglio.

title: Brilliant New York base
text:
Perfect location.. the district has lots to choose for good. Our favourites Trader Joe’s and lots more on 3rd st particularly.
Ideal for Grand Central
Room small but perfectly adequate as we were out all day.
Good bar, lounge and games room
Friendly, helpful
Free tea, coffee at breakfast 
Great basic breakfast options

title: Great location and cozy stay at an affordable price
text: Pod 39 is in an excellent location for any tourist travelling to New York -just a few blocks away from the Central Station. The room I had, even if small, was clean and covered all the essentials. Also, having a bar downstaris with complimentary tea and coffee and confortable sofas and tables was very helpful in a city where eating out can be quite expensive.

title: Great experience for the price
text: The stay lasted 10 days. Overall experience was great and i do recommend this hotel. The room was small but good for price. Comfort level was OK. Room cleanliness was also good. Only remark i have is the heating system in the room. It took ages to heat, and until then only cold air was coming out of the vents.

title: Great location but noisy room
text: I really enjoyed the central location and friendly staff. The room was small and well converted but was unfortunately extremely noisy due to AC/heating. Breakfast options are available and it would be great to ban single plastic/paper use :)

title: Tiny but great location.
text: If you are staying alone, a full pod may work. If you are staying with someone else, go with a queen pod. Bathroom needs some kind of ventilation. There was nothing and the whole room gets uncomfortably steamy and humid. I did not like the mattress. My back was hurting since the second night.

title: Budget and brilliant
text: Friendly staff, cosy bar, beaut rooftop with a scenic view. Super happy. Bunk beds meant we had enough floor space for suitcases. Bathroom was tidy and not cramped at all. Surprisingly had a lot more space than expected. Nice area, and so local to grand central and easy to get to most landmarks.

title: Best hotel I ever experienced, thank you for making me fall in love with New york even more
text:
The staff was the nicest I ever talked too, sharing with us there favorite restaurants for us to spend a nice christmas, letting us stay in a space with couch during the night, because our flight was at 4:00a.m
They gave me the christmas help and happiness that I needed so much, thank you for making me believe again that nice people exist
The room was clean and welcoming, this hotel felt like home

title: À refaire c’était incroyable
text: Le personnel est super gentil et chaleureux les chambres sont très propres et les dames de ménage sont également tres gentilles le coin bar est très beau et agréable pour ce détendre et Aneka est très professionnelle et à l’écoute 🫶🏼❤️

title: Sehr zentral, sauber, freundlich
text: Wir hatten zu zweit ein Queen Pod. Mit einem großen Koffer und 2 Handgepäcke ist Zimmergröße ok, wenn man aus dem Koffer lebt, da es kein Schrank gibt. Wir hatten wahrscheinlich glück mit unseren Flurnachbarn, denn bis auf die letzte Nacht war es sehr ruhig. Es dürfte aber nichts für Leute sein, die nicht nackt voreinander sein können, denn das Bad ist Gläsern und durch das Milchglas sieht man viel und vor allem hört man alles. Das WLAN war kostenlos und sehr stabil. Die Betten, das Bad und Handtücher waren sauber. Es wird jeden Tag gereinigt. Föhn, Duschbad, Haarshampoo und conditioner sind vorhanden. Morgens gibt es unten neben der Lobby kostenlos Tee und Kaffee. Frühstück wie belegte Bagel, Sandwich oder Muffins kann man kaufen. Die Grand Central Station ist zu Fuß in 5 min. erreichbar. Das Chrysler Building, Empire State Building und Time Square ist gut zu Fuß erreichbar. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

title: Great location and price
text: It  is very close to downtown and close to the central station. There's a store in the corner. The hotel has a special rate with an icon parking that is two blocks away, $45 per day (regular cost $75). The rooms are small  but comfy. Didn't have any trouble with the noise  and the bed was really comfortable. The toilet is just by the bed and the door is not sealed but there are bathrooms in the basement floor of the hoteI

title: Great location
text: The location is great, so close to Grand Central that a taxi is needless in that distance. The bunk beds don't shake or make noise so huge plus and the bathroom glass wall has some blurring in it so you can't directly see the other person inside (depending from what angle you look at). The pictures make it look a bit nicer than it was, but more or less you get what you assume. Friendly staff.

title: Fun vibe in a great location!
text: We stayed in a bunk bed room for a few nights. The location is perfect. Short walk away from Times Square, Union Square, or anything you need. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable.

title: Great Place To Stay in NYC Warm And Welcoming!
text: I got upgraded straight away! Everything was made easy and efficient! Warm welcoming and friendly staff! I will definitely be coming back here again! The one who was exceptional was Christine! She was amazing very helpful and accommodating and above all very friendly! Just perfect! She was too Leng as well! I will be back for sure!!!

title: Best deal in Manhattan
text: For a solo traveler, I can't imagine a better deal in Manhattan.  There's just the right amount of space, a super friendly (and attractive!) staff, and prices that seem impossible for Christmastime in mid-town.  It would be less comfortable if sharing a room, but by myself it was all I needed.

title: Excellent value
text: My flight change had me arrive at 9am but without hesitation they were able to find me a room extra early at no charge and even a free upgrade. All of the staff was very friendly. It’s perfect if you’re visiting NYC you just a need a clean place to crash and shower.

title: Good Value and location
text: Affordable option to stay in NYC. Location is convenient to many NYC locations. It was nice having a rooftop deck and restaurant at the site. Shared main room was a nice place to gather or sit and relax.

title: top location, tiny rooms
text:
The room is unfortunately too small for 2 persons with luggage to stay a longer period. It's not possible to open the luggage of both simultaneous..  The airflow of the air conditioning is directly over the bed - if it's activ, it will blow the whole time in your face while being in the bed.
The room was clean.
The roof terrace and the lounge are very comfortable, we loved it. It's the only room to stay in free time inside the hotel.

title: Optamal Place
text: In general, it meets the need for clean and safe accommodation very well. Its location is very close to workplaces, tourist attractions and transportation facilities. I did not experience any trouble.

title: Could use an update
text: I've stayed at Pod39 several times over the past decade and I don't believe there has been an update to the rooms since they opened. The wear and tear is starting to show. The price was good compared to other hotels in the area. The bed was terribly uncomfortable and the room was not as clean upon check-in as it should have been. Very friendly staff though.

title: Clean, no-frills hotel with GREAT location!
text: The room was small, but clean and adequate for what I needed.  The bed was ok, but just a mattress on top of a wooden platform. The hotel staff was friendly and there always seemed to be a number of people around, even when I came back to my room late at night.  The location is great - an easy walk to Grand Central, the NY Public Library, 5th Avenue shopping, Rockefeller Center, etc.  I had no issues!

title: Great location and comfortable beds
text: Awesome customer service once we arrived early to store my luggage but was amazed we were able to check in as we were soooo tired from traveling so having a nap was so needed. Very helpful and empathetic staff, comfortable beds, quiet and clean rooms.  Thank you

title: Pod 39 Hotel no centro de NYC
text: Muito bom hotel na 39 st perto da Central Station! Bom ambiente e bom pequeno almoço. Rooftop no piso 17, no entanto fechado em Dezembro, no piso zero excelente espaço para convivio e jogos entre os clientes. Perto de tudo em NYC. A voltar certamente! Excelente relação qualidade preço!!!

title: Impressive hotel in a great location at a great price
text: Had a great time! Great price and location and clean! Staff very friendly and gave us an upgrade when we checked in! Very close to all the things we came to nyc to see! Would recommend and come stay again!

title: Great location, amenities and customer service.
text: Great location, beautiful restaurant and bar with quality drinks and food. Rooms are very small however they are clean and well organized with everything you need. Customer service is top notch. Everyone was efficient, pleasant and attentive to our needs. I definitely recommend it!

title: Awesome accommodation and customer service
text: Great friendly customer service, comfortable beds, quiet rooms and a terrific location.  A tailored service to our situation and very helpful to change our room and allowed us an early check in so very grateful.

title: Excelent location
text: The place is clean and safe. The rooms are very small but if you only use them to sleep it is fine, and everything works correctly. The sound of the heating is a little loud but it didn't stop me from sleeping peacefully, I am a heavy sleeper. I stayed 8 days. The only thing I would recommend is that they would add a new toilet soap every day. During my entire stay they only renewed the soap once, which almost didn't exist anymore. I would go back there.

title: Small and expensive
text: Very small room, hardly space for my suitcase. Friendly and helpful staff. Tricky water taps. Free coffee in the morning and possible to buy pastry. Very good location for me and my colleagues. A bit noisy at night.

title: Great Place located in Midtown Manhattan
text:
Good Place to stay in Manhattan located in walking distance from 5th Avenue. We had a double room, which was small but absolutely fine for a city trip, well-equipped and clean.
Also there is a great rooftop bar.

title: business stay
text: The hotel is in a good location, staff are nice. Rooms are very small and need more maintenance. The hotel bar is very nice. In the morning they serve free coffee, and you could buy a small breakfast. In the evening it is a bar with a good vibe.

title: Ottima esperienza
text:
Stanza con tutto il necessario, spazi giusti e molto pulita. Location perfetta e vicino a Grand Central Station e a varie zone turistiche.
Unica pecca, poca privacy per la bathroom che ha come porta una vetrata.
Per il resto ottima esperienza e la consiglio come struttura

title: Decent budget hotel
text: A nice hotel, very basic but has everything you need. Room was small but clean with a comfy bed and decent shower. Well located. Our only complaint really was that you couldn't get a hot drink after 11am

title: Awesome service
text: This place have everything you need to visit manhattan. Awesome location, subway, principal avenue an stores near. The service of the employees was wonderful and the room (little rooms) are so quiet and comfortable.

title: Top Lage, sehr zentral! Saubere Zimmer!
text:
Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Queen Size Bett gebucht.
Zunächst hatten wir ein Zimmer, in dem die Lüftung des Badezimmers dauerhaft lief und sich nicht ausschalten ließ (17. Stock).
Nach einer Kontaktaufnahme mit der Rezeption, mit der Bitte, das Zimmer zu wechseln, mussten wir zwar einige Stunden warten ( da das Zimmer noch nicht bezugsfertig war), aber danach hatten wir ein super Zimmer, groß genug für zwei Erwachsene, wenn man New York bereist und eh den ganzen Tag nicht im Hotelzimmer ist.
Wir hatten kein Frühstück gebucht, aber es gab jeden Morgen kostenlos Kaffee & Wasser.
Die Preise der Muffins etc. waren mit knappen 5 Dollar uns zu hoch (wir hatten ums Eck bei einem Supermarkt eingekauft).
Das Zimmer war immer sauber, wurde jeden Tag gereinigt.
Das Bett war bequem und groß genug für zwei Erwachsene.
Fenster ließen sich nur circa 20 Zentimeter öffnen, die Klimaanlage lief aber immer gut, sowohl kalt als auch warm.
Wir fuhren mit einem Taxiunternehmen des Hotels zum Flughafen JFK morgens um 5 Uhr für 80 Dollar; naja, dass sind wohl die Preise mittlerweile ;)

title: Lovely staff at a super central hotel
text:
The staff could not have been nicer or more helpful at this hotel. On my last day I was incredibly unwell, and one particular staff member, Jenaé, went out of her way to look after me. 

The rooms are very small and feel a little too compact, however, if you are just looking for somewhere to lay your head then it's a great option.

title: Good location
text: The hotel is really well located and clean. The only issue is that the rooms are very small and the toilet is integrated in the room with glass doors which gives 0 privacy. If you are going for a long weekend not carrying suitcases it’s ok.

title: Clean, friendly, and well priced!
text: Yes, the room was VERY small (even by NYC standards), but since I was only using it to sleep at night, I had no problem with that. Everything about the entire hotel was very clean and friendly. The feel of it, when entering, was of a much more expensive place. It smelled great and was very classy looking. The room was impeccably clean. My only negative comment would be that, even though I love a firm mattress, my back hurt after sleeping on these. I'm not sure why...and maybe others would be fine with these...but I just didn't seem to sleep comfortably in what otherwise  seemed like a perfectly good mattress. Perhaps I just needed my multiple sleeping pillows for support.

title: Best hotel
text: I’ve always found kind staff, clean rooms, perfect location. I’ll always return to any pod in NY. Always clean and new sheets and towels, the rooms are small, but there’s always a way to be comfortable.

title: Très bon hôtel pour une escapade à New York
text:
J'ai séjourné dans cet hôtel pendant 3 nuits. Le check-in a été très rapide.
Ma chambre (1313) était assez petite, mais très bien équipée et très propre. Le lit était confortable et disposait d'un dispositif anti punaises de lit.
Cet hôtel est tellement bien situé. À 3 blocs de la station Grand Central / 42th street (sortir par Lexington avenue et la remonter jusqu'à la 39ème). Il y a pleins d'options pour manger. Le personnel est serviable.

title: Pod is a tiny house
text:
This is a wonderful hotel. It is clean, near Grand Central and the UN. The staff, Christine was friendly and helpful.
It is reminds me of a tiny house. If you want the minimum and a place to sleep this is it and reasonable prices for Manhattan.  Highly recommend it……

title: Pleasant accommodation.
text: Kind and helpful reception staff. Small room but meets our needs. Comfortable bed and great shower. The heater in the room makes a lot of noise which makes sleeping a bit difficult. Overall great accommodation.

title: Central Cosy Convenient
text: Enjoyed my stay at Pod 39 which was so centrally located to the UN for those going there for work meetings, Grand Central Station for transport and a range of other sites, bars and restaurants. The rooms are cosy, warm and functional as well. A good central base for exploring around the city. The staff too are helpful, especially for the long and weary travellers like I was. Special mention to Eugene at the front desk who was especially helpful 🙏🏽

title: As described by the hotel, a comfy and cosy room!
text: The room, with a queen-sized bed, was ideal for me.  The room had everything I needed although a hook to ng wet towels would be very useful.  Very handily located for my meeting with lots of shops, restaurants and sights within easy walking distance.

title: Vale a pena
text: Hotel muito próximo da Grand Central o que me permitiu ir do JFK para o hotel de trem. Pratico, rápido e barato. Chegando no hotel eu pude fazer entrada antecipada. O quarto é bem pequeno como previsto. Muito limpo e cama confortável. Me emprestaram o adaptador de tomadas e o tempo todo a recepção foi atenciosa. Quero destacar as duas mulheres da recepção, atenciosas e amorosas. Não domino o inglês, o tempo todo elas usaram o google tradutor para que eu me sentisse mais confortável. Infelizmente não anotei o nome, mas a atendente magrinha que atuava durante o dia em 28/11 foi especialmente atenciosa. Sou grata. O hotel tem uma área comum bem bacana, com um salão com um grande telão, o bar tb é bem bacana, e eu pude desfrutar de um belo drink e cerveja gelada. A localização do hotel te permite circular a pé por vários lugares da cidade, bem como o acesso ao metrô. Em tempo, o chuveiro é ótimo.

title: Actually the highlight of my New York Trip
text:
This was the first 'hotel' I booked on my mutli city US trip but despite the compact nature of the rooms it was the best accomdation I had. 
It makes such a difference when there are actual staff on hand to talk to. There was a minor issue with the TV in my room on arrival and it was fixed within 10mins of me reporting it to reception. 
The single room I had was very well designed and had the bonus of both AC and openable windows. The only thing that would have made it better would have been the addition of a small fridge.
Close to the grand central subway station, and walking distance to the empire state building, madison square garden, summitone vanderbilt and multiple supermarkets

title: POD 39 NYC
text: Very special hotel that i recommend because of the location, the room service and all the crew. The Bar and the breakfast also is so special and all together with the rooftop made my stay there spacial days of vacation. Tks for all.

title: Perfect
text: Very close to everything and grand Central clean room every day you can take coffee and tea free every morning and value for the price friendly service and very kindly staff.everything was just perfect

title: 5 day stay near to hospital
text: I was pleasantly surprised by how clean and quiet the hotel was, especially at night.  The staff was very accommodating when I had to delay my arrival by 2 days.  The location is great, very walkable to restaurants and shopping, too.  Best for one person, as the bathroom is essentially in the room, with little privacy (partially fogged glass).  Could use a shelf in the bathroom, face washcloths, and quick snack/drink options on the main floor.  Would stay again if traveling alone.

title: Amazing Experience!
text: The attendants at the check in desk were so helpful with everything. With everything being closed on Thanksgiving morning, one of the gentleman was very helpful in finding an open store! Thank you again!!

title: Great stay, great location
text: Excellent location close to Grand Central. Quiet at night. Rooms are small but workable. Great service, great restaurant attached, and a rooftop that's beautiful even if the bar wasn't open. We stayed in a bunk room - unless you're very close to the person your rooming with, there really isn't privacy. Could use a bathroom door that you can't see through. Would definitely stay again!

title: Couples Stay
text: Great Location. Was able to walk to some of the main attractions. Hotel is about 3 blocks away from Grand Central which allows you to take the sub where and when needed. Had a great time visiting. Rooms are a bit small, but hey isn’t that all NY rooms are.

title: Good hotel.
text:
Good hotel
Good staff

One problem is that I was cold when I went to bed and turned on the heat, but it was a little noisy.
Otherwise clean and very nice place.
A refrigerator and kettle would have been nice, but it was fine without them.

title: Great value for a hotel in heart of NYC
text: Super clean; all you need in a hotel unless you plan to stay in the room the whole time you are there. Quiet, can buy breakfast downstairs; great location East side; Staff fine and very helpful. Young and international clientele, but as an oldperson that was just fine.

title: Awesome location, good value!
text:
This place is like going back to college. Tiny rooms that are very functional and very well isolated. I was lucky to have 3 windows (2 in the bathroom!) for a single-bed room, from which I could see the Empire State Building. The terrace is very nice, it has a veranda-type room too where you can relax or work in when it is very cold outside. The lounge is also great, and free tea/coffee in the morning is a real treat!
The location is awesome, 5min-walk from Grand Central station for public transportation (many subway lines and trains to JFK airport). The NY Public Library and Central Park are only a stretch away.
Yes, it is (very) expensive, but this is NYC!

title: friendly staff, good location, great atmosphere
text: Central location on Manhattan Island, easy walking distant from the busy city attraction, in a quiet street. Friendly staff which solved issues adequately. Great atmosphere in the breakfast area and the evening bar.

title: Excellent stay
text: Only stayed one night but from the time of check in to check out was smooth. Room was clean, comfortable and quiet for being in the city. The bar and restaurant were great as well….it was also nice that they provided a breakfast in the morning. Would stay there again.

title: Soggiorno piacevole e comodo. Sensazione di essere meno “formica” nella grande NY.
text:
E’ n piccolo Hotel dalla posizione eccellente per muoversi a Manhattan. Mi piace perché non e’ “spersonalizzante “ come molti grandi hotel . Il personale e’ gentile e collaborante. 
Le stanze sono piccole però il bagno ha le giuste dimensioni . Pulizie impeccabili.  
Interessante la combinazione con il pub.

title: Short November stay
text:
Hotel was small, exactly as advertised! Room was clean and had everything I needed. Great location, friendly staff and easy check in and out 

Was also able to leave my bags with the hotel for a few hours after checking out before my flight home which was great! 

As others have noticed bathroom is right there and not much privacy. I was travelling solo so fine for me but might not recommend if you're not close to the person you want to travel with!

title: Good value and athmosphere
text:
Murray Hill is a rather quiet area with lots of offerings. The POD39 is a stylish budget hotel with quite some compromises for the lower prices but still quite some value. Especially the roof top bar is a very nice add-on to staying in Manhattan. I enjoy this place evrytime I am am at the Pod39. 
On the other hand you have to accept very small rooms with low comfort. Still, quite some of them are really quiet which in NYC is a value of its own.

title: Very noisy and small guest room
text: There was a constant noise (all day and all night) from the window of the guest room, coming from the external machinery of the air conditioning system. The room was small and the bathroom could not be closed hermetically

title: Very good value for money
text: We like a real reception with real people in it, and when they are also kind and helpful, then it tops out in our opinion. Rooms are, there is everything you need without anything being unnecessarily luxurious, room service was excellent

title: Great Location and super friendly
text: worth the dollars.   room was what was expected small but did the job shower was great. and kept room cleen every day. and free tea n coffee in the morning super stay    staff was pleasant friendly. was defo come back and stay again

title: Amazing hotel with a perfect location.
text: The hotel is really perfect for staying for 2 weeks - ad a single person. The rooms are small. A perfect location. Very friendly and helpfull emplyees. I gad a clean room every day. I will come again!

title: 7 days stay in Nov
text: Location is the key point of this hotel which is 2 block from the Grand Central Station. Would love to say that is a budget stay, bit it's  quite pricy for such small rooms. Double room is for 1 person as 2 ppl cannot walk inside it, Queen room is a bit more spacious. Decent stay, nice roof top view.

title: Hotel super.
text: Hôtel au top. Bien situé avec un métro à 5 min. Chambre un peu petite mais propre avec une literie excellente et une salle de bain impeccable. Rooftop génial avec jolie vue. Le personnel est sympathique. Trois ascenseurs pour ne pas s'impatienter.

title: Nice place to stay in midtown
text: Very good location for business in Manhattan and leisure activities (sightseeing) in the heart of NYC  Super friendly and helpful people. Uncomplicated check-in and check-out, enjoyed the view to the city from the 15th floor.

title: Great location!
text: The best thing about the hotel is its location for exploring Manhattan.  The rooms are compact but adequate. Staff are friendly and free tea and coffee are available in the breakfast bar. Just be aware of the car prices even before 20% service charge!

title: Great value and location!
text: Very well located hotel, super close to Grand Central Station. The rooms are impeccably clean and the stuff is super friendly. Check the bar and the rooftop! I definitely reccomend the hotel and will come back on a future trip to NY.

title: Magnifico soggiorno
text: Posizione assolutamente magnifica. Staff gentilissimo e disponibile, ci ha aiutato a risolvere più di un problema. Rooftop magnifico al mattino ed al tramonto. Ci tornerei senza batter ciglio. Consigliato

title: Small but very comfortable
text: We stayed in a bunk room which was very tight, but the beds were extremely comfortable. The bathroom was tiny, but very efficiently, organized, free, coffee, and tea downstairs each morning from 7 to 11. The rooftop bar was not open, but the rooftop was beautiful. Housekeeping was great. Very happy with our stay.

title: Great for Solo Trip
text: Booked a Full pod for 4 nights and got upgraded to a Queen pod at check-in! Location is pretty good - it's a 5-10 minute walk from Grand Central-42 station and Grand Central Terminal, so easy access to most tourist destinations. Front desk staff was very kind and helpful. The room was really clean and nicely designed - small, yes, but had all my needed amenities. A safe, space to hang clothes, under-bed drawer and storage for luggage. The bathroom had decently ample counter space, too. This is a perfect hotel for solo travel or couples, and I'd definitely come stay again!

title: Perfect location
text: The hotel is in a great position, the room was clean and calme. At the lounge there was the possibility to have coffee and tea every morning and this was very comfortable. The room is little but not a problem for us

title: Super friendly hotel in super location
text: I will recommend Pod 39 to anyone traveling to Manhattan. The location is fantastic - we always felt safe, Grand Central is just around the corner and you can just walk across to Times Sq or Central Park very easily. The vibe is very friendly, cool and relaxed. Rooms are very clean, beds comfy, lovely towels, decor is bare but not short of anything.

title: Great place to stay
text:
Great place to stay in New York City. The location is nice and the staff was lovely. The rooftop bar is a bonus. I would stay at Pod 39 again. You can also leave the bags after check out and pick them up later.
Thanks!

title: Met my expectations!
text: Jenae at the reception was super friendly and I also got a free room upgrade. The room is TINY, but alas, that’s what you expect from a Pod hotel. The location is great and the bed was comfortable. I stayed at Pod 51 as well, and the room was slightly bigger, though the bathroom there seemed a bit smaller. Guess it’s one of those “you can’t have it all” situations.

title: Nice, clean little hotel
text:
The Pod 39 was perfect for our 6-days trip to New York. The hotel is very clean, the staff very friendly and helpful. The location is good, just a few minutes away from Grand Central station and Times Square. The neighbourhood is, compared to the rest of Manhatten. rather quiet, with a lot of nice cafes and restaurants.
The rooms are very small, which seems to be normal for Manhatten, however the bed was super cosy - and you don't spend much time visiting the big apple in the hotel anyway. Our room was cleaned every day, which was nice. The only thing which we didnt like to much was that the bedroom is only separated by glass from the bathroom and it doenst even go all the way up the wall - so no privacy there.
The rooftop bar is amazing, you get a great view around the area, however we recommend reserving a seat or table as it can get very crowdy.

title: Très bon séjour
text:
L’Emplacement est idéal à deux pas de grand central. 
A partir de 7h, Thé et café sont en libre service et possibilité de prendre un petit déjeuner au bar. 
Possibilité de laisser les bagages la journée du Check out sans frais supplémentaire. 
Les chambres sont nettoyées tous les jours avec changement de serviette si souhaité.
Les chambres sont néanmoins très petites mais nous n’avons pas eu de mauvaises surprise sachant que la superficie était bien mentionnée lors de notre réservation.
Nous recommandons cet hotel

title: 100% recomendable
text: Habitaciones muy limpias, personal muy amable, puedes llevar comida de fuera y comerla en el lobby, café gratis hasta las 10:00am, roof top muy bonita, cerca del centro, dispone de pizzería y supermercado cerca..Totalmente recomendable

title: Enjoyable Location, Clean, Pleasant Staff
text: A great place to stay if you stay mainly on the East Side. Good restaurants, not too far from the Village. Helpful staff. Rooms are small but modern and efficient and you can find a good deal if you keep your eye on the rates. Highly recommended.

title: Loved my stay at Pod 39
text: The BEST choice I made by staying here, I will definitely be coming back to this hotel. Everyone that is employees here is super attentive and kind. The rooms are clean and housekeeping was a 10. It’s rare when you come across hotels like this.

title: Great stay
text:
Great place to stay in midtown. Affordable.
Nice rooftop patio
Friendly and helpful staff
Small cozy rooms. Perfect for crashing at night and getting ready in the morning. Free coffee in the morning and a nice selection of bagels and muffins at reasonable prices. Worse case just head to Cafe  Venice across the street for that NYC breakfast sandwich.

title: Essentials well catered for with much more outside the room
text:
Room was clean, comfortable and well equipped.  Everything you need in a compact space which was perfect for my needs.
Hotel bar and restaurant was good for evenings.  Plenty of other things going on in the games room also.
Breakfast was very basic but plenty of options nearby if you want something more.

title: Good value
text: Good location, reasonable price, clean rooms, and access to nearby gym. Staff was very helpful with suggestions about nearby restaurants etc. I have stayed here before and will do so again … never disappointed.

title: Good location small room
text: It is a good option for one person, if you're a couple you should know that you won't have any privacy. Although, it is good Located and the staff is great, but the room is loudly and very small......

title: Excellent hotel in Manhattan!
text: The best price-quality hotel in Manhattan, New York. Warmly recommended for both private and buisiness travelers. Many special thanks to the receptionist Jenae - she is exemplary and well client-oriented.

title: Convenient, safe and good value
text:
We loved it despite the small bunk bed room. We did have a view of the Empire State Building!
Great location and plenty of shops, transport links and restaurants close by. We would return in the future and recommend.

title: Excellent stay at the Pod 39
text: The Pod 39 was the perfect place to stay for my 2 nights in NYC. Great location, friendly staff, clean room and a great lounge/bar area. The GM, Michael greeted me and was very professional and friendly. I would definitely stay here the next time I come back to NYC.

title: Great value
text:
Enjoyed our stay
Free coffee, good location and quiet rooms. Rooms small but nice designed. Liked the common area and the location worked well short walk to Grand Central. Our teenage daughters had a room with bunk beds that worked well.

title: Cute hotel
text: One modern hotel, well situated, good breakfast, clean lobby, professional and smiling personal. Beautiful rooftop with wide view of the heart of the Midtown from the open bar of the 19 floor. I recommend this hotel for short stay in the big Apple.

title: Great Location In Midtown But Tight Fit
text:
This hotel is in a great location, easy walking distance to Grand Central Station, 5th Avenue, Times Square, Broadway District, UN, etc. The housekeeping staff is excellent, they cleaned our room daily without any need for follow up.  The bed was firm and comfortable so we were able to sleep well. 
The room safe was convenient and sized so that it could easily accommodate our laptop.  This was the first stay for my wife and I in a Pod hotel, we had a Queen Pod but it was still a tight fit in terms of the two of us moving around our room at the same time.  The room could have used a few more outlets for charging of devices such as cell phones, iWatchs, laptop etc.  The bathroom could have used 1-2 shelves for hygiene/toiletry items for which there was room to install. When we booked our room in early August the hotel website advertised a Mexican restaurant but when we arrived it was permanently closed, this was disappointing because we looked forward to some Mexican food and drinks at our hotel during our NYC stay.  We chose to stay here because at the time of booking other hotels in the same area were $100-150 more per night.  In retrospect, having a bit more space would be nice and so maybe points out the need to hunt further in advance for a more suitable hotel.

title: Ideal just for few days
text: Location perfect, walking distant of relevant spots, deli and shops around. Complimentary coffee in the morning. Beautiful terrace on 17 floor, perfect for sightseeing. Room was very small, perfect only for sleeping. Hotel is perfect if you do not have to spend a lot of time in the room

title: Perfect stay
text: Very nice and Clean room in a convenient location, few minute away from metro central and empire state building. Free coffee for breakfast, very nice staff. Good price. The plus is the bar at 17th floor

title: Good location and price.
text:
It's a great option for those who are just going to occupy the room to sleep or rest. No other support is available, not even breakfast.

We stay in cold weather, but I imagine that in the summer we may have problems with purchased items that would be better kept in a minibar.

title: Amazing hotel, staff and location
text: We had an amazing time in your hotel. From the lobby to the rooftopbar and everything between it was just great. Staff is very friendly, rooms were super clean, bed was great and location of the hotel is wonderful. Would definetly recommend the hotel to everyone who is going to visit New York

title: Very good location !
text:
Very good experience.
The location of the hotel is perfect, 2 streets from the Grand Central and very easy for moving in the city with the subway near from this place.
Plus ! Good rooftop with nice view 
Amazing trip, thank you all !

title: A/c doesn't work well
text: It was tooo hot to sleep. The a/c kept turning on and off. I put into the thermostat "cool" "On" and nothing came on. It was only when it was on "auto" that it turned on. However, throughout the night. It kept shutting off.

title: Good location, nice, modern, clean, small room, lounge et roof top!
text: It's a 10 for me, good location near subway a walk to atracion, very nice hotel, it's modern, it's very clean, the room are realy small but very well equiped, the lounge is the best part of this hoel and roof top.... WoW

title: Consideration
text: the hotel is located in a strategic area for those who want to visit NY. Professional staff is available, clean facility. a note can be made on the small size of the bedrooms. Another element of certain importance is silence, which is formed well thanks also to comfortable mattress

title: Gerard
text:
Excellent location, I appreciated the cleanliness of and all different services provided.
However the rooms are a little bit too small and it should be more things proposed for the breakfast.
The price is very correct for what is proposed.

title: La mejor relación precio/ calidad de NY
text:
POD 39 es un hermoso hotel ,  muy bien ubicado , con un precio muy accesible para los números que maneja la ciudad.
El área de descanso en el lobby es innovadora y yo la llamo “el concepto del post lobby” 
Uno ingresa y tiene la recepción abierta las 24hs y unos pocos sillones , pero seguís caminando y en la parte de atrás , aparece un OASIS, un salón ENORME con sillones súper confortables , con mesas para comer , con pantalla gigante , una barra, con agua disponible las 24hs 
Al lado hay un bar integrado al hotel y en el piso 17  hay un ROOF TOP BAR muy lindo 
Si vas a NY , es la mejor opción

title: Small and compact in a great location - has everything you need!
text:
The rooms are small, but this is a huge part of the idea of the hotel! My brother and I shared a bunk room which was met all our needs for a 5 night stay. The room is basic but has everything you need in it (including towels, a safe, hairdryer, soaps and shampoos etc).

We chose to stay here based on previous reviews, the location and the comparative price to other hotels. The location in Midtown was great - we walked for much of our trip and could reach Central Park in 30mins. The Empire State Building was about 20mins away too. We also made use of the water taxi one day to get down to Lower Manhattan (much nicer than the subway and only $4 per person one way!). This leaves from East 34th Street and was less than 15mins away on foot.

We made the most of the complimentary tea and coffee most mornings and did buy pastries on four of our five mornings. The breakfast options are quite limited so bear this in mind if you want a full continental or cooked breakfast as you won't get this here. We went to the rooftop bar once which had some stunning views at night!

In summary: if you just want a comfy base camp to sleep in and shower at which is in a great location, at a more reasonable price, stay here.

title: Nice and convenient place to stay in NYC
text:
Small but clean and functional, very well located with available and very good, walking tours.
The hotel is very close to major interest spots and transportation making it very nice place to stay in NYC

title: Nice hotel
text: Teh hotel was nice. The location very good too. He had a room with no natural light at all. So we couldn't know how the day was until we went out. The staff very kind and helpful. The room was very clean too

title: clean and simple
text: really enjoyed my stay.. staffs are accommodating and easily approachable. we arrived early and they let us checkin early. the place is clean and simple. I really like the location because it is near to the attractions and of course the grand central which is really convenient.

title: Not very convenient
text:
It was extremely difficult to find the hotel since it's one entrance out of few, there's no sign visible in the front of the building and the one in the entrance is hidden by scaffolding. The hotel is very near Grand central station so it's good for the east side but if you need the west side it's 20-25 min. walk.
The "bank pod" was extremely small - so small that you couldn't close the door behind you when entering the room unless you got behind the door first. I never paid so much for so little space. Sleeping quality was fair.
The separation between the room and the bathroom was partially transparent - not very good if you need some privacy. Towels were adequately thick and sufficient in quantity.

title: Expensive bad experience
text: My worst experience in New York. The hotel is very busy at night. The environment is not clean. The room supposed to be upgraded one is very very tiny. You don’t have place even for your suitcase. It was rainy and I had to put my wet luggage on the bed to open it. The bathroom very tiny too. They have to put the towels in the room !

title: Very nice hotel on very good location
text:
Very nice hotel with nice people at reception. 
Rooms are small, but clean. Good beds (queen chamber) and nice good shower. 
And a very romantic rooftop with a great view on midtown Manhattan.

Rooms have locker/vault and daily fresh sheets and cleanup.

title: Cool hotel but terrible service in the "restaurant"
text: The hotel has a decent price and is clean. The food in the "restaurant" is so expensive and terrible. The waitress never take the order. I have to pretty much go to the bar, ask, bring the food from the bar to the table, so terrible. The place is good to sleep only, which is ok. The walls are pretty thin so can listen to the other room, the location might be better but you can walk 24-30 mins to get time square for example

title: Location, location, location
text:
I loved being able to wheel my suitcase from Grand Central to the hotel, which is on a quiet street.
I am very sensitive to beds and need softer surfaces. These were firm, which many people like. Highly recommend to others.

title: LOUD - NO SPACE - POOR MANAGEMENT - LOUD
text:
Pod 39 is LOUD and the staff seem indifferent. There is no space in the room. We literally had to scooch to get around the bed to the other side because there was 6 inches of space between the bed and the desk. I'm not even sure how this complies with the City code. It's right next to the bathroom too which has a glass wall. The space is way too small to call a room. It's more like a closet with a bed, toilet, shower, and a small sink stuffed inside. 

LOUD - There is no place to go except to the rooftop but you have to have a reservation to sit down and they won't allow you to bring food up. And, the lounge area downstairs had music full blast while two NFL games were playing with the volume turned all the way up on both games making for a cacophony of sound and nowhere else to go. We asked three times if they could turn the volume down on the two games and keep the music or just have the volume for one game and no music or the other game's volume. 

They blew us off multiple times even though they said they were addressing it. When we tried to move to the bar up front where it was a little bit quieter they kicked us out even though management told us we could go in there. When we explained the problem, they were just rude. We went back to the lounge and asked again. We were ignored so we sat in the lounge in front of the check-in desk and ate our food because we couldn't fit in our room to eat it because there was no space. 

We chose not to stay any longer and booked a room at the Scherman Hotel on the west side of Midtown. It was excellent and quiet. It cost 1/2 as much as POD 39.

title: Clean, friendly staff and nice.
text: My experience was excellent and very comfortable. The staff were always friendly. Nice view from my room, and I always found it very clean. The location was perfect for me, grand central is very close.

title: Peu mieux faire
text: Globalement les chambres sont propres, mis à part de vieilles tâches dans la douche et sur la porte. Ce serait un point à améliorer avec le bruit de la VMC qui est assez fort. Sinon, je recommande cet hôtel qui est idéalement placé.

title: Highly Recommended!
text: The staff were attentive, friendly, and always ready to assist with any requests or queries. The location was conveniently situated just three blocks away from Grand Central Station, providing easy access to various parts of the city. The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. There wasn’t much space, but overall, it was very good. I recommend it.

title: Excellent value for money
text: Pod 39 offers accommodation which is basic but represents excellent value for money. It's location is close enough to feel all the buzz of New York but still offer a area of relaxation with a community feel. The hotel has everything you could need without paying a premium for lots of extras that you really don't need. I would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a clean, modern hotel in a great location.

title: A wonderful experience at POD 39 in NYC
text: Pod 39 is an excellent service. From when you arrive you realize what a wonderful central location. The front reception staff are welcoming, professional courteous. The room is extremely comfortable. the bed is super and the pillows are a dream. The shower is a rainful and great hot water  control. Overall this is an excellent hotel that I would certainly recommend to my friends and family.

title: Work trip
text: Excellent Staff!  They are customer service focused and do an excellent job!  I received a free room upgrade for my 7 night stay. What a treat!  The rooms are shockingly quite and feel secure.  It has been quite each of my stays.

title: Exceeded expectations
