text: Fantastic location, excellent facilities, wonderful friendly staff, relaxing vibe. All at an extremely affordable price. The bunk bed room is quite small but that was made clear in the information and honestly, I did not spend a lot of time in the room. Had I shared the  room with someone it may have been a bit of a tight squeeze. Overall though I was very pleasantly surprised and had an amazing stay.

title: Great value for a NYC visit.
text: A friend of mine recommended this place as he had stayed there before.  Clean rooms and good amenities (rooftop bar, recreation room, etc.).  Nice staff and very attentive.  Will stay here again when I want a good location and value for the space.  Rooms are quaint.

title: Great stay
text: I had a great stay at pod 39 I will definitely be recommending this place to all my friends. And I’ll definitely be coming back myself very soon. It was a great stay at Pod 39 the rooms are very comfy

title: Convenient location, great staff
text: My wife and I stayed at Pod 39 during our US Open adventure. The staff was super friendly, the location was great and the room, although small, was comfortable. There only suggestion would be to install ventilation fans in the bathroom because the shower steam has nowhere to go

title: I'd go back
text: The staff was kind. My first room wasn't cleaned properly but the front desk and hospitality team was apologetic and rectified the issue but changing my room and waving my facility fee. The rooftop has a great view and nice set up. There are many food options around and walking tours offered by the hotel if you're interested. I'd stay there again.

title: Review
text: Was an okay place to stay but we found a couple quashed bugs in the wall that were obviously missed in cleaning and not sure how they had been there for. Was a decent distance from the tourist places we wanted to see

title: First time, can't wait for next time
text: Did not know what to expect but we were not disappointed.   Everything was clean, staff friendly and helpful. Location was within walking or short subway ride away from Everything Manhattan. Could not have asked for anything more.!!!

title: Nice, well located hotel
text: We stayed for a week in this nice hotel which is very well located in New York. The staff is very friendly, the rooms are clean and there are 2 nice bars where you can have a drink, 1 of which is located on the roof terrace. At night it is very quiet so we slept well. The rooms are quite small though.

title: The best stay ever!!!!
text: Had a great stay at POD 39 in Murray Hill in Mideast Manhattan.  All the staff from the front desk to the maintenance workers were all so kind an helpful. Our room was excellent.  Everything was clean and fresh.  The only thing with the rooms is that they are so small.  But we didn’t mind it because we only used the room for sleeping.  With so much to do around us,  why would you want to stay inside anyways. Their roof top bar was so nice and had a great view of the city.  And I want to thank Chantal,  the lovely young lady that works in the hotel bar.  Thank you for making our stay awesome.

title: Very dirty youth hotel
text:
Disgusting and dirty bathroom even after having complained and after that Brian at the reception said a deep cleaning would be done.  
I’ve asked Brian if he or the housekeeper manager has checked how and if the cleaning has been done properly… NOPE 
Mold because of lack of aeration. 
No recycle bin. Noisy air conditioning   
same rubbish on the floor for at least 3 days  (empty cans, papers, etc) everywhere in the hotel (ping pong room, staircases, …)
Heavy smell of cannabis on the lobby. 
No friendly staff. 
Hotel for young people without money

title: Good
text: my room ended up being a little pricey for what it was due to the dates i booked, but if you book when the rates are low its a good deal. room was clean and hotel was pretty quiet. early check in was first come first served based on rooms available. very close to grand central so its very convenient

title: Super clean, efficient, and hip hotel with a GREAT location.
text: We had three rooms and were traveling as a team on a budget-focused business trip. All three rooms were as described: Clean, Modern, cozy and efficient. Clever layout allowed us to store our luggage with no problem. The hotel itself has a fun atmosphere and an awesome rooftop bar! The best part about staying here was the location itself. Simply perfect for getting to meetings and close to some great restaurants. We always felt safe and had no issues during our stay. Loved the free coffee in the morning too!

title: Cheap Option for travellers
text: Its very much like a hostel, except that you do not need to share a room with anyone you don't know, plus you have your own bathroom. And if you are travelling with a companion who is not your significant other, bunk beds are great so you don't wake up and find yourself snuggling!

title: Great Location
text: The staff was very friendly. My room was very small, but it was clean and comfortable. Great location in NYC! Near the Great Station, Starbucks, subway, some NYC attractions such as Summit One Vanderbilt and New York Public Library, stores etc.

title: Great value and location
text: Very convenient location next to grand central. I got the single pod and it was perfect for one person. Check in and out process was quick and smooth. Staff was helpful and friendly. The ACs do make some noise at night so had trouble sleeping a bit so make sure to bring earplugs if you’re a light sleeper like me.

title: The best relationship between prize and services
text:
Excellent location, all the services are ok. Perfect to stay some days in NY for vacation. Room was small, which is not a problem if you only go to sleep.
Nice rooftop and bar.
The Grand Central is very close so it's easy to move everywhere.
Ah, there were no noise in the night even considering that the hotel is located in Midtown

title: August quick trip
text:
Outstanding value. Although bunk pod is small it was perfect. We dont spend anytime in hotel but to sleep and bath. Perfect spot. Beds were very comfortable. 
Never made it up to roof top bar…
I would stay here again for sure.

title: Alojamiento bien, habitación muy pequeña
text:
El hotel está bien, buena ubicación. Las habitaciones son extremadamente pequeñas y poco funcionales, más aún por el precio, pero no esta mal.
El baño está separado por una mampara de vidrio por lo que sería incómodo si vas con alguien de no tanta confianza.
Tiene una terraza en el último piso muy linda! 
Ofrecen agua, hielo, café y té gratis.

title: Great stay
text: The Pod 39 hotel is a great option considering a balance between location and price. For one person, the room has the minimum size with confort. The concierge works 24 hours. Most staff are friendly and attentive. The only things missing are a minibar in the room and more options for the breakfast in the lounge.

title: Clean Hotel, Great Location
text: This is a great location for a hotel. The  whole place was very clean, and staff were helpful and friendly. Mattress in queen room was hard, but we would stay again. Overall, the service and cleanliness was excellent.

title: Surprised!
text: Me & my friend enjoyed our short stay.  So close to the center of NYC.  Lots of eateries & shopping around.  Though our room is small, its all that we need really. Will book other Pods to experience it.  Thank you!

title: Small but comfortable
text: The hotel is called PODS and that’s what you get. But it works perfectly for what you need. A place to sleep as you re-charge to continue with your holiday. After all, you are the city that doesn’t sleep and you don’t go to NY and stay in a room.

title: POD 39 just say no
text: Bunk bed room smaller than many closets. Noisy A/C and neighbors playing music. Narrow hallways and blocked window make me question safety if need to evacuate. Bathroom was clean and shower was very good. Staff was great, but room is uninhabitable for me. I felt claustrophobic and could not sleep, so I  spent hours on roof deck (which is nice) and in front lobby. Location is great near Grand Central Station and plenty of restaurants nearby.

title: Great location, fantastic price.
text: We travelled as a family a booked two rooms, a queen pod and a bunk pod. Both were spotlessly clean and extremely comfortable. Staff are warm, friendly and helpful. The location is fantastic. Close to a number of big NYC attractions, and also very close to Grand Central Station which makes travelling to other parts of the city a breeze.

title: I will come back
text: The location is very convenient, only one block away to 42 central terminal, and 15 mins walking distance to time square. Don’t need to worry about food, there were many restaurants around. Staffs were very friendly and helpful. Only the room was very tiny, the bed on one side is the washing room and on the other side is the wall. It’s not suitable for older people, since those who sleep inside need to cross the other person to go washroom at night. But other than this, all is perfect.

title: A great no-frills hotel in a perfect midtown location
text: I have to admit I wasn’t sure what to expect when I booked this hotel.  Looking at their website, they clearly had a different feel to most other hotels in Manhattan in that price range. I travelled for the first time to NY from England, taking my 14 year old daughter with me, for a 5 night stay, so I was a little anxious, wondering if I should had gone for one of the more traditional hotel options. However this hotel was totally perfect. We loved the location, the no frills concept, the clean modern rooms, amazing shower, the air-con worked flawlessly (this was a very hot week in NY). And that rooftop bar is even better than what the photos in the website show.  For sure it’s not maybe the kind of place for a romantic couple getaway or for those that like the full-on hotel experience with room service and such like, but for the rest of us, this place ticks all the boxes.

title: Smelly Room
text: Terrible smell in the room that lasted the entire stay.  Realized I stayed out all day to avoid going back to the room. Could not relax due to the smell.  It may have been the carpet, I’m not exactly sure

title: Great location on a budget for a firs timer in NYC
text: It was my first time traveling solo in NYC then my brother met me for just 2 days and the hotel did not give me a hard time in getting my room changed to accommodate my brother's arrival. Staff was always courteous and helpful. The only thing I had a problem with was the carpet in my bunk pod, it was very itchy as I stepped on it (might not have been the best idea) but other than that it was a good stay.

title: Great!
text: I raccomend this hotel to everyone wants to come to New York and spend his time in a good location  it has a really good vibe..The hotel has a beautiful romantic terrace  on the roof (a rare beauty) the rooms are comfortable

title: The Best Stay in New York City
text: My stay at Pod 39 Hotel was simply amazing! The location was ideal, placing me right in the heart of the vibrant New York City. The cozy yet stylish pod concept provided a unique and comfortable experience. The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating, making me feel right at home. The rooftop bar offered stunning views of the city skyline, adding a special touch to my trip. Overall, Pod 39 Hotel exceeded my expectations and made my NYC visit unforgettable.

title: Amazing!
text:
Everyone was friendly. The hotel was super clean and the location was just the best. A must is the roof top bar of the hotel.
All in all I can definitely say it was one of the best ones I have been so far!

title: My Stay at Pod 39
text: Reception and check-in was excellent! The lady that attended to me at the reception was very warm and helpful. The room is small but very neat, well arranged, and comfortable. Check-out was equally smooth. Kudos to the team.

title: Very good
text: Very good all ! We suggest bottle of water in the rooms at arrival. Location perfect! Room slightly small but bathrooms very comfortable. Team front desk top ! Roof top extraordinary good ! Cocktails 100% !

title: Exceptional Customer Service
text:
The staff at Pod 39 went above and beyond with their customer service. Having left valuable belongings behind, they coordinated with me to organise the safe return of my possessions back to me. In addition to ongoing communication, they prepared the package to be shipped upon pick up by a courier. This commitment and care was so greatly appreciated.

The rooms themselves were clean and comfortable, and the atmosphere of the rooftop terrace was enjoyed by all. I will definitely return to Pod 39!

title: Very Good
text: Great hotel. Good prices, great location, excellent and friendly staff. My first time in New York was well received staying at this location. I will likely stay here again the next time I go to New York.

title: A very friendly first time in the City
text:
Very comfortable single pod, with al the necessary, clean towel everyday, a little place for the luggage, the room was cleaned every day, refurnished soap.
Staff so friendly, and the common places very hosting. They kept my luggage on checkout day for few hourse in a separate private room.

title: It was Perfect
text: It was a very Good place to visit New York. The hotel is very close to many attractions and to the grand Central. The rooftop bar was as well very beautiful. The rooms were small but clean. We would recommend the Hotel.

title: All you need in NY City
text: Great service, great room great location. Don't think about it anymore and book with them now! Great cleanliness, loved the daily complimentary coffee, the rooftop, the staff was helpful and kind, very comfortable and convenient.

title: Pod 39k review
text: Excellent. Clean, easy acces and close to train and subway stations. Personal very friendly and rooms very tidy and clean. Change sheets and towels every day. Breakfast was basic but wel service. Air conditioning on corridors was kind of too cold...

title: Exceeded my expectations
text:
I was surprised by how great this hotel was for my NYC visit. Clean, comfortable, quiet, good location to walk places, and helpful staff who all deserve raises - not fake friendly but actually friendly. I will stay here again, I was very happy as a solo traveler. 

The only things I'd change: the room set up might make me uncomfortable to stay with another person, given the bathroom's somewhat open design. The shower felt cramped and another shower curtain type option would help.

title: Great stay but bathroom lacks privacy (bunk bed room)
text:
Generally a great place (see details below), but bathroom privacy in the room is an issue if there's more than one of you - at least in the bunk bed room. The bathroom door is glass and only partially frosted, and the frosted glass turns into clear glass at around the 5 foot mark. In the bunk bed room you'll have to actively avoid being near the bathroom door if you want to avoid seeing the other person using the bathroom (which can be challenging given that the room is very small and when you're laying on the top bunk, you're looking directly through the clear glass into the bathroom's wall of mirror, which reflects everything happening in the bathroom). 

The bathroom door doesn't latch and sometimes gradually slid open on its own, leaving the sliding door open a few inches. There's no bathroom fan so the other person can hear everything. I stayed with a friend and I got ready first while they slept in and then went downstairs to have coffee and wait in the first floor lounge area while they got ready as a way to give them privacy. There are also private toilet stalls on the bottom floor of the hotel that guests can use which is helpful.

If you want a quiet room, ask for one of the lower floor rooms, away from the elevator. On the 14th floor, I heard the music from the 17th floor rooftop bar until after 10pm. The staff were great about moving me to a lower floor for the rest of my stay and I couldn't hear the music from the 6th floor. 

Otherwise, the hotel was great for the price and location. We stayed in late July and the air conditioning was terrific. The room was clean and the cleaning staff were very friendly and efficient. I was able to check in early when I arrived in the morning from a red eye flight, which was amazing. Bringing our coffee up to the rooftop bar area in the morning was lovely.

title: Just great!
text:
Excelent price, service and location.
Super recommended to visit most iconic New York’s places.
Near to central station is so helpful.
Rooms are confortable and very clean.
 I will definitely come back!

title: My experience at Pod 39 Hotel
text: The room was very clean. I appreciate the effort and  innovation  by the on sustainability. The staff were very friendly. The Hotel is located on walking distance to the Fink Fitness club and close to the UN Headquarters.

title: Great location to consider when in Manhattan!
text: Good price/value! Rooms are tiny, as expected, but you will not find any better proposition at this price point in central Manhattan. Location is great, walking distance to grand central station. Recommended!

title: The best value you will ever fing in NYC
text: Pod 39 offers has it all: convenient location, professional service, friendly staff, clean rooms all at the best possible value you will ever find in NYC. Parking is 5mn away and offers discount for guests.

title: Very comfortable
text: It was comfortable, silent, with a good location. I´ve enjoyed a lot! The rooftop is really nice, and also the café at the lounge. Before the trip, I saw people complaining about the room size, but I think it didn´t affect the experience. It is very nice for those who needs some time to rest after a day discovering the city!

title: Great Value and Location
text:
Would stay again - great location - great value - exactly what you need in NYC!!
Rooms are not very large but you don't need a lot of room in NYC since you can be out all day!!
Check in and check out staff were very helpful and friendly!

title: PODtastic!!!
text: One of the best trips and stays in NYC…love the POD and will be back soon. Everything was perfect and as much as 275 square feet is small, it’s all that is needed when you’re out and about from early morning to late night!

title: Ubicación, limpieza y amabilidad
text: El staff es muy amable, la limpieza de las habitaciones es excelente y su buena ubicación nos permitió desplazarnos incluso a pie sin ningún problema. Muy cerca de Times Square, del centro de la 5ta Avenida y del muelle para tomar el ferry hacia Brooklyn !

title: Pelo preço certo, um ótimo negócio
text:
O Hotel em si é muito bom. Funcionários atenciosos, ambientes e quartos limpos, chuveiro e cama gostosos, café e água à disposição, acesso fácil às principais atrações do centro de Manhattan e ao pequeno comércio do dia a dia.
O único porém é em relação ao preço. Nas férias de julho paguei mais de 1000 reais de diária. Mesmo com os benefícios citados, achei caro. Mas minha viagem foi planejada em cima da hora e me faltou opções. Preferi pagar mais caro, mas garantir um hotel de reputação.

title: Great value
text: Great position, very nice combo spaces (hall, bar, rooftop is wonderful and open all day for guests so you can chill and remote work there). Rooms are minimalist but functional. Only flaw: slight scanty smell in the room; gone with windows open after some minutes.

title: Excellent hotel and hospitality
text: The room was pretty small, but very clean which was a plus for us. The staff was amazing, helpful, and provided great service/hospitality. The location of the hotel was convenient and close to where we wanted to go. Easy walk to the subway station at Grand Central. The rooftop bar at the hotel was pretty cool. I would definitely come back and stay here.

title: Decent value for the area but not quite all it promises
text:
This hotel is good value for its very convenient location near Grand Central, rooms are clean and well-equipped and the staff are helpful. But while I don't mind the idea of aiming to provide more spacious, buzzy communal areas to spend time in so that it doesn't matter so much that the rooms are small and face inwards, I don't think it works as well as it could here because you wouldn't pass through the (rather dark) lobby bar or the rooftop without making a special detour.

Basically 3.5 stars but not quite 4

title: Good location but a bit pricey
text: I went for 2 nights at this place. This hotel located near the grand central station. The location is excellent however the price for the room was a bit pricey. At the time of check in they assign a room for us which was not ready but they give us another room. The room was small but it was fine. The bed was ok too. They do offer complementary coffee at the bar. There's a deli nearby where you can grab something to eat. Overall this hotel is not bad if you go just to sleep despite the price tag a bit high where you might get a similar room for a lower price outside of Manhattan.

title: Cheap, modern, friendly hotel in central Manhatten
text: Great hotel - good vibe, firenldy staff, clean rooms (if a little 'cosy' - but you expect that for the great price)> Close to Empire State and Grand Union Station everything else in Manhattan. Note: the shower/toilet door is clouded glass with some big gaps and so is pretty see-thru so you might not want to share a room with anyone other than a good friend! Only 4 star as the air con was very noisy.

title: Fully recommendable -Perfect A week's travel
text:
We had an excellent experience at this establishment. 
The location is really ideal and close to everything.
All the hotel staff were very helpful and attentive. 
We recommend it 100% and will be back for our next stay.

title: Cozy room, great location and responsive stuff
text: I choose this hotel for the location and the price, it was a good choice. Rooms might be a little small for some people but it was perfect size for me. The breakfast was good but limited in options. Staff is very nice and responsive. There were some minor issues with my room (TV not working or missing shower gel) that they resolved promptly. Overall, I highly recommend this hotel to couples and solo travellers looking to explore Manhattan.

title: Friendly staff, convenient and comfortable rooms
text: The staff at the front desk were very friendly, respectful and accommodating. The location is very convenient (I was with a group attending a UN event), and the rooms are comfortable with just enough amenities.  I recommend!

title: An enjoyable stay
text:
Small room, but it was very nice stay
I booked the bunker bed room, it was pretty small, as expected. Despite that, it was pretty cozy and had plenty of space for my carry-on luggage

I was expecting them to provide small amenities like slippers and sleeping mask coming from Toronto but they didn't and didn't seem to care.

title: Overall, Perfect on budget travel
text: Price and location was just perfect. 10-20min walking every landmarks (besides further south). However, the room was way smaller than expected from the picture provided on website and the noise from door closing is a bit loud.

title: Perfect for busy visitors !!
text: I loved my little pod! I now have a special place to come to where I feel  safe. What a brilliant idea for the inner city. Almost 2 single pods in the footage of 1 regular sized hotel room. It was extra clean, neat and convenient. Plenty of Fluffy linens and included wifi! I willing be back!

title: Amazing
text: The hotel is close to many places and the neighborhood is safe. The room is small but it has all the necessaties. The bed was comfortable. The room were cleaned everyday. The hotel staff is very helpful and friendly.

title: Pod 39, Great place to stay. Genius idea
text: Perfect for my solo trip to Manhattan. My room was a small Twin bed, bath and shower was all I needed. Very clean, modern, quiet. All the staff were excellent, friendly and helpful. A++ 10/10 service. The lounge/cafe/bar area was great, and free coffee in morning was wonderful.  Just 3 block walk to 42nd/Lexington/Grand Central subway.

title: Cool Vibes
text: The staff is friendly and everything was in order. The only setback was that the lounge and rooftop closed early and there was no restaurant or vending machines for getting water or snacks. The nearest convenience stores was two blocks away and closed early as well so if you needed something to eat or drink there weren’t any options until the next day.

title: 4th of July week
text: Love the Pods. We have stayed at 3 different locations and always have had a great experience. The staff at all locations are very friendly and helpful. I have a special needs child and he is a little firecracker and I appreciate how the staff are so welcoming. It's not always easy traveling alone as a single mom with a special needs child. So thankful for all the wonderful staff at all the 3 locations we have stayed at over the past few years.

title: Great location, perfect for mother-daughter trip
text: The room is very efficient, almost like staying in a camper van in the middle of a skyscraper, but just enough and just right for a mother-daughter trip. The compactness of the room is balanced by the nice common spaces, including the scenic rooftop bar and the comfortable cafe with ping-pong tables. Location is perfect, very convenient to Grand Central station and walkable to great food and attractions.

title: Great time
text: I m so satisfied with the customer service, the front desk girls were super nice specially Jenae, there were so helpful to give me directions and always with a smile. The Hotel have a very good location and close to Subways. I ll recommend this hotel for sure.

title: Pod 39 is fantastic!
text: Pod 39 is a great option for staying in NYC.  It's economical, sparkling clean, efficient, friendly, and within easy walking distance of Grand Central Terminal.   Catching the bus up and down Manhattan is very easy.   We love it and hope to make it our home base in NYC for future trips.

title: Great for those who traveling alone
text: I read the review that it's too small for two people or those who have many baggages, but for me, the room was perfectly cozy size for myself. I would rather stay here than staying in huge room by myself. If you not gonna keep the whole 2-3 luggages open whole time, the room has enough space. I packed essentials on smallest luggage. And I could put that open whole time. I also saw people wrote some complaints about noise. For me, it could be because my floor was whole solo room (single pod) but I didn't have any noise come over from next or nearby rooms. Only issue was people talking so loud in the hallway when they come back room super late. That's just people don't understand 'silent hours'. And the best part is every single staff I met here was being nice and friendly.

title: Great value!
text: Check-in was easy with friendly staff. They gave recommendations on nearby food when I arrived late in the evening too. Housekeeping was great and keeping my room clean. It was the perfect location - a short walk to Grand Central Terminal. I'd highly recommend to any people traveling solo!

title: AMAZING!!!
text: The staff were so helpful and kind ,they gave us much needed advice on navigating the subway system! Check in and check out were quick and easy, the layout of the rooms is very space efficient. My mom and I had the best sleep of our lives in those bunk beds and we loved the separate TVs for each bunk!

title: Simple, clean, perfect location
text:
Location, location, location
But also, simple, clean, cozy.
No unnecessary frills, but nothing lacking either. The rooftop bar is a great addition, and the one downstairs is also really nice (for breakfast too!). Staff is helpful and available.

title: IS THE BEST PROCE FOR THE MONEY!
text: Is Grate!!! Everything is just too easy with these guys!!! Address? Is close to grand central you can connect Anywhere!!! Arriving? is ease! Check inn? is Easy!!! Room? Just what you need! Confortable bed, good bed sheets! Check out? even better! just leave your key and walk away!

title: Average experience
text: Good location, but small rooms and the staff in general is not too kind, exception for the female receptionists, who are helpful and sympathetic. We had an issue with the AC, but it was fixed as soon we reported. Average experience at all.

title: Highly satisfied 😁
text:
My stay has been so delightful and I gladly reserved another week.  My room so peaceful, bed unbelievable so comfortable.
I must bring your special attention to the exceptional service and attention given by all the young people at the front desk especially by Miss Janaé.   Thank you so much🙏

title: Great location and value!
text: A friend and I stayed in a bunk pod for our four day trip. The room was quite small, but not much of an issue since we spent our days outside the hotel. Staff were very friendly and helpful, and the complimentary coffee and tea were a plus. The hotel is located on a quiet street but conveniently walking distance from many attractions and Grand Central Terminal. Overall, a hotel with great value! Perfect for our stay.

title: Inexpensive, Quality Hotel
text: I would recommend staying here! The pricing, location, the staff, the helpfulness, the parking assist - it was all great!!! If all you are seeking is a place to collapse and rest - this is it!! I will stay here any time I travel to NYC!!!

title: Excellent location. Clean rooms.
text: Rooms are very small, but satisfy basic needs. Bathroom, shower ok. A/C was a bit noisy. Cafeteria is ok, including ping-pong, and billiard tables. Complimentary breakfast includes only coffee or tea.

title: Best value in New York
text: I have stayed here for the past 5 years. You can't do better in value for money. Amazing location. Great service. Of course, your room is slightly bigger than a bed, but how much time are you spending in your room anyway. Clean, safe, friendly. I love it.

title: Excellent séjour!
text: Un hôtel idéalement situé à 2 pas de la Gare Grand Central d'où on peut aller partout très facilement. Très propre, personnel très accueillant et souriant. Le roof top est un super bonus. Notre chambre était très silencieuse la nuit, fait très rare nous a t'on dit pour NYC! Donc.on a apprecié! Un petit bémol, les toiletttes à peine isolées de la.chambre, pas top pour l'intimité

title: Budget Friendly Overnight
text: This was my 4th stay at Pod39 and my experience is constantly outstanding.  The hotel feels safe and clean and the room has just about everything you need.  The morning breakfast available - and free coffee - was a delightful surprise, and I found the service at the front desk fabulous.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again or recommend it to others.

title: Excellent location
text: Room so small but very well organized. Everyday housekeeping. Zero noise and good sleeping. Great location, walking distance to most of the main best spots on midtown. Close to Gran central to go easily everywhere else in Manhattan.

title: Great location
text: Great location and a reasonable price compared to the rest of New York. The rooms are small, but it is perfect for a trip to New York if you’re planning on being out and about most of the time there. I would recommend to anyone who is planning on visiting New York to do all of the touristy stuff whilst there.

title: practical and comfortable
text:
Small room, but very functional and pleasant.  The staff is kind, the rooftop bar is lively and the hotel is very well located.
(Full pod for 1 person for 2 nights, but acommodates a couple with no problems)

title: Very good hotel
text: Clean silence friendly staff i hope to come back to Pod 39 and the bar , the breakfast was excellent plus the barista was really friendly im glad to proove this experience Ihope see you soon all the stuff of pod 39

title: Super esperienza! Consigliato
text:
Il nostro soggiorno presso il Pod è stato davvero super. L'hotel si trova in una posizione molto comoda, 5 minuti a piedi da Grand Central e 15 mn da Times sq. Il costo è accettabile e nella media considerata la zona.
La struttura è curata e pulita, le camere minimali ma perfette per un viaggio in coppia. Lo staff è molto disponibile e preparato. 
Al piano terra c'è un bar dove la mattina il caffè, the e acqua sono disponibili gratuitamente per tutti gli ospiti ( a pagamento si può fare una colazione completa). Vi sono inoltre 2 tavoli da ping pong ed uno da biliardo disponibili per tutti. 
Abbiamo adorato il bar sul rooftop, da cui si vede anche l'Empire State Building.

title: Well located and good environment
text: The hotel was well located, just two blocks from Grand Central Station, the room was good and the cleaning service awesome everyday it was well organized and cleaned, NY is a good city to enjoy and also the hotel was good, they have to be a little bit friendlier with the guests and more strict with the kind of people who access to the rooftop

title: Excellent location
text:
We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights. The room and bathroom were clean. The hotel has elevators and in room safe. But of course, the rooms are very very small. We had 2 big of pieces of luggage, but somehow we managed to fit in them with the limited spaces. 

The rooms were also equipped with air conditioning and heater. The shower was also good. It would have been better if the bathroom door was opaque rather than a translucent/frosted glass door. 

The hotel front desk people were friendly and helpful. The hotel is in strategic location where it’s surrounded by lots of eateries; the grand central train station  is just 5 minutes of walking distance from the hotel. There is also an Indian vegetarian restaurant right behind the hotel, called adyar bhavan. 

Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York.

We stayed here last October, sorry for the late review. Only now found the time to post a review. Thank you.

title: Very cool, hip and pleasant hotel to stay at. Definitely recommend it to all city hoppers! Accessible and good staff..
text:
My stay at Pod 39 was really memorable. From the moment I arrived till the last second I had to leave everything was done with much enthusiasm and dedication! To all the staff thank you for a very pleasant stay. I would definitely recommend and/or stay there again myself. The location was awesome. Just 3 minutes out of Grand Central. Great scenery, shops, restaurants just on walking distance. I had an average of 45000 steps a day on my iPhone. (Thanks Apple)

If you want to go further than walking 5-10 blocks, just take the Subway to every inch of NYC. It's accessible, fast, easy and sometimes just fun to witness. Getting back to Pod 39 is never a problem! Take the subway or just take a cab if it's late at night and you want to go faster. You choose...

It was too bad that a lot of buildings in the same street are under construction. So no sleeping in unfortunately and a lot of honking...(weekend was no problem). However, this was just a very minor, minuscule setback into what became a very epic and pleasant stay at Pod 39 and visiting NYC. 

My room also had everything that you need for a city trip to NYC. Bathroom and room service facilities were on point. I slept like a baby on the bed. The only thing that I missed was a clear "Pod 39 welcome to the room and here are our rules" form. I think that would've solved a few of my questions instantly. But everything became clear eventually. Just pay close attention and/or ask the staff. They'll be happy to help...

Pod 39 also has a rooftop terras that I didn't make any use of due to other/prior engagements. But I've seen people come down the elevator quite happy so that must mean something. And also people who didn't even stay at Pod 39 found their way towards the rooftop terras. So I'll definitely try that out next time. 

About the staff: nothing but compliments. They were so considerate and always thinking along with you. Customer service is really one of their best virtues. From young till old, normal or in any way disabled, fit or not so fit: the staff will do their utmost best to deliver the best experience to every guest they get. They let me store my luggage because I had a late flight out. Because of that I had a really cool and relaxed last day in NYC. They took care of everything and my trip back to JFK was fun and sad at the same time: because I didn't want to go.  

All the best to the people of Pod 39!!

title: Good place to stay with a great location
text: Stayed here with my son for four nights for a graduation trip. Great location and very friendly staff. Room is small, which I knew, but a solid place to stay and I would book it again. Overall, a good value for the price in downtown Manhattan.

title: Pod39 visit
text: Great location, great value, great staff! Eugene and Jenae at the front desk are so friendly and helpful and kind. Would definitely stay here again. My room was quiet and the bed was comfortable etc.

title: Want to came back
text:
The staff were so helpfull when we arrived. We got a room upgrade.
Great place to breakfest with nice people from diferent locations and wonderfull view from the rooftop (great to take some pictures).

title: Fabulous Unexpected Stay👍
text:
LOVED the staff, the efficient room, the location, the value and Vibe!  Felt comfortable and safe always. The room was like a cabin on a luxury ocean liner. Modern, tasteful, great!  
The common areas were wonderful - offering lots of options to chat with others, play pool or ping pong or just relax with a coffee and read.  
My personal favorite- the rooftop terrace ❤️.   The best place to enjoy a drink with my friend and catch up. 
I highly recommend POD 39 Hotel for those who appreciate different 👍

title: Great little pods
text: Great hotel with rooms that are sufficient and fit for purpose. Great service from all the staff and most importantly the bed is very comfortable and I slept well which is a rare experience for me in hotels!

title: Wonderful Stay!
text: Pod 39 is an affordable alternative in New York that provides the amenities of more expensive hotels. It has a rooftop bar and restaurant with beautiful views of its Midtown surroundings, including Empire State Building. Start your day with a continental breakfast with pastries, granola, fruit, bagels, and complementary coffee. Rooms, while small, are clean and comfortable. The staff is friendly, courteous, and helpful. The location cant' be beat as one is only a five minute walk from Grand Central Station. The neighborhood, Murray Hill, is also quieter than Times Square, yet gives one the feel of being in the city. There are abundant dining opportunities around the hotel. Stay at Pod 39. You will be happy you did.

title: Top location and very clean
text: Very well located and clean, super helpful staff, nice hotel lobby, rooms may differ from one to another very much even if same category. Air conditioning could be very noisy, staff resolved issues very smoothly

title: I enjoyed my stay
text: Very nice people at the hotel … at the lobby, the bar and maids too. Very quiet place, very clean too. I am very satisfied with service . Will surely recommend u and will choose u again next time in New York

title: Excellent Value
text: Pod 39 is great value for your money. My Queen room was clean and comfortable, and the hotel is located in a great and safe neighborhood just 5 minutes' walk from Grand Central Station and 10 minutes' walk from Bryant Park. I would happily stay here again at a future visit to NYC.

title: Great staff and good location!
text:
The location was super nice, close to everything. You could easily walk to Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Empire State and if you felt like it even to Central Park. 
Grand Central was also just 3 streets away which gave you many options around both Manhattan and surrounding areas.

Staff was so so friendly and helpful! They helped us getting a plug to our room for free and upgraded our room from bunk bed to double bed (for free) as they could see we were married. The staff really had a nice vibe going on for sure. Shoutout to Jenaé!

The hotel had a really cosy rooftop to which is worthy a visit! The view especially during the evening was gorgeous.

The rooms were small (you get what you pay for) and the bathroom had a really funky glass wall lol, a bit hello-ish when you had to do number 2. :) 

All in all, I’d stay there again and I recommend you doing the same!

title: Small rooms, but no secret when you book.  Great value and location
text: Small CLEAN rooms. Great rooftop bar and relaxing views.  We found the closeness to grand central station a perk. No long waits with elevators for us. Great lounge area. A little noisy at times. Only complaint was loudness of AC kicking on. Bothered my husband more than me. We had 2 rooms for the family and pleased with bunks and queen room. Seriously was a perfect set up for late teens and parents. I felt safe and fairly comfy. Not a plush room - and probably not for everyone but perfect for us.  When we go to nyc again, we will stay here and not consider other places due to location and pure economy for what you get.

title: Excellent staff, location, value
text: I had such a great stay at Pod 39. The location is super convenient and the value is excellent. Of course the rooms are small, but that was totally expected and part of what makes it affordable. Things I loved: staff were so friendly and let me check in early and then kept my bag for me after checkout while I did some sightseeing; the coffee shop common area is so charming and inviting; free (Good!) coffee in the morning and reasonably price coffee shop breakfast items; Daniel who works in the coffee shop went absolutely above and beyond (making me a drink after closing, even going down to the basement for fresh ice) and even remembered my name the next day; cleanliness was great; late night front desk person got me a cup of hot water for my tea bags. I would absolutely stay here again, especially since I didn't get to enjoy the rooftop bar this visit due to the crazy air quality from the fires in Canada. Next time!

title: Clean room, small as Pod is known, location is good but not the best for the Pod chain
text: Hotel room is small but I already knew this when I booked it, it was my first time staying at a solo pod, and considering I went to the hotel only to sleep, it was ok. Staff was nice and room was clean. I was in doubt if I’d stay at Pod 39 or Pod Times Square, I’ve been to the Times Square hotel before and ended up choosing 39 cause it was cheaper but I probably would’ve chosen the Times Square now just because of location. Pod 39 has a nice location (few blocks from Grand Central) but after I got back to my room at night I was lazy to go out to Times Square to eat for example cause it’s not that close so if you think you may want to go to Times Square almost every night, I’d choose Pod Times Square.

title: Excelente Ubicacion y staff muy amable
text: El hotel esta ubicado en lugar centrico, y buen sitio...tranquilo para llegar de noche caminando. Habitaciones sencillas y pequeñas, buena calefaccion y hermeticas (silenciosas)  pero con todo lo necesario para un viaje de turismo.... es decir para llegar y dormir! .. me pareció excelente que en el 1er piso hubiera salon con  dispensadores de Cafe gratis y venta de croissants y bagels con cierta variedad para tomar un rapido y sencillo desayuno antes de salir (para mi mas que suficiente!) , lastima que no pude subir al Rooftop piso 17, en ninguno de los 5 dias que estuve... pues llegaba sin energias y solo queria dormir! ... En resumen :  EXCELENTE RELACION CALIDAD - PRECIO,  lo recomiendo!

title: All good
text: No issues. Clean room, good price, and a great location for me. I stay at this location every time I travel to New York City. You won't find a better stay for the price. Be ready for a small room but if all you need is s place to sleep and shower this is the best bargain in town.

title: Excellent
text:
Very clean and confortable bed. Was not noisy at all. Had a good night sleep. Rooftop terrace and bar really nice. 
The staff was very friendly and they were able to offer us early check-in. 
Highly recommend it!

title: A great place to stay if you want to explore NYC
text: I was waiting to enter a lame usual hotel, when the personal of lobby told us about all the amenities the hotel had I was amazed. Loved the rooftop and the play room. It's a great place to stay for people that like to have fun

title: Great location, lovely staff
text: Received a warm welcome, rooms were nice and clean, bathroom with a view of the ESB! Shower was nice and hot, flow of water really great. Complimentary coffee and tea, nice breakfast selection. Very friendly and helpful staff. Overall, we had a great experience.

title: Great for a short stay
text:
We stayed for 4 nights in a room with a queen bed - as we didn’t stay in the room for long it was ok for our purposes.  The room was compact with not a lot of room to get around the bed and into the bathroom so if you plan to spend time there it may not be for you.  The bathroom is pretty much right next to the bed with glass sliding doors - if you’re not used to seeing or hearing each other in the bathroom that may be a bit awkward!!  The room was extremely clean, housekeeping replenished towels every day and the bathroom was very modern and clean.  Shower was pretty powerful.  The roof top bar was a nice touch being able to see the skyline whilst enjoying a cocktail and beer - if you stand in the
corner on the roof you can see the Empire State Building which is a great sight.  Grand Central Station is just a 4-5 minute walk away giving you easy access to trains across the city.  The Empire State Building, Rockefeller Centre, Chrysler Building are all just a 20 minute or so walk away too.  The reception staff were all really welcoming, friendly and helpful.  They allowed people to leave their cases there on checking out so that you could explore the city on your last day of your flight wasn’t until late.  They were also able to book a taxi to the airport with a recommended company who charged less than a yellow cab, Uber or Lyft.

title: Pod 39
text:
Very nice stay. All the staff helpful and friendly from main desk to bar, cafe,and room cleaners. Comfortable room, double bed  with a lagre shower - wc and basin plus safe/table and chair etc.
Cafe area had breakfast area and lougue area for your free tea and coffee plus pool table and 2 table tennis rooms.

title: Stay in the heart of the Big Apple
text: A wonder location with basic but clean accommodations. Everything you need from an open space to hang, and a rooftop with a view. I am a regular here. Bus from Newark Airport drops you off just around the corner.

title: Amazing!!!
text: Jenae was the absolute best. She was adorable, kind and very sweet. I hope she’s at the front desk next time I check in. Also, Daniel at the restaurant was very hospitable and was giving me every possible option to eat and drink. I love this boutique hotel vibe, it makes it more intimate and close experience. I recommend this Pod 39 100%. Also, the rooftop is cozy and beautiful.

title: Great location. Near Grand central & you can start planning your day/stay from there.
text: Great stay in NYC this time around. The booking site suggested attractions nearby & that’s how I planned my stay. Close to restaurants: Chinese fusion, Italian. There’s a great pizza location near the corner of 39th & Lexington ave. The only thing was my cab fare from LGA $90 & from hotel was only $55 (yes, plus tip.

title: Perfectly designed “pod” rooms
text: You expect a small room as a pod. The efficient design, a roomy bathroom, all the necessary amenities, and window views all make the room feel bigger than it is. The friendly and helpful staff (and the free morning coffee) make one feel at home. The well-serviced rooms are sparkling clean.

title: Fab hotel, staff & location
text: Fab location, within walking distance of empire state and 42nd street. Clean room & very comfy beds. We had a great sleep each night. My 12 year old son said the shower was the best he’s ever been in. Staff so helpful. Jenae on reception was lovely, very friendly, couldn’t do enough for us. Definitely recommend especially for a single parent with a pre teen/teenager. Roof top bar provides superb views.

title: Good located
text: We had a nice stay in this modern and clean accomondation. It is simple, but we got everything wie needed during our vaccation in Manhattan. The Hotel is very good located (5 min walk) to Grand central station.

title: Fantastic
text:
I’ve stayed in a pod room in UK before and it was not nearly as good as this place.
The room was very comfortable with enough space to put 2 large suitcases out of the way. There is additional storage under the bed too.
We stayed here for 4 nights and didn’t feel claustrophobic at all as you don’t come to NYC to stay in your room all day! It’s perfect as somewhere to sleep.
It has a great cafe downstairs with free coffee and a water dispenser to refill your water bottles. 
Under 10 minutes walk to Grand Central subway and plenty bars and cafe within a block.
I’d definitely stay here again

title: Totally overpriced!
text: Tiny, old, dirty room for a crazy amount of money. It is near Grant Central but that is the only positive point about this Hotel. The Rooms are Tiny and badly designed and have its best times behind. I recommend to visit another city: New York is overrated.

title: Helpfull staff and great beds
text: The staff in front desk is very helpfull and help you with. Very clean room and great housekeeper. Many good food places and deli right at the door. Good bed and great bathroom. Only negative was that med AC made som fan noise if if turned of from time to time.

title: Ok
text: It was close to grand central which made me save a lot of time traveling around the NYC. The window that’s attached inside the shower room didn’t open, which prevented me from letting hot steam out of the shower room and the entire room. I had to keep my bedside window open for an hour before bed to make sure it wasn’t too humid and the fire alarm wouldn’t go on. Also, upon arrival, I didn’t get any instructions about the rooftop bar and 1st floor guest drink services. I recommend bringing beach sandals because they don’t have slippers.

title: Good value
text: The room was small but we didn’t stay in it that much to care.  The hotel was close to grand central and getting around the city was easy.  The bathrooms have frosted glass which is awkward.  The room was quieter than I anticipated in the city.

title: Very convenient location to stay at.  Close to everything New York City offers
text: We enjoyed our stay there very much.  Location is within walking distance to most nyc attractions, grand central station, coffee houses, and restaurants. Room we selected was compact but has all you need. service was great. No issues whatsoever.

title: Buena opción, sin lujos
text: Muy buena ubicación y limpieza. Aunque habitaciones pequeñas y sin vistas. El grifo de la ducha es fijo. Podrían poner algún complemento en el baño (peine, gorro (que es necesario si ni quieres mojarte el pelo)…)

title: The best
text:
Best experience super clean really great value my room was really cozy the cafe place was really good too
I really recommend this hotel I’ll definitely stay there again as I do before you can stay by yourself and with other

title: Convenient, comfortable and good value
text: If you don't mind a relatively small room and a semi-see-through, sliding door to the en-suite bathroom, this is a great place to stay. It's well located, comfortable, modern and (for Manhattan) good value. The staff are extremely courteous, friendly and helpful. Included wifi, complimentary tea/coffee, gym use and luggage storage facilities are valuable bonuses for the inevitable, but in this case relatively well-priced, facility fee.

title: Reasonable, good location hotel. You can enjoy breakfast and coffee time in Pod cafe
text:
Reasonable, good location hotel. 
You can enjoy your breakfast and free coffee in Pod cafe.
Near Pod 39, there are convenience store and starbucks which opens early morning.
You can help yourself to the breakfast  by using them.

title: *****FANTASTICA ESPERIENZA*****
text:
Hotel in zona centralissima, stanze dall’arredamento Minimal e capienti per il necessario di un viaggio di una settimana.
Pulizie della stanza e cambio asciugamani garantito giornalmente.
Staff giovanile, cordiale e simpatico.
Al primo piano troverete Bar, con Caffè e acqua gratis, e biliardo e Ping pong per intrattenervi durante l’attesa della colazione.
Consiglio di visitare la Bellissima terrazza all’ultimo piano ad ora aperitivo per godere dello spettacolare skyline newyorkese.
Prezzo al di sotto della media di Midtown.
Hotel super consigliato!

title: Great location, comfortable
text: Though price is too high, has exactly what you need in NYC. Rooms very very small, but good for what you need: rest and shower. Room cleaned up everyday, good sleep. Hopefully there will be an option to avoid changing towels every day. Jenae was very kind

title: Preis Leistungsverhältnis top!
text:
Hotel ist 5 min vom Grand Central entfernt. Zimmer sind sauber nur etwas klein aber damit lässt es sich leben. 
Die Mitarbeiter des Hotels sind immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Kann ich nur weiterempfehlen

title: Great value for a quick, no frills stay
text: I needed to stay overnight in the city and didn't want to pay ridiculous prices ($500-600+) for a clean room that I was basically not spending a lot of time in. The Pod 39 is always a great option for this -- a clean room, a private bath, no frills and everything you need (hairdryer, tv, digital safe, toiletries, free WiFi). There's a game room/bar/lounge on the ground floor as well as a beautiful rooftop bar. Would stay again and would recommend.

title: Muy buena experiencia
text:
Todo muy comodo, habitación pequeña pero ubicacion perfecta.
Cafe con leche gratuito y zonas comunes maravillosas (billar, ping pong, 4 en raya…)
Te puedes traer comida de fuera y comertela allí, perfecto para esos dias que necesitas un descanso

title: Excellent location, clean and modern hotel
text:
Small pods, ideal for couples 
There's also a rooftop and a bar, a café to eat breakfast and they have a deal with a parking lot nearby.
Excellent location, clean and modern hotel
The staff is very friendly and helpful

title: Uncomfortable
text:
The room was tiny, without ventilation. Very uncomfortable. There was no wardrobe in the room. 
We couldn't get the clothes out of the suitcase in 9 days...
The location was nice and the common spaces are fine.

title: Great hotel, great location, great staff
text:
Had a great time here. The hotel is in a great location for getting around, very close to Grand Central, great location for seeing the city - midway between the main touristy sights and the restaurants and bars in the East Village; and there are plenty of great places nearby a great breakfast. Also very easy to get to from JFK by using the Airtrain and Subway.

I booked a Full Pod for one person. Rooms are absolutely spotless, and the house-keeping staff always had a cheery greeting in the mornings. Bathroom has shampoo, body wash, and also hair conditioner which a lot of hotels tend not to have, and plenty of towels and face cloths.

Staff are very welcoming. There's a lovely rooftop bar too, cocktails and bar snacks. Shout out to our waiter Mark. My friend and I did end up in Hell's Kitchen till the very early hours of the morning! You only live once!

Would definitely stay here again.

title: Best Deal in NYC
text: The location was absolutely awesome! No frills hotel but still some perks, like great housekeeping, lobby and breakfast/coffee area and also a great rooftop outside bar! The front desk staff was also great!

title: Great location and good value
text:
For my 9 days stay in NY the Pod 39 Hotel was well located with walking distance to Newark Airport Shuttle bus at the Grand Central Station. Staff were always very friendly at the reception and restaurant
I can recommend the place and would stay here again when traveling again to NY.

title: Great stay! Small rooms, but that’s fine since you’re only here to sleep, the bed and shower are of a perfect size.
text:
Nice hotel with friendly staff in a great location for a city trip, close to many sightseeing destinations which you can visit walking or taking the subway (Grand Central Station is the closest stop). The rooms are very small, but since you’re only there to sleep it’s fine. The bed and shower size are large enough so that’s nice. Clean rooms, a nice rooftop bar, coffee and tea in the morning are included and there is a possibility to buy breakfast such as bagels or a yoghurt and granola.

Definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Great!
text:
Perfect for what we needed. Bed was comfortable. Room was clean. Location was great. And to anyone complaining about noise… I found my room to be quiet… but, it’s NYC….. Pack earplugs or ask the front desk for a pair and get over it. 
The best part about our stay, above everything, was the staff. Absolutely wonderful. In particular Aneka at the front desk. Thank you Aneka. So kind. So professional in every way. And so helpful.

title: Pleased to have stayed
text: loved everything about this hotel. Staff was warm and caring. Not just front desk workers, but also cleaning staff, and security.  The rooftop terrace was a perfect place to enjoy my morning coffee. From there you can see so much of the city.

title: My stay
text: This hotel room was cheap and had a decent priced security deposit nothing crazy. But like I said for the price it was amazing and the lady at the front desk was very helpful and speedy with helping customers.

title: Returning as soon as possible!
text: From the moment we checked in with KJ to checkout with Christine, our stay at Pod 39 was outstanding. The staff is so friendly, lovely breakfast bar and lounge; and of course super clean and sweet rooms, elegantly appointed. The rooftop bar is the cherry on top. Thanks lovely staff, for a great weekend getaway!  We will return soon!

title: Nice hotel with convenient location
text: Easy to get from airport (shuttle goes to grand central). Fast check in/check out - I was processed in 10 seconds. Clean rooms. Cozy Cafe inside with free coffee in the morning. Awesome bar at rooftop. I had overall great experience at this hotel.

title: Quick Stay
text: This was a delightful spot to stay in for a quick business trip. Very clean and quiet. Pretty perfect. This building is placed in the heart of everything you want from the city. Commuting around town through Uber or walking is a breeze. Would love to come back and stay once again with my wife in the future.

title: 5 days in NY
text: Small rooms but comfortable and very clean, bed nice and relaxing. Perfect location in central Manhattan. Good experience and in case I will go back to NY probably I will choose again this hotel. Not much more to say.

title: The room a size of shoebox
text: I have stayed in Pod before but in this one, the rooms are extremely small. I mean SMALL, TINY. Size of a shoebox. E.g. you cannot walk around without bumping into something every time you move. There is not even any place to put your suitcase. I even went to the reception and ask if this was the correct room size. Probably will avoid in the future. However, the staff was extremely helpful and kind

title: NYC
text:
Wonderful place, excellent.  Friendly helpful staff. Great location, extremely clean and comfortable!
Everything you need is there.  Value for money.
I will be staying again when in NYC!
Fantastic hotel !

title: Super leuk hotel op toplocatie!
text: Met mijn dochter een week naar New York geweest en in POD39 verbleven. Heerlijke hotel, kleine maar gezellige kamer, leuk ingericht, lekker bed met 2 kussens pp en een fantastische regendouche. Kluis op de kamer was ook fijn. Grand central om de hoek net als Starbucks en le pain om te ontbijten (kan ook prima in het hotel maar wij vonden de stad leuker). We zouden er zo weer gaan slapen!

title: Excellent
text: Very attentive staff, room with comfortable bed, hot shower, good sized, adequate and great location, close to Grand Central, restaurants and grocery store on the corner. Special thanks to Christine who helped us a lot. Thank you very much.

title: Efficient excellence
text: Exactly as advertised. Clean and functional in a great location. The space is tight but once you figure out how to move through it you can manage. Perfect for no frills solo travel. Couples may have some trouble moving around one another.

title: Très agréable
text:
L’hôtel est très bien placé, la vue du rooftop est incroyable, les chambres sont très propres et silencieuses. Contrairement à d’autres hôtels, la température est réglable. La literie est très confortable et tout le personnel de l’hôtel sympathique. La salle commune est parfaite également.
Alors oui, les chambres sont petites mais c’est écrit dans le nom… et elles sont très bien agencées ! 

Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir !

title: Perfect place to stay
text:
Clean and comfortable. Cleaning crew did a wonderful job so out room felt welcoming every day we came back to the room. With regards to the prize of the stay I felt we definitely got good value - breakfast wasn't included but free coffee every morning and a good selection to choose from in the café was absolutely good enough. 
Best of all was maybe the location. Perfectly situated near Grand Central and within walking distance from a lot of the citys major landmarks. Perfect. 
I would definitely come stay again.

title: It’s more than a small room
text: The hotel is highly recommended despite the extremely small room.  Its location, hotel style and all the staff gave us an unforgettable experience.  A bit noisy, but we arrived so tired that we appreciated the comfortable bed and good pillows.  Cozi Playroom Lounge with free morning tea and coffee.  Receives up to 4 standard-size packages and you can drop off bags after checkout.

title: Cool. Clean & Cozy.
text: Would definitely recommend to friends and family traveling to NY. Perfect sized room for my one night stay. TVs are slightly small. Bathrooms are immaculate. Bed was just the right size for me, 6’1. Taller folks would hang over edge of bed.

title: Super
text: Parfaite expérience - bonne localisation - chambre petite mais pratique -  espaces commun superbes et conviviaux - je recommande cet établissement qui a un bon rapport qualité prix pour Manhattan- nettoyage tous les jours de la chambre

title: Small Room, Great Location
text: This is probably the smallest hotel room I've ever stayed... But the location is wonderful! You can find anything you need within walking distance. Airport express bus stop is only a couple of blocks away. And the price is affordable compared to similar hotel in Midtown. Recommended!

title: Great location,clean,comfortable
text:
Great location, two blocks from Chrysler buidling and Grand central station, 10-12 minutes from Times Square by foot. 
Rooms was small (but hey it's NY) but you have everything you need, everything is super clean, bed is really comfortable, fast free wi-fi, TV and room service everyday (if you want).
Free coffe in hotel bar every morning from 06:00am to 11:00am! 
You don't need something bigger if you are into exploring city and having a good sleep in the evening there.
Keep in mind, because of your finances, that they will reserve damage deposit from your bank account when you arrive, but when you check out they will give it back to you (it needs 4-5 bussines days to be back on your bank account). Lot's of hotels doesn't give you back damage deposit in the end in NY, but I had no problems with Pod 39.👏🏻

title: Many thanks
text: Thank you to the man who takes care of the breakfast for his smile every morning, and his good humor. Thanks also to the maid for her responsiveness to make the diaper and the change of towel even if we don't ask for it. Finally, thank you also to the reception for their welcome and smile every day.

title: Nice, but it has its price
text: The room was modern and clean, the staff friendly. Breakfast options are good, coffee for free. However, 150 a night is bold for the small room size. I know it’s an old building in Manhattan and the location near grand central was amazing but if we had larger suitcases than just our carry-ons, they wouldn’t have fitted into the room at all. We couldn’t open both our suitcases at the same time because the room was so small and we were constant tripping over the ladder to the upper bunk bed. Nevertheless, I enjoyed my stay here and would recommend the hotel.

title: Great experience
text: Pod 39 provides a comfortable stay and excellent location. Beds are comfortable, there’s complimentary coffee in the morning. Jenae and other staff members were super helpful, we were able to store our luggage at the hotel. The only detail that slightly bothered us was the bedroom carpeting which was a bit smelly. All in all, I recommend it as a nice comfortable stay close to the city centre

title: Excellent surprise
text: I liked it very much: confortable, clean, well located, and employees are very friendly and helpful. Special mention to Jeane. I highly recommend pod39. I hope to return soon and would surely go to pod39

title: Great location!
text: I was in NYC so I was willing to overlook the fact that the bar was closed for repairs. The room was comfortable and I appreciated the hotel was quiet. I recommend the Pod hotels if you’re not fussy and space.

title: Small and convenient
text: Excellent for a single travel, rooms are small but convenient. Staff friendly and helpful. Excellent location and they added the breakfast service, which was also very good. A highly convenient place for short stays in the city.

title: Great deal
text: The Pod hotel was an excellent price for a tiny very clean, quiet room. The best part was the ping pong tables! No frills but everything we needed. Staff was very nice. Free coffee. Mattress was a little to soft

title: Very nice
text: The hotel has a great location with lots of stores, shops, etc. in easy walking distance. It also had a lot of convenient accommodations perfect for a solo traveler. I will be returning again next month.

title: Perfect Location
text: I had a great stay at Pod39. the Staff is very friendly and polite and the position of the hotel is perfect - really close to Gran Central Station and Lexington Avenue. The rooms are very clean. Good breakfast service.

title: Ubicación excelente
text: Un hotel con una ubicación excelente. Muy limpio y con un buen servicio. La habitación pequeña pero suficiente para estar bien. La ducha muy buena aunque es de alcachofa fija. Productos de aseo, champú, gel y acondicionador.

title: Great place for travel with a teenager.
text: Good location, nice clean comfortable room, well designed common area and twin bunk was perfect for our travel needs.We were too busy seeing NY to use the pool/ table tennis table!. Only issue was the bathroom was visually discrete but not soundproof from the sleeping area.

title: You have great employees:Jenae, kjay, Brian
text: I would like to comment on your incredible staff. I would like to emphasize some of your employees who helped us enjoy our time at your hotel, kjay, Brian, David( I think, he's new) and most especially jenae.

title: Consigliato
text: Ottima posizione e caffè disponibile gratuitamente tutte le mattine. Stanze piccole ma funzionali e pulite ogni giorno.  Noi ci siamo trovati molto bene,soprattutto per la vicinanza a grand central. Peccato il rooftop non disponibile

title: Parfait
text:
Hôtel très bien situé proche de Grand Central.
Excellent rapport qualité / prix. 
Propre, personnel très sympathique.
La chambre capsule petite mais était parfaite pour notre séjour avec mon fils. Je recommande.

title: Love it!!
text: Great location! I was there for 7 nights. Clean room cleaning crew are friendly, they did a great job maintaining this hotel! Customer service was wonderful! They make sure there guests have water to enjoy. I will stayed there again.

title: Honeymoon stay
text: The hotel staff were very friendly and let us check in early. Coffee is free between 7-11am. Location is great as it is close to a lot of the attractions like times square being a 20 minute walk away. However we booked the hotel for the rooftop bar and restaurant which was closed during our stay. This isn't stated on the website. We would have booked elsewhere had we known. The rooms are very small which wouldn't be a problem but it is very difficult for two people to move around the room with ease. The bathroom is completely see through and only a quarter of the glass is glazed over but you can pretty much see everything of you are using the toilet. You have to be completely comfortable with the guest you are sharing with and even then you would still expect to have some privacy when using the bathroom. We wouldn't stay at this hotel again. It's ok if you are only staying for a couple of days but wouldn't stay for any longer than two days.

title: Good and clean but room very small
text: We’ve bien there for 4 nights. Althougt de alero well becáis e there were no mouse, the room was very small, it was a sad surprise since in the photos that is not appreciate. For the rest it was a good location and clean.

title: Great Location and staff
text: Murray Hill is an excellent location in NY for solo travellers and all.  There aren't any loud sirens at night, and you can easier feel a window open. The staff at Pod 39 Hotel are accommodating and friendly, and the manager is hands-on in helping out—great area for breakfast with a mixed of selections available to buy.  The rooms are small, but you have everything you need.

title: Amazing stay
text: I absolutely highly recommend. From the friendly, helpful staff to the delicious breakfast and complimentary coffee/tea every day, this place truly embodies excellent customer service and prioritizing guests

title: Very good, cool, easy to get to,
text: The Roof Top Bar was closed, a lot of young people, coming from different countries.Cool Design. A good Place to come down in such an exciting place like New York. Very good cup of tea Ort coffee for free

title: 8 nights in New York
text:
I stayed in a single room with a private bath. The room was small (as advertised) but it had everything I needed. My room was quiet at night. Free coffee and tea in the morning. 
I also recommend the free walking tours. I booked one and I liked it very much.
I would definitely book a room at Pod 39 again when I am back in New York.

title: A Little Gem
text: The queen room is only slightly larger than the bed, but it had what we needed. If you need a luxury space, look elsewhere. If you need a clean and quiet place to sleep, this is the place. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Perfect !!!
text: POD39 provided exactly what I needed for my trip to NYC: a clean, safe, quiet room near public transportation. POD39 is near Grand Central Station and multiple bus stops. Grocery stores are 2-3 blocks away. Staff arranged a private car to the airport after my week of exploring Central Park, the High Line, Little Island, Pier 57, the Seaport District, and several Broadway shows. POD39 is perfect - I will return!

title: Great location and clean room
text: Great service and very nice staff ! Walking distance to all the visiting side, metro station near. Room very clean and good amenities. Coffee and breakfast in the morning provide. Nice seating area in the lobby. Thank all for an amazing  stay!

title: The Best Hotel Staff in NYC
text:
I stay here often for work. During my last visit, the hotel was extremely busy, and the lobby was full of tourists. Despite the hectic environment, Jenae went above and beyond, and kindly accommodated my request for a late check out so that I could hold an important zoom meeting from the quiet of my room. 

The staff at Pod39 always brings a rare and elevated level of hospitality and kindness. I wouldn't think of staying anywhere else.

title: Budget Friendly Options & Convenient
text:
I have stayed at both Pod hotels in the city, I definitely recommend if you don’t mind smaller rooms. Budget friendly options if needed. (Bunks & shared bathrooms) Staff was friendly, nice atmosphere, & convenient.
If you are staying for more than a day, I suggest purchasing a styrofoam cooler (I would say bring your own cooler but that’s not easy) as there was no refrigerator in ours (queen pod with private bathroom). Breakfast options were decent, I really enjoyed the yogurt parfait. The rooftop is under construction at the moment.

title: Vero good experiance
text:
Ottimo hotel. Posizione centralissima e comoda per visitare la città come per spostarsi al di fuori di new york. Le camere sono molto piccole ed essenziali ma ben tenute e pulite. 
Comodissima la zona ospiti dove poter fare colazione con acquisti diretti al bar e/o con cibo acquistato fuori

title: Queen room highly recommended
text: Room really is not that small, good light and views from windows, good value.  First night we stayed in bunk-bed room, which I do not recommend for anyone anywhere near retirement age (we are past that age and it was a bit difficult to maneuver ).

title: Perfect location at nice price!
text: Absolutely gorgeous hotel, and I design style we really liked. The location is perfectly located close to central station. The stuff is really friendly and everything worked out perfectly. I highly recommend it.

title: Parfait !
text:
L’hôtel est idéalement situé pour visiter New-York. L'accueil est chaleureux et l'espace commun agréable.
Très bon rapport qualité prix. Avec une chambre petite mais très bien optimisée et  très propre.

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text:
Great place to stay in NYC, perfect for solo traveller, Nice for 2 but no more.
Even 2 you have to be very close because the room is quite small
Don't bring big suitcase....
Solo traveller with cabin bag : perfect
Shakeshack, Starbucks at the corner

title: Exactly what we needed
text: This clean and reasonably priced hotel is just what you need if you are here to explore the city and only need a hotel room for showering and sleeping. My daughter and I had a great stay! We dropped off our bags easily before the room was ready and had a great time exploring the city.

title: Stay 24-30 March
text:
Very convenient and central location. Friendly and very forthcoming staff. 
My son and I slept well in our bunk bed room, despite the room being quite noisy (we heard the neighbors and a machine) and with no daylight. The room was really small and there is only one chair although the room is in principle foreseen for 2 people.

title: A great hotel for people with sleep issues
text: Ask for a room that's not next to an elevator and not on the street side. It was one of the quietest hotels I've stayed at for many years. I'm wearing earplugs regardless but there was no big noise that woke me up.

title: Great Location with excellent Customer Service
text:
We have just finished our 6 days stay at Pod 39 

I found all the staff to go above and beyond when dealing with all hotel guest , nothing was too much trouble 

The check in especially by frankie was fast and he clearly explained the hotel policy when it came to the hotel tax. 

He was also very helpful when we needed direction for a store we were looking for over in soho telling us what tubes to take and where to go once we got off.

The rooms were spotless with bed made each day and clean towels left daily 

The was few minutes walk to grand Central Station and other underground stations 

Well done Frankie & all the staff for making our trip enjoyable,  we will definitely be back .

Regards

Phil Burke
Criag Butterworth 
Lee Freeman

title: Loved this hotel
text: Super clean, comfortable and silent despite being small. The service was superb, especially Jenae at the front desk. Everyone made an effort to understand us even though our English was not perfect. Would recommend and visit again!

title: Perfect hotel
text: Pod 39 Hotel is perfect. Location and rooms are perfect. Personal was good, Rooms are small but complete and clean. Meeting room was nice, Free tea and coffee in the morning great! We had a great time in New York.

title: Great hotel near from Gran Central subway station
text:
Great hotel near from Gran Central subway station, High recommended 
Good place to stay. Very clean. I prefer booked with private restroom. 
At the small restaurant during breakfast time you can meet people from all over the world.

title: Great hotel for solo travellers
text: Pod39 is a great hotel for solo travellers, especially those on business or attending conferences. The rooms are small but spacious enough for a person travelling alone. The staff are friendly and helpful and the location is good.

title: A perfect convenient choice.
text:
I selected Pod39 for its proximity to many of the attractions in NYC and Grand Central Station.
Needing just somewhere to crash after a busy day, this hotel fitted the bill perfectly.
I had a bunk Pod, for my son and I, which was essentially a bunk bed in a room with a table and a bathroom with shower and sink. There's a safe for your valuables etc so you don't need to take them with you.
Despite its smaller dimensions there was easily enough room for us to share, it was clean and tidy and well maintained.
The room was serviced every day and quiet through the night. 
The staff were helpful, friendly and even looked after our cases after checkout during our last day. 
I'd highly recommend it.

title: Great place for short-term, no frills stay
text: Good value for the money, but don't expect lots of extras. Rooms are small, but functional and well-designed. Easy walk to Grand Central Station and anywhere in mid-town. Lots of places to eat within just a few blocks.

title: Excelente hotel. Volveremos
text:
Una visita muy agradable, el personal muy amoroso y atento.
Nos encanto el cafe y el agua gratis! 
La habitación pequeña pero cómoda . Excelentes almohadas.  Todo muy limpio. 
No pudimos disfrutar de la teraza por el frío pero no nos impidió disfrutar.

title: Massive post-pandemic disappointment
text: Extremely rude staff. My third time here (first time post-pandemic), and I cant believe the current receptionists (not all, but more than one) are working in hospitality and guest service. Such a shame, I stayed in Pod twice in 2019 and had only good experiences before this trip.

title: Pod 39 stay
text: The stay at Pod 39 was great. The service was good. The room was clean. The location was perfect. The free morning coffee was appreciated. Overall, it was value for money in comparison with other hotels in the same area.

title: Clean and great location
text: First time staying at the POD39.  Loved the communal feel and location.  Easy access to Grand Central station.  Walking distance to 42nd street (in good weather). Efficient and clean rooms.
