Cleaning staff was great. Oh, almost forgot to mention, they have great pastries for sale from 7a-11a and coffee is always free. The bed was ok.

title: Great place
text: The location in the core of Manhattan is perfect to enjoy the best of New York. You can walk everywhere or take the subway. Rooms are essential but clean and comfortable. It's very quiet during the night. There is a cozy lobby where you can sit drinking coffee for free in the morning. The staff is incredibly helpful. They let me in with my cat even though they usually accept only dogs. Moreover, they helped me out with everything. I will definitely come back.

title: Best for light travellers
text:
Lovely spot in midtown and walking distance to centre of city. Of course the room size is small but it is very comfortable if you are anyway going to be out and about. 

I will highly recommend it if you are a looking for in a budget place.

title: Awesome hotel
text: I stay at pod 39 almost every week and I love it. Great price, location, clean room and friendly staff - what else do you need?! 😄 I recommend this place to all my friends and colleagues. Elevator is safe and quiet, clean white sheets, awesome hot shower with great pressure.

title: Hotel in ottima posizione, camere minuscole ma dotate di tutto il necessario
text:
Hotel nel cuore di Manhattan. Le camere si presentano pulite ma davvero piccole: ci stà, è come ce le si aspetta dando uno sguardo al sito.
La camera è dotata di bagno privato, con ottima doccia e kit doccia shampoo.
Nella hall dell’hotel si può consumare gratuitamente dell’acqua. 
Per brevi soggiorni turistici senza troppe pretese, dove si torna in camera solo per dormire, all’ora l’hotel POD 39 è quel che fa per voi. 
Unica pecca: la tassa resort di 20$ (ma poic resort de che?) che fanno pagare , molte volte non inclusa nella tariffa venduta dalle agenzie online come ad es nel mio caos Hotels.com

title: Good location, clean, dynamic decoration
text:
The hotel is very pretty. The rooms have everything you need. 
 The café downstairs is very nice. The main downpoint is the difficulty to get quality sleep dur to a very loud heating system. The building is historical so they can't do anything about it, but I had difficulty to get any sleep due to the loid vibration of heating systems in the rooms around and I had to turn off mine.

title: Great Stay
text:
Stayed with family for 4 nights.
Very clean and comfortable beds.Staff very friendly. Rooms are small but I wasn’t spending all day in my room , I was out site seeing.
Nice quiet area and close to shops and restaurants.
The communal area is lovely. They serve coffee until 11 and have water available for filling up your bottles.
I would definitely recommend and stay here again.

title: POD 39 in New York
text:
Location is quite good. Staff is nice, polite and willing to help

Hotel facilities is not adequate to a 4 star hotel: 

1 - It is necessary to include a restaurant and service room.
2 - Room is quite small. 

No more comments.

title: It's cheap for a reson. Just go somewhere else.
text: I was not looking for luxury. Just a base to crash. But the bed was terribly uncomfortable. The mattress/box spring was just shot. The bedding is super cheap and poor quality. There was industrial machinery running on the floor below that made the floor shake all night. The metal blinds rattled all night. The HVAC system sounded like it was repurposed from an old soviet tank it was so loud. Maintenance started drilling and hammering on the walls in adjacent rooms/hallways before sunrise. A thoroughly miserable stay.

title: A great little hotel and great value for money!
text: I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to travel to New York on a budget. The rooms were cleaned every day, very basic but just what we needed as we spent most of our time exploring anyway. The beds were very comfy. Our only problem was that it was slightly out of the way but the extra 10/15 mins walk didn’t matter at all when you take into account how little we paid for the hotel. Don’t hesitate just book! The cheapest hotel you will get in New York and the best value for money.

title: Good
text: Good location, Nice staff.goog location, Nice staff. Good location, Nice staff.good location. Nice staff. Good location, Nice staff. Good location, Nice staff. Good location. Nice staff. Good location . Nice staff.

title: Convenient Hotel, but double charged
text: The staff were friendly and helpful during our stay, and the rooms were cleaned to a high standard every day. However, I paid for the room and the damage deposit on arrival, and had to make another payment for the room when checking out. I was told the first payment I'd made had just been an authorisation, but this isn't possible as this is the payment I made so my damage deposit could be held by the hotel and returned after my departure. I thought this was a good hotel to stay at, but some more knowledge and reassurance that I'd at least receive the second amount for the room rate back with my damage deposit would have been appreciated as this is now causing quite a bit of stress at the end of what had been a pleasant experience.

title: Best Pod in NYC
text: Stay at this Pod location;  enjoy the amenities and location; clean rooms; friendly staff - I highly recommend this hotel and have stayed here several times!  The coffee/breakfast room with ping pong, billiards, and lots of space is great.

title: Ottimo Hotel di design
text: Ottimo Hotel di design: le camere sono nuove e ben pensate nonostante non siano molto grandi. Tutto è "incastrato" efficacemente e la differenza si vede subito. Letto ottimo e soprattutto doccia ottima, i due unici aspetti che considero. La zona è top, Murray Hill è perfetta per visitare Manhattan. Hanno il servizio di deposito dei bagagli per l'ultimo giorno, gratis, fondamentale per molti.

title: Great location, excellent value for money
text: Smooth and fast check-in; the room was cleaned daily, with no funny smells; size wise it's small but the room is fully functional, I particularly liked the bathroom set-up; for this, and the location (midtown, close to Grand Central and the UN), and price point, I highly recommend this hotel for business trips.

title: Tiny Room
text:
the room is very small. It is not even possible to open a big suitcase in the room.
O quarto é muito pequeno. Não é possível sequer abrir uma mala grande no quarto.
Embora seja barato para os padrões de nova york o quarto é ofensivamente pequeno demais.

title: Great value
text: Small or even tiny room but perfect pied-a-terre to explore the city. Super close to grand Central Terminal which make it super convenient. Free coffee and tea in the morning which is nice, nice rooftop

title: Nice stay and great location
text: To anyone who wants to visit Manhantan i definitelly recommend to stay here, the staff is wonderful, helpful and kind, the location is perfect just a couple block from central station, the room are quite clean all the time, the space on the rooms it’s just enough to rest, the beds are great I had good sleep every night.

title: New York 2023
text: Lovely hotel in a great location. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Room was clean and an ideal place to rest our heads after a hectic day of sightseeing. The bed was really comfortable. The room was a lot smaller than we expected. We did know it would be small but it really was tiny. We didn’t actually spend a lot of time in the room so this wasn’t too much of an issue, but getting ready in the morning was a bit of a squash!! And not a lot of storage for our belongings. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would return.

title: Genial ubicación y comodidad!
text: El Hotel está a tan solo tres manzanas de la quinta avenida! La cama es muy cómoda el servicio es muy bueno y muy amable. El café es gratis de 7am a 11am. y en el Checkout guardan las maletas hasta las 11pm. Si algún día vuelvo repetiré la estancia!

title: Wonderful stay
text: My stay at Pod 39 exceeded my expectations! Value for money in a great location with friendly staff and comfortable single room. I will return to stay again for sure! Don't miss to get your coffee and go to the rooftop and enjoy the magnificent views.

title: super location
text:
Pod’s location is great, everything is clean and the breakfast concept is very nice (free coffee). 
Our room was cleaned everyday and the bathroom too! 
the only little problem was a strange sound that every night was disturbing our sleep ;(((

title: Great option!
text: Booked a room at Pod 39 for a mother/daughter (6 y/o) trip and it was a great option. Very conveniently located in midtown with quick access to Grand Central and other transportation and destination options. The common spaces were comfortable and equipped with games, seating, etc. The bed was comfortable and the hallways were surprisingly quiet! Definitely recommend for those travelers who don't need the pomp of a nice hotel but a comfortable and convenient spot to sleep.

title: A good moment in a comfortable hotel
text: We love the place.The rooms are very functional and they have to spend a good moment playing pool or ping pong in the lobby.I would like to go again someday.Thank you very much I will recomend you with my friends

title: Great for a get away
text:
Why pay for hotel space that you aren't using? POD 39 was perfect when all you need is a bed and a bath. Don't bring too much luggage there is no wasted space in the room. But if you're coming to NYC, you won't be spending much time in your room. 
Location was great. Staff was helpful. They'll even hold your bags if you're room isn't ready when you arrive and will hold them after checkout.

title: Small, but excellent quality
text: Pod is an accurate name, but all needs were met and surpassed.  The bunk bed had great quality (couldn't tell when my bunkmate moved, got in or out of bed), good mattress and sheets.  The bathroom had great space considering the size of the room with a great a shower head and toilet.  Multiple windows that let in a lot of natural light.  Clean overall with convenient and helpful staff, elevators, and close to a lot of restaurants and transportation.  Free coffee and water in the common area / lounge.  Close to Times Square, but on the outskirts enough that it's not too busy and crowded.

title: Great
text: Rooms are clean, beds are comfortable, shower is great and staff is very helpful. Location is very convenient and the wifi is fast.. My favorite place to stay in NY. The only thing missing are donuts or bagels in the morning.

title: Review
text: Priced well. Good location. Excellent housekeeping. Staff are not all friendly. Some are really welcoming, while others are odd. Good lounge area. The free coffee was supposed to be offered till 11 pm as the receptionist mentioned - but it is only served for few hours.

title: Great place for low cost!
text: If you know you’re not going to be in the room very often this is a great place to stay! Beds are comfy and it’s really close to everything! Highly recommend to everyone. Will absolutely be booking with them again!

title: good value and conveniently located
text: stayed at this location for an extended long weekend. the room was as expected, i do like that there are no frills. the light flickered at the highest setting but was easily fixed by lowered its brightness. very conveniently located, was able to walk to all of my places of interest and the area itself was good. would stay here again.

title: Week in NYC
text: Good price-quality ratio. Within 20 minutes walk to any attraction in midtown. Not very private bathroom and the AC was a bit noisy. The room was small but comfy. We were sad that the rooftop was closed.

title: Amazing Experience
text: Definitely worth the price. Perfect location to stay in Midtown Manhattan. Would definitely recommend. Well maintained and excellent services. Budget friendly with all necessary amenities. Easy to commute also.

title: it was perfect
text:
location is good heater is also good
and also staff was so greeting us one staff can speak korean we really happy about used our laungage greeting if i visit new york city again next time i wanna stay here again thanks

title: Well located for a good price
text: Well located in downtown Manhattan. Good price compared to other hotels, and relatively to quality. Room was clean and well laid out. Very friendly staff. The only remark is regarding a rather noisy heating system.

title: Long week-end escape!
text: Great for a solo traveler like myself. I catch a train from JFK to Grands Central and walk a couple blocks to the POD! The rooms are always clean and the staff is nice and accommodating. I will stay here again! :)

title: pod 39
text: great place to stay in Manhattan , I recommend it completely ,  location is great , you got everything you need , rooms are clan shower is good and connection too. We even played pool and ping pong there.

title: Yuk
text: Back of door filthy asked to clean but never did  like prison cell no good meals only fruit and pastry for breakfast and never have change when you buy breakfast reception a bit dirty looking and the walking tours you have to go to another pod hotel which is about 40 minutes walk

title: AJG
text:
The hotel was verry clean, the staff was frendly, I was happy they have one of my favorite restaurant close. Dependiendo de lo
Vas hacer es un buen restaurante. No esta cerca de Time Square si vas a pie. De lo demas todo super.

title: Beautifully designed, well priced gem in a great location
text: Clean, nicely designed/minimalistic rooms that contain everything you need--private bathroom TV, utility outlets, room safe, comfortable bed, storage space.  Good housekeeping, capable and helpful Front Desk staff.  Terrific location 3 blocks from Grand Central.  Great value for the money, especially in the winter.  My hotel of choice on my trips to NYC over the years.

title: Cheap Stay
text: Pod 39 is very affordable and simple room. We do not recommend if you are travelling with someone who you are not close with as you will be living on top of each other. There is Easy access to central station and a lot of things are walking distance such as times square and empire state building. They do have a car that can take you to the airport.

title: My work stay
text: By far one of the best hotel experiences for comfort and high standards with the focus on the customer. I have never had any complaints for this location and know that I will never be let down by the exceptional work from staff to the people at the front desk who greet the guest.

title: Clean and new
text: Having stayed in many hotels and hostels, I'd put this in my top 5 worldwide - really. New, clean, quality mattress, efficient and practical room layout, friendly staff and quiet location within walking distance of the subway and attractions. Highly recommend.

title: Great stay
text:
Me and my best friend took a trip to New York and decided to stay at the pod 39 and it was wonderful
.1- we stayed in a bunk bed room .The  rooms are very small but again that’s why it’s called the pod, we didn’t mind because we barely spend anytime in the rooms 
2- the staff were very helpful and kind to us from check in to us passing by the lobby everyday to even checking out. It was a wonderful experience 
3- great location it was in walking distance of everything literally there a Starbucks , chipotle, chic-fil-a ,shake shack  and many other restaurants near by . You could also walk to broadway and Times Square the grand central train station was less then 10 mins away.
On the very top floor it’s has the most amazing views of the city and a  bar  with great music , they also have a restaurant attached to the hotel that serves breakfast if I’m not mistaken and a pool and ping-pong table.
Overall this was a great stay and can’t wait to come back

title: great value in midtown
text: room was comfortable despite being small in square footage. all facilities were well maintained, including the room’s bathroom setup. location was super convenient to great food and the grand central subway station. staff was super helpful & housekeeping was a daily service, done expertly.

title: Clean, compact bejeau
text: Bed is very comfortable,  room very clean. Shower amazing,  staff friendly and helpful. Room was very small, but as was only using for sleeping in not a problem. Roof top bar wasn't open which was a shame,  but very central to everything,  would definitely stay again

title: Silvia
text: Thank you guys. I always choose you in NYC. You're kind of family to me and my staying there is super comfortable. Super clean rooms. Super kind supportive staff. Awesome morning coffee service , delicious. Until next time! Hugs, Silvia

title: Comfortable bed!
text:
Comfortable bed, excellent location, great staff and communication.
Heater in my room was a little loud but overall great stay. Great value for the price. Free coffee and tea each morning. Felt safe .

title: Great location, small space
text: Great LOCATION and beautiful lobby with some things to do.  Clean rooms, perfect for couple or people that are going to be out of room, only go to hotel for sleeping. Very small space for walk or luggage but work for us.

title: 3 full days of fire alarm testing!! Couldn’t sleep or do work! Rooftop bar closed and room too tiny for two.
text: Stayed here for 1 week in a private double room. It might be adequate for 1 person but way too small for 2 people. There is really nowhere to put our stuff and we only had one backpack each. Bathroom door and shower wall is all semi-frosted glass so there’s no privacy. On top of which the door couldn’t fully close— think poop smells throughout the room each time someone had to go #2. Tv is tiny and doesn’t swivel and when you open the window blinds it just covers half the tv. What a joke. The absolute worst thing about our stay was 3 full days of fire alarm testing that we were not made aware of before booking. Alarm testing started around 9am and went through the afternoon! Totally unacceptable! Not only could I not sleep in but I couldn’t work from my hotel room. The alarms were nonstop and obnoxiously loud. I felt like I was being tortured and was forced to leave to find some peace. I had other options with even lower prices, so I would not have chosen to stay if I had known about the fire alarms beforehand. I asked the front desk about a discounted stay due to the fire alarm disturbance and not only did they say no, they weren’t nice or apologetic about it. Also, the rooftop bar is closed until spring! It was a big reason for staying there. Overall, I do not recommend Pod 39. Location was mediocre, other than being close to Grand Central, location wasn’t great. No food open late at night in that area.

title: Budget friendly, clean, helpful staff
text:
Combination of price and location make this place already hard to beat in midtown Manhattan. Rooms are small but if you just want a place to sleep and wash up it’s perfect - the size of the rooms also facilitate consistent cleaning and room service.

Took a point off for sleep quality but that was just because they had a fire alarm test for a few days, bad luck

title: Safe, clean, inexpensive accomodation
text: Pod 39 is centrally located, safe, clean, and very reasonably priced. I've stayed here before and when I needed a place to stay at the last minute, it was my logical choice. I've recommended it to several friends.

title: FANTASTIC HOTEL
text: fantastic hotel, excellent location, very very clean, rooms always precise, clean and tidy, super welcoming staff and receptionists available and kind, in particular MATHEW and EUGENE who were very helpful and kind. thank you very much for everything, I recommend this structure, maximum score.

title: 100% recommended
text: There's nothing I can complain about! The facility is even better looking than I had anticipated and amenities work perfectly. Staff was cordial and respectful, the bed was comfortable. Would recommend to anyone

title: Not the best place if you travel alone
text: I travelled alone to NYC for my 30th birthday and picked this hostel when I saw the pictures about the busy rooftop. I thought it’d be great to meet other travellers while having a drink but when I checked in and asked about the roof prop and the restaurant, I have been told it was closed. If I knew it upfront, I’d have gone somewhere else… I spent my birthday alone!

title: First time trip to NYC
text: Pod 39 was actually our back up bc the original hotel seemed sketchy and had bad reviews. I'm actually very glad we ended up at Pod39. The room was very small, as advertised, but it had what you need. The bed wasn't the most comfortable but I've slept on worse. The hotel was very clean, trendy and the staff was friendly. It had a cool roof top hang out but unfortunately the bars weren't open, I'm not sure why. They did offer coffee and tea in mornings as well which was very nice. And it was close enough to Times Square and many other great spots that we could walk but far enough away that it wasn't too loud. I will happily stay at Pod39 again next time we visit NYC.

title: Perfect
text: Easy, convenient, comfortable and simple.  Room was quiet.  Perfect price enabled my daughter and I to have our own rooms.  Parking convenience at a discount was a bonus.  Staff was super friendly.  View was sublime.

title: Excellent value
text:
Love staying at this hotel in Murray Hill.  Walking distance to all of the restaurants, museums, shops, bars and amenities that I like.  Not the biggest rooms, but very comfortable and quiet.
One minor annoyance is that there is not a refrigerator in the room, but also does not advertise as having one. 
Will be booking again in the near future!

title: Love the POD!
text: I needed to overnight in NY in order to catch a very early morning flight.  I was going to be in a room for only 8 hours, so I didn't want to spend a ton.  Pod39 was absolutely perfect.  I normally never sleep before a flight---too nervous about getting to the airport, missing the flight, etc.  But I slept like a baby for the 4 hours I had to sleep.  Clean, comfortable, great shower, amazingly helpful staff.  I can't wait to stay again---for more than 8 hours next time!

title: Small, clean and convenient.
text:
Great midtown location. Easy to drive to, then easy to walk from orvtaje public transportation. Family lives close by so the location is convenient as well. 
Easy to book and check in. Rates are very competative especially since POD39 is clean and competitively priced.

title: Good holiday
text: Our stai was good. The room was little bit short but in my case, I think it was enought for my tipe of vacation. The bathroom, was good and all the room was clear! Also the personal was kinde and helpful!

title: Enjoyable stay
text: Very accommodating stay, no problems or complaints with my stay whatsoever, I enjoy staying here everytime I visit the city! Staff is really good and no problems with any. Really recommend this location to anyone:)

title: Great value for a night in the city
text: The price was just right for a night in the city.  While the room is TINY and I’m not sure that sort of space would work for me for more than just a night, pod 39 did the trick.  Clean, convenient and beds were comfortable (even on the top bunk).  Room didn’t have an iron but they were quick to deliver one upon request.  Rooftop was pretty and fun for taking pictures.

title: Absolutely fantastic deal if you don't need a lot of space!
text: Pod 39 is PERFECT for people who spend all day out in the city and just want a place to sleep and shower, although there IS a small desk and chair suitable for one person to work. The room is just big enough for a couple or close friends -- there's a rack and shelves for clothing, drawer and space for luggage under the bed! -- and make sure you're okay with just being separated by a wall of frosted glass when toileting or showering. We had 4 pillows, bed was comfy, water was hot. I appreciated that the windows opened (we had a nice rooftops view on the 11th floor) and the very nice shutters allowed for near blackout conditions for sleeping. The lobby was lovely decorated for Christmas and the front desk staff was efficient and friendly. Just an all around great deal if you don't need a lot of space. We'll be back!

title: Perfect location, small but confortable rooms
text: Close to public transportation, very helpful staff, confortable although tiny room, decent price for the area. overall clean and quiet. Would definitely recommend to someone who doesn't know NYC yet and would like to visit.

title: I will returno to POD 39
text: Excellent localization, very good staff, to be excellent you may think about offer the breakfast as you did on Jan 1st. I really will return to POD 39 on my next trip to NYC and I recommend you to all my friends.

title: Absolutely Amazing
text: I loved everything about it. As a minimalist I thought of this place as a perfect fit. I wanted a small place with a private bathroom and only this hotel provides it. And they provide a safe for you as well !

title: I recommand
text: Pod bedroom but you have all you need.  ( and I had some windows that I can open but not noisy). recommand for the service and the cleanliness.  near by a lot of attractions. I will certainely return to Pod 39.

title: A great place to stay
text: Very lovely hotel. nearby Grand Central station and plenty of restaurants and shops. You can walk to many locations on your must see list. including Empire State building and the Chrysler building and time square

title: No rating...horrible place
text:
Very nasty
BAD smell
 Very small unfriendly staff...I claimed at least to change  the bed with clean clothes, and they said no people to fix that...honestly someone else slept over with out change the bed...I almost vomit...bad smell

title: Great location and clean room
text: Walking distance to Time Squarer, near metro station Grand Central. Spotless room, good mattress and nice amenities.Friendly staff and very polite and helpful.Lot of shops and restaurant for breakfast and dinner.

title: Great stay
text: Great location for anyone wanting to visit NYC and explore, staff were friendly & the hotel was clean. Fresh coffee and water out every day was also a nice touch and our room was always clean whenever we came back.

title: Very good hotel
text: Hotel in ottima posizione. Stanze piccole ma pulite. Sarebbe ancora meglio se acqua, the e caffè fossero sempre disponibili, mentre spesso finivano subito e non venivano riforniti nell’immediato. Nel complesso ottimo.

title: Perfect
text:
Great location, super clean, friendly staff.The luggage storage is super convenient. The pool and ping pong area is perfect for winter season, when you want to rest from the cold of NYC.
Best thing: the shower.

title: Fun adventure
text:
The small room was expected but the service exceeded expectations.  Front desk staff was very friendly and helpful, particularly Jenae.

Room was clean and fairly efficiently designed to maximize utility.

title: Nice Hotel, I recommend
text: Good service, the room was very clean. The hotel is only 5 minutes from the Grand Central, I recommend. We stayed there from December 26 to December 28, 2022. Good service. The room with bunkbed is very small, but very nice

title: Pas de remboursement de caution
text: Pas de remboursement de la caution il mon prix 35 dollars comme caution mais il m'ont expliqué que après 1 jour il sera remboursé automatiquement mais je n'ai rien trouble d'autre hotel ils m'ont remboursé

title: Noël à NYC
text:
Excellent rapport qualité prix.
Service attentif
Les chambres sont petites mais le salon est parfait pour un temps de détente.
Propreté irréprochable dans les chambres.
L'hôtel est parfaitement situé dans Manhattan

title: Christmas in NYC 2022
text: Our stay at Pod 39 was pretty close to perfect for us! First to be greeted by holiday and Christmas decorations throughout, the helpful, friendly staff, the location, complementary coffee, tea, and water available, the ping-pong and pool tables, the amazing  rooftop with views, the restaurant, wonderful water pressure and hot water in shower…it all made our visit to NYC the memorable experience that it should be!

title: Pod 39
text: Pod 39 is good value and it's a great location, but the heating was hard to regulate and noisy — it's blow heating in rooms the size of a mattress so it's uncomfortable to have air blasted on you. The worst thing was the bedding was synthetic and lumpy but then I'm a bit of a bedding princess.

title: New York December 2022
text:
What you see is what you get. Basic rooms but you should be going to New York to explore and not to spend time in your hotel room!
Location of the hotel is ideal for exploring New York. Hotel is clean. Free coffee during the morning. 
Staff are helpful. Jenae was particularly helpful as she always seemed to be on reception first thing in the morning! 

David

title: Great Value
text: Long getaway weekend.  Wanted to spend some time in NYC without breaking the bank but also in a nicely located and clean hotel.  POD 39 fit the bill. These are tiny but extremely efficient rooms.  They are modern, clean, and they’ve somehow figured out how to pack this tiny space with lots of amenities.  Every member of the staff was friendly and helpful.  These are not the kind of rooms you spend a lot of time sitting around in, but that is not what we were in NYC to do.  The location was perfect, about a 15 minute walk to Times Square in a very nice neighborhood, close to restaurants and stores and a 5 minute walk to Grand Central Station. We’ll stay here again.

title: We had an amazing time!
text: Amazing location, very friendly and helpful staff, they let us do early check in and let check out at no extra cost. Rooms were clean and perfect for the purpose of our trip. Highly recommended, we are definitely staying here again!

title: Good price, location, small room.
text:
It is a good hotel for the price.
I dindt like de door of the bathroom (glass door) because it is unconfortable for a couple. Its cery close to subway on grand central station. The staff are aewsome!!

title: Okay but not great
text: Noisy slamming doors to get in the room.  Tiny rooms are fine if they have convenient plugs, shelves, etc.  The hotel could make simple improvements to make a positive stay experience.   Good location.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Quite expensive but it’s NYC.

title: Great NYC Option for Location and Price
text: These rooms are very small, but it is all you need in NYC.  Great location, affordable price, helpful staff, and very clean.  If you just need a place to sleep and shower, this is an excellent option.  Convenient to Grand Central and an easy walk to tourist attractions.

title: Perfect location/great offer
text: The rooms are perfectly designed and maintained. The bedding is good quality, the room clean. Great choice for the money. The location is also perfect, close to all public transportation, you can visit Manhattan with ease.

title: Great location, lovely staff
text: This hotel is perfectly located, close to Grand Central and everything we wanted to see. The reception staff were really friendly and the hotel is clean. The rooms are very small but this didnt matter too much as we only used the room to rest our head. I did find the beeping and noise from outside a little much some nights but thats just New York, not the hotels fault! Great stay overall

title: Very good stay
text: Very nice hotel in good location. Rooms clean amd quiet but our room at least had a partly frosted glass bathroom door right next to bed so no privacy at all. Only downsides ad states they do airport transfers and they don't and the ad doesn't say how much the nightly deposit is when you check in that they take and refund. Think it was $30 a night. Not sure how long it takes to refund no staff available on checkout so just dropped key

title: Mother/Daughter Trip
text: Great experience! The friendliness of the staff and cleanliness of the facility were top notch. We will stay here again in the future. Close proximity to grand central so getting around town via subway was easy.

title: Great location and value
text: We have stayed at this pod several times and it’s a great location and value for staying in Manhattan. The rooms are very small with no frills but it has everything you need for a place to sleep at night and is clean and tidy. The staff are accommodating and the atmosphere is fun including a bar downstairs and a rooftop restaurant (closed for season now). My only challenge was that check out is not until 12pm and we felt chased out by housekeeping staff who came by multiple times starting 2 hours before check out to keep asking if were gone yet. The third time they walked in on me in the shower after I had told them twice we were still not gone yet.

title: Nice place to a lonely travel
text: Excellent location but a little expensive: a very small room, has the minimum essential, and no breakfast included. For a lonely travel it works. Just a reminder: if you booked the hotel with a company card, be aware that someone needs to accept the reservation and send a bunch of information, like their id card. This situation was very annoying when I tried to do my check-in.

title: $400 a night for a room barely bigger than the bed
text: Everything in NYC was very expensive this week but still paid the best part of $400 a night for one of their highest category rooms. The room was barely bigger than the queen bed. Small shower room. Tiny window looking out over a central ventilation shaft so basically no fresh air or natural light available. No coffee machine. If travelling on a budget and it’s available for $150 a night then go for it. But at $400 a night it’s outrageous for such a tiny room.

title: December stay at Pod39
text: Very convenient location and fantastic staff. Hats off to Brian and his wonderful team! The hotel is great for a short stay in NYC on walking distance to the most iconic sites of Manhattan and good public transportation to everywhere. The rooms are a bit noisy because of the AC and the traffic outside; for those who need silence to sleep well, bringing earplugs is a good idea. The cleanliness was TOP!

title: Hall of Fame Staff!
text:
A close friend of mine recommended Pod 39 and I couldn’t be happier about my experience. Location is close to everything and while the rooms are small, all your necessities can be found within arms length! The best part of this place has to be the staff. A issue occurred during my stay and was swiftly take care of after brought to the attention of the staff. Bryan, the manager, is extremely personable and went above and beyond to make sure the remainder of my stay was no less then excellent. 

The whole experience was heartwarming as I did not receive the same customer experience in different parts of New York(city is going down the drain!!). Nonetheless, I will be back!

title: Pod 39 in December
text: Some machine, probably the AC unit from the hallway was so loud and strong that you could feel the vibration in the room and hear it as well. The blanked was thin for December. It could have been more cosy in the room. Small room and small, hard queen bed. Good location, friendly stuff.

title: Perfect for NYC
text:
Its Just a few Minutes from the Central Station.
The street isn't really loud. 
And the bed was soft (i like it).
The housekeeping always really freindly if they're see someone.
The Staff on the reception was so friendly as well.
Perfect for NYC Vacation

title: Good location, comfortable room
text: The hotel is walking distance from just about everywhere in the city and its just a quick walk to Grand Central Terminal to catch the subway. Staff were very friendly, room was clean and would be serviced daily, compact but very comfortable room.  Good for long or short stays.

title: Would recommend
text: I really enjoyed the stay was nice and comfortable,despite small room I enjoyed myself I would definitely recommend this place ,staff was helpful and they tried to accommodate if you're in town book the pod 39 it's cute and not noisey like some hotels in the city location was great and price is affordable

title: Perfect for New York
text: Rooms are very small but we just needed a nice place to sleep while in the city and this was perfect. The view was nice, we had the Chrysler building. The staff was nice and helpful. Grand central station was 5 minutes walking and a city bike station was located right in front of the hotel

title: Family Vacation
text: My son and I had a wonderful time, the staff was so friendly and profesional. Wellington definarely cone back and will recommed to our friends and family. The locazione was perfect close to everything, the bar at the hotel was great and the tacos deliciuos!

title: needed a clean afforadable spot for 1 night in Manhatten
text:
Stayed at Pod 39 for 1 night after a concert.
The city in December can be a hard place to find a room  on the weekend for 1 nights booking but the POD offered that option! They fit my needs in EVERY way!!
A clean neat fun  bunk room for my husband and I on a Saturday night!!
An unexpected but lovely offer to check us in EARLY!! thank you K.J!!
A band aid  offered  as I was checking out for a cut on my hand!! Offers to look up anything we were looking for in the city, they called us a cab, then helpfully  canceled when we decided on a subway!!   Thank you Christine!!They are the  greeters, the  concierge, friendly  and professional!! 
the beds were so cozy and totally comfy...The room was very clean. The open social spaces with Ping Pong and Pool tables and HUGE screen T.V are never even mentioned but are a great added advantage.
The morning tea and coffee are splendid and generous.
Would DEF stay again!!!
Thanks to all...
in closing a few words to help them up the game and possibly the visitor count:

Name Tags-   ALL STAFF  should have one on..name and role!!

 Fashion Sense for staff   : 
The decor and vibe of this chic fun place beckons that staff carry it through personally when they come to the job!!
You  are all young and cool  so don't hold back!!! 'do it up' when you come to work..Remember ,you welcome guests from  ALL OVER THE WORLD!!       Eye candy is always EVERYONES favourite 'destination" !!!   Show everyone that Pod 39 staff are the end all in service AND fashion and style!!!!
That would be my only suggestion to better the already great experience!!

Other than that, great choice  for price and value !!

A

title: Long weekend getaway
text: Great staff, clean rooms, quiet. We had a bunk bed room. We only travelled with two 20” carry ons. If we had larger suitcases there wouldn’t be much floor space. The size of the room didn’t matter because we were only there to sleep. Great value for the location. Would definitely try this or another Pod hotel again. Thank you!

title: Custo benefício
text:
Excelente localização, há de se dizer que os quartos são pequenos, porém na medida certa.   O quarto era limpo diariamente   . Todos na recepção de alto astral.
Foram 7 dias neste hotel e não tivemos nenhum problema com nossa reserva feita via uma agência de turismo .

title: Price and location were perfect
text: A small room, but it had everything I wanted, and it was blessedly quiet at night. I could walk everywhere I needed to in the morning (coffee, bagels). Front desk staff were friendly and helpful, especially when I got very confused about the room price (those darn city taxes!).

title: Very Good Place for Solo female Traveller!
text:
The staff ist very helpful and friendly(thanks Jenae). The room had all what you need for a City Trip and the Location is absolutely perfect for Solo female travelers.
The housekeeping is perfect👍👍👍

title: Night in New York
text:
Very good quality - price hotel. The room was clean and very near to Grand Central Station. There is complimentary coffee in the mornings with place to have your breakfast. 
Staff very friendly and kind.
i would stay again in the hotel

title: What a Find
text: Perfect base for visiting NYC. Walking distance to midtown sights. No noise whatsoever at night. The staff were so friendly and our Pod was kept spotless with clean towels every day. My daughter and I shared the bunk bed room. Compact and very cosy.  Would 💯 recommend to anyone visiting.

title: High quality, low rate
text: My first stay at Pod 39.  I arrived early and was offered an upgrade from double to queen. So glad that was offered: the room was NY-small, which I’m not used to. But a great bed, range of excellent pillows, terrific bathroom, totally quiet room (no traffic noise). My one concern… If you’re claustrophobic ask about the window: the one small window in my room  looked into a dark well between buildings and that with the size of the room felt a bit confining, though I got used to it. Location is brilliant -a few blocks from Grand Central so I could take the train directly back to La Guardia. Free baggage storage and check out isn’t till 12. Free tea and coffee in the morning Everything I need, in fact, in a hotel

title: Perfect!!!!
text: My experience in the Pod 39 Hotel was great. The location is unbeatable. The room, although small, is very comfortable and very clean, the bathroom very efficient and also very clean. The price-value ratio is very good, I highly recommend it

title: Excellent and comfortable hotel!
text: I fully recommend. People at front desk was always helpful. They allowed us to do early and late check out. The housekeeping excellent, always clean towels. The games at the lobby helped us to wait till the moment to take the flight. The location is very good, near Grand Central. The only bad thing is that the hotel charge a deposit to the credit card and you don’t have it back immediately. That’s bad!

title: Great Stay
text: The location and service provided was great and the room was nice and tidy.  Thanks I enjoyed my stay. I definitely recommend especially for solo travelers like me.  I felt secured and safe during my stay!

title: Good price
text: Small but well planned rooms. OBS, the toilets cant be properly closed! Great location close to Grand Central. Free gym card included at Blink, better than expected. Free coffee and tea in the morning.

title: Overnight Work Stay
text: Very comfortable place to crash with a fun bar/ restaurant at lobby level. Pod 39 is in the perfect location at Lex/39. Will definitely stay again!  My room was small but with all the amenities needed.  Can’t beat the value.  There is also a very nice size rooftop with great views for guests.

title: Very good hotel in perfect location!
text: Fancy hotel in perfect location, only a few minutes to Grand Central Station. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom was clean and nice and the room had a good size for teo people. The staff was very friendly and helpful and there were enough elevators, so no long waiting time!

title: Pod 39 Hotel  - New York stay - Wow
text: Excellent hotel, staff very friendly, good location, just outside of trafic so very quiet.  Cozy but perfect since we weren't there to stay in our room but to visit New York.  Cleaning everyday perfect.

title: Great value!
text: If you don’t mind a very small room, this is an excellent value hotel for NYC. Close to Grand Central, clean, fun, has everything you need.  I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again particularly when I am traveling by myself.

title: Tutto perfetto
text: Hotel super consigliato per la posizione, la pulizia delle stanze e la simpatia/disponibilità dello staff! Buono il rapporto qualità-prezzo e molto carino il pub/bar situato al piano terra! Ci tornerei!

title: Needs some renovation
text: Location is good but the hotel needs a good renovation. It looks old and not well mainteined. Food is not available in the hotel, which is very unconfortable in that area. Air conditioning is very noisy.

title: Best value for money
text: This hotel was best choice for me personally. The price was very good, this is not a 5 star hotel, so manage your expectation. you can get a room to sleep with a private bathroom. everything works. the staff are super friendly and helpful. there is free access to the gym down the street included in the package. the hotel is in excellent location walking distance from the grand central terminal.

title: Poor admin, basic room
text:
The room is fine, very small. I was charged a “facilities fee” of $30 a night which wasn’t mentioned before my stay, and even the website says this should have only been $22 so not sure what happened there.
Additionally, the website says the hotel will accept packages. Mine was refused and sent back to the sender. Really annoyed.
Poor service.

title: Everything you need
text: My daughter and I were really looking forward to this special trip.  We loved the bunk beds that were super comfortable.  The room, though small, was perfect -- everything we needed and nothing we didn't.  Well situated close to Grand Central Terminal and a brisk walk into the theatre district.  Great eats everywhere. The staff were exceptionally kind and helpful.

title: A small place with a lesser price
text: Small, nice accommodations in a great location.  Was looking forward to the rooftop bar but that is seasonal. Wish they made coffee available all day. Nice staff, accommodating and eager to please. Good stay over all

title: Hôtel au top pour mon voyage solo. Emplacement idéal dans la ville, proche des grands centres d'intérêt.
text: Emplacement idéal dans la ville, à proximité des grands centres d'intérêt. Quartier très sympa. Personnel aimable, disponible et à l'écoute. Propreté de ma chambre irréprochable. Je suis ravie de mon séjour au Pod 39. J'y reviendrai sans hésitation lors de mon prochain voyage à New York.

title: Excellent location, rooms and staff
text: Excellent location, close to Grand Central station and East 34 ferry for transport. Easy walking distance to Times Square, Empire State etc. Rooms are very clean, modern, comfy mattress, air con / heat, safe, hairdryer, a small area to store suitcases and a hanging rail above with hangars. Good size shower with body gel, shampoo & conditioner. Just a few paces away, we enjoyed meals in the House of Lasagna and beers / cocktails in The Junction pub

title: Highly recommended
text: Great location, great value, great atmosphere. The rooftop bar is amazing. The rooms are small and minimalist, but functional, clean and comfortable. Nice extras include the free city walks that are recommended.

title: Really great, clean place
text:
Really great area, with plenty of shops and bars around. The downstairs bar has a games room with ping pong, pool and music on with nice cocktails too which is a bonus. 

Rooms are very small but clean, could do with a little bit more storage 

Overall really good for the price

title: Tiny rooms are for tiny people.
text: If you aren't a small girl, don't bother with booking here. The rooms are clean but tiny. The staff is nice too. The location is too far away from Times Square and the walk is not a good one. They charge too much for what they offer!

title: Great return visit
text: We stayed as my husband ran the marathon. We'd stayed before and were pleased as the hotel was close to the buses at the start. Quiet rooms, comfy, great showers! We stayed 3 years ago and we're not disappointed coming back. We know we'll stay again. Thank you!

title: A great hotel that won’t cost an arm
text:
Great hotel. Great location. Great price. 
Staff is friendly. Check in is very fast and only take a few minutes. Rooms are small but you get to sleep in a modern and clean room, with white sheets, and have your own bathroom: the most important!

title: Amazing stay
text: This place has a great location only a few blocks away from Grand Central. The staff is very friendly. They do have early check in when the rooms are available or you can drop off your bags while your room is ready.

title: Best Hotel
text: Great location to get to Time Square, Grand Central, Bryant Park and subway stations.  Unique hotel that we enjoyed.  Restaurant next door was awesome and bartenders were great!  Our room had a view with the Empire State Building which was so cool to see at night!

title: NYC Visit
text: Small, clean friendly hotel in a great location. Wish the rooftop bar was still open, it was a very warm while we were there and would have really enjoyed the view at night. We did not try the restaurant or the bar on this visit.

title: trip for work
text: Great location very friendly and helpful staff. Room was very basic just a crash pad really. I had a double which was fine for one but would have been a bit of a wheeze for two. AC from either the room above or below was quite noisy

title: Good location, basic accommodation and facilities.
text: Stayed here at the end of a transatlantic cruise so had large suitcases which barely fitted in the tiny room! There was a semi-frosted, slide across door on the bathroom, right next to the toilet, so only share a room with someone you know well! The rooftop bar was nice but the downstairs one was closed throughout our stay so no-where to grab a quiet drink at the end of  a busy day sight-seeing in October! Perhaps some patio heaters might have encouraged us to go to the rooftop bar! The hotel is in a good location, so  it's easy to get to the main attractions. The lack of tea and coffee facilities in the room was noticeable for us (it would have been nice to have a coffee first thing in the morning).  They also do not provide breakfast, or even a vending machine. Possibly my age (48) but I think this hotel lacks the touches that would make staying there more comfortable, On the plus side, the room was very clean and the staff were very friendly!

title: A nice place to stay in NY
text:
a truly original place, an intelligent idea of ​​minimal but very comfortable accommodation suitable for guests of all ages ready to have fun in small super efficient spaces
exceptional mattresses and soundproofed rooms

title: Great value and convenient!
text: No frills place clean and modern place to stay. If you need a place to sleep that's got all the basic necessities this is it! I came to visit some family and it was easy to find, the staff were friendly and the rooms small (intentional), but nice.

title: Great location in midtown NY
text: The hotel is in a great location in the Murray area. The staff was friendly. The rooms are small but  with good use of space and everything you need, good size bathroom, and very comfortable beds. I would stay here again.

title: Good hotel
text:
Good hotel good staff the room are fine we did have a big room bund pod for 2 
The bed are comfortable no noise 
The bathroom is well the shower is perfect the water good if it has a shower palm it will be better

title: Okay for budget or last minute stays
text: We were disappointed that the restaurant/rooftop lounge and bar was not available to us during our stay. They open late and close way too early, especially for being in NYC. Also, there's no included breakfast and the Cafe doesn't even offer orange juice or hot chocolate.  There's no refrigerator in the room or water available anywhere so you either have to drink from the tap or go without. In the morning you are left dehydrated and starving, until u can walk somewhere to get something to drink and eat, which are not conducive conditions for walking around anywhere to begin with.

title: nice experience
text: really nothing to complain about! one thing they could improve is to have a breakfast room, tho they offer free coffee tea in the morning. staff very helpful and polite, ready to help. rooms a fresh and clean. 3 elevators, nice rooftop ( you got 20% discount)

title: Thank You Pod 39 team
text: the hotel has a convenient location and relatively reasonable price. staff were very friendly and helpful. the room was clean and has all what you may need on a business trip to NY. many coffee shops and restaurants are nearby.

title: Great value (for NY)
text:
Small room, but you won't stay long in your room anyway. Everything was very clean. Free coffee/tea in the morning.
Good location, plenty of breakfast options in the area and near to Grand Central Station. 
The room was a bit cold in the first night due to the window being slightly open. The shortly used heating was very loud - could be an issue in the winter.

title: Great value for money!
text: Rooms are small but comfortable and very clean. Amenities were complete. Service was great with friendly staff too. You really get value for what you pay. Great location as well so it's easy to get around.

title: Gute Lage
text: Das hotel liegt sehr zentral. Leider sind die Zimmer, wie von vielen anderen schon beschrieben, sehr sehr klein. Es ist ok um dort zu übernachten. Wir hatten einen guten Blick auf das one Vanderbilt aus unserem Fenster. Wir waren spät dran und so war das Hotel sehr teuer für die Qualität des Zimmers.

title: Basic accommodation well located
text: The hotel is well located but only provides basic accommodation. Rooms are small, although fairly well organised. Small amenities such as kettle / hot water dispenser/ coffee/ tea and cups would be welcome.

title: Best kept secret in NYC!
text:
The staff is awesome! And these are the cleanest rooms in NYC!
There is no gym on site but you will get a pass to Blink Fitness right around the corner (next to Shake Shack!) Rooftop and inside bars are great options as well.

title: Nice and good location place!
text:
Very good location, very helpful staff close to Subway station, points of interest, restaurants and bars.
The room could be better, with refrigerator and microwave.
At least, a recommended hotel to stay in Manhattan

title: Compact and bijou
text: Room was cozy, beds comfortable and room clean, staff helpful and friendly. Would stay again, would have used the bar more if it didn't close so early...though the strawberry margaritas were delicious!

title: ok
text: the overall experience was ok, the location was perfect for us. the room had bunk beds, no issue, but it was quite dark because it was facing some brick wall and the bathroom was separated by a glass culisant door by the room, but I guess this is Manhattan at a resonable price. from cleanliness point of view, all was good, nothing to say here. so if you just need a clean place to sleep which is in a good location and good price, this is it.

title: Pod 39 is a hidden gem in NYC!
text: My husband and I came up to NYC for four nights for my 30th birthday. We had a very early flight and we were able to drop our bags at the hotel baggage storage at 9:30am and set off on exploring the city. We returned around 1/2pm to find out that the room was ready and we could check in. As we like to do things on a budget, we had booked a bunk pod because we got a pretty good deal on it. Upon finding out we were a couple and celebrating my 30th birthday, Frankie upgraded us free of charge to a Queen pod, which was absolutely AMAZING! I can’t believe he did that for us, even now after we’re back home! It was so kind. The room IS small, but if you’re in NYC to explore and not lay in the hotel room it’s perfect. The bed is super comfortable and there is so much storage. The bathroom is also perfect, and we even had a perfect view of the Empire State Building from ours!! They also make up your room EVERYDAY which is so hard to find in NYC. Frankie REALLY kicked our stay off with a Great start by upgrading us and giving us a restaurant suggestion that we loved (skirt steak!). We love visiting NYC and will definitely come back and stay at the PoD Hotels again. They are GREAT!!!

title: great NYC stay - affordable and clean
text: The Pod 39 and 51 are clean, safe, affordable places to stay. I am a female traveling alone for business and I always feel safe and comfortable there. The staff is great, rooms spotless, beds comfy, and Pod 39 has free coffee!

title: The Best in NYC
text: Fabulous place to stay. Close to everything, quiet and safe. This hotel is tucked in a residential neighborhood that is quiet. The area is clean and safe. You can travel to Penn Station, Grand Central within walking distance. Shopping at Macys is a walk away. Stroll Park Ave and enjoy the flavor of New York. Places to eat are all around. My favorite place for dinner is, Lasagna House, right on the corner. Stay there, you wont be disappointed,

title: Can not cancel
text: The phone number they supply for cancelling reservations never seems to be answered. I see from their reviews this is a chronic problem. Be warned..it may say you can cancel, but actually making that happen seems to be incredibly difficult to do.

title: Good for very certain types of stays
text: Room was very small, troubles with the lights, very weak natural light and location not great. It's not worth the amount I paid for, imo to compare, I was in New York also 3 weeks ago. Different hotel, better location, better room and cheaper).

title: 10/10 would stay again
text: Staff was incredibly helpful and accommodating. Property was super clean. Great value. Had one minor issue with my rom, but it was resolved swiftly and completely once responded to staff. They are committed to making your stay a pleasant one. I’ve raveled all over the world and stayed in many hotels, and this stay was one of the most positive ever! The roof bar is especially gorgeous. Small rooms, but perfect for a solo traveler. Would absolutely stay there again.

title: Très bon hotel
text: Hotel très bien situé, à proximité du Chrysler Building, de l'Empire State Building, de Grand Central, Times Square, de la 5ème avenue et du Rockfeller Center. Les chambres sont petites mais très bien agencées et surtout très propres. Le personnel est accueillant et aidant. La vue du rooftop est superbe surtout au coucher du soleil.

title: Not a pleasant stay
text:
The room is smaller and dated than the pictures. There were hairs in the bathroom before using it and mold around shampoo/conditioner containers (refillable ones attached on the wall). The shower head (not a rain shower head) is on the ceiling and water is literally dripping, so allow enough time for your shower. The mechanical noise was bothering all night. The bed was OK as I expected it to be small.
The room design was trying to be a chic capsule hotel but not practical, felt treated very cheap because of the condition of the room, mechanical noise, cleanness and amenity.

title: Way too much expensive for this hotel standard
text: OK we are on the 39th street of Manhattan but I would never have imagined paying almost $250 per night for a cage. This is a "no other choice" hotel to enjoy the heart of this beautiful city. But one day, this whole system of price speculation in NYC will collapse. Hope that day comes!

title: Disappointing experience
text: Great location, poor security (staff took a long time to remove a homeless man from the hotel bar who wandered in with an open container as I was checking in).  Woke up early and none of the lights in the ‘pod’ worked. Informed the front desk on checkout and received no acknowledgment of the complaint

title: My recent stay
text:
I really enjoyed my stay at Pod39.
The staff was friendly and the rooms small but clean with great facilities.
There was a bit of noise from yg street, but the overall experience was truly great.
Thank you!

title: Great hotel in great location
text: Great hotel and super friendly staff (except for the girl on the desk when I checked out). Really good bars with good Mexican food served, sadly no beers on draft anymore unlessyou go to the rooftopbar. Great location very close to Grand Central station and the Chrysler Building.

title: Super sejour
text: Nous avons séjourné 5 nuits et nous avons été très satisfaits les chambres sont un peu petites mais la literie est top.. Et l emplacement est parfait.. De bons restos autour.. Nous avons apprécié la gentillesse du personnel

title: Great experience
text:
Stayed for one week and everything was great. 
Great location. 
Nice to have free coffee and tea in the morning.
Nice lobby and great bar/ terrace. 
The rooms were a little small, but it was according the photos. 
Nice staff. 
Very clean.

title: Our Pod 39 experience
text: We enjoyed staying at Pod 39. Very clean, good service and close to all the places we wanted to visit. The hotel staff was very kind to us. The room was cleaned daily. There was complimentary coffee available in the bar area. Pod 39 is an alternative for those who want to enjoy the city.

title: Meets all needs and expectations
text: Rooms are thoughtfully set up and very clean, a pleasure to return to after a busy day. Great location, feels like neighborhood with array of good eateries, 10 minute walk from Grand Central. Will be returning.

title: Great stay, great service, great location
text:
My fiancé and I stayed here for three nights and would definitely come back again. 
The location is super convenient, being in midtown and only a couple blocks from Grand Central Station, but also feels somehow cozy, being on a slightly less busy street. 

The front desk staff were super helpful, friendly and professional, when whilst dealing other many other guests. And when we had a request, they resolved it quickly and easily. Checking out was a breeze, too.

Our queen room was compact (as expected), and very comfortable. We found it to be tidy, clean and perfect for what we needed. The modern industrial look suited our preferences. And the bed was great, allowing us both to sleep well. 

Extra aesthetic touches around the hotel lobby/bar, where people are free to hangout/work, and the breathtaking view from the roof just added extra value to our overall experience.

title: Don't expect a reply from their reservation team
text: I made a booking for one of my managers, didn't stay there myself so cannot rate the cleanliness or room quality. The rooms seems very small for over USD400/night. Booked directly through their official website. Emailed Reservations, no response.

title: Great location and customer service !
text: Arrived to the hotel early we were able to drop off our bags before our check-in time. There was free water and coffee in the morning which was convenient for us arriving early at the hotel. The staff were professional and very helpful with out questions. Room is as expected from the picture. It was located near a bunch of stores so it was really convenient. Check-out was smooth and would recommend this to anyone.

title: Ein bisschen klein ...
text: ... aber dafür halt günstig. Ungünstig war nur der Lärm von der Rooftop-Bar im 17 Stock. Dies Musik war unüberhörbar und dass in der 14 Etage. Kaltes Wasser gab es umsonst an der Bar, das Bier war lecker, die Betten weich aber überraschend angenehm. Das Zimmer aber so klein, dass ein Aufenthalt zu zweit quasi kaum möglich ist.

title: Best hotel I‘ve stayed at in New York so far
text: 100% recommendation! The staff was super kind and helpful at all times and everything was incredibly clean :) The only thing that bothered me was how loud the AC sometimes was but there is literally nothing else to complain about.

title: Tiny but functional
text: Great location, walkable to many downtown sites.  Rooms are understandably tiny, can be difficult to move around with more than one person in the room.  Elevators can be a little slow, given height and amount of business the place does.  Was waiting for friends at the rooftop bar when they were told it was closing when it was not even midnight on a Friday and other people were still getting drink (?).

title: Good
text: Great location and services. The room was very small and storage space limited. They cleaned our room everyday, even on those when we would get out late. The staff helped us with everything we needed.

title: Small and great
text: I stayed in a full pod. The room was utilitarian but it was clean and fit for purpose. Desk was great as I was on a business trip and had to do some work. It is on a busy street and from the 6th floor it did get quite noisy at night but a pair of ear plugs solved that problem.

title: Great location
text: Interesting concept. Upgraded hostel. I liked it. The people at the front desk- especially Janee were very helpful. For my purpose it was a great location. I like to walk . I would stay there again. ..

title: Avoid thisnplace at all cost
text: Mold in yhe bathroom, staff lies routinely, impossible tonsleep past 6.30 am because the airco makes tons of noise. Awful experience. Woild not recommend at all. Stay clear of this place and find something else, it reallyncan't be worse than this place

title: It's not the worst Hotel in NYC
text: Hey, what matters most?  The rooms are clean and well maintained. The water was hot and plentiful.  The beds are comfortable,  The staff is helpful.  The location in NYC is not the worst. The streets are not littered with homeless and drug dealers like in most parts of the city.

title: Hidden Gem
text: From the minute I arrived I was greeted by upbeat employees that cared about what they do. Very friendly and welcoming atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. My room was very clean and well cared for by the staff. The rooftop bar was an excellent, comfortable place to end your day in a very relaxing setting with a great view of the neighborhood. I would stay here in a heartbeat when visiting the city.

title: Great location and buzzing vibe
text:
It was a great place for value. Perfectly located nearby grand central station and with a great vibe.
The rooftop is amazing!
The rooms were as expected and filled with all the basics.
The staff was always super welcoming as well :)

title: Stay in this place.
text: Loved the place. Got a very good deal with Expedia. The hotel is in the middle of Manhattan, you can walk to all the famous places. Metro station around the corner. Small rooms but very clean. Superfast internet. Free coffee in the beautiful lounge. No breakfast provided but enough places in the neighborhoud to choose from.

title: A great time in New York
text: Cleaned every day and the made always was very nice. There is a nice rooftop where you can enjoy happy hours meeting nice people. The Grand Central Terminal is so close and you can go there by foot. There are a lot of restaurants and coffees near. Maybe the only issue was the guest room didn’t have any refrigerator or minibar.

title: Incredible experience
text:
My sister, mother and girlfriend went to the hotel at September 2022.
The hotel is in the heart of the city but is really relaxed. The rooftop is amazing ande the staff is very very kindly. We will go again in our future trip.

title: Can be better
text:
The bad
Shower divider is broken and water gets everywhere especially if you use the more powerful shower.

They missed some spots while cleaning. If you’re a germophobe this place will irk you

I left a tip anyway, NYC is expensive

The good:
Lots of space for NYC. but that seems to be because I got some type of upgrade for using tripadvisor

Close to starbucks, shake shack, grand central terminal

title: Excellent hotel
text: I'm a costumer guest of Pod 39 because it's perfect for a solo guest, but I think also for all kinds of guests. Comfortable and noiseless rooms, soft bath towels and bedding. In addition the Pod 39's team is very friendly .

title: Affordable & great location right in Manhattan
text:
Great location. So convenient to go anywhere. Grand Central station just 3 mins away. Empire state etc all are at walkable distance.
Affordable place to stay.
Good place to mingle with new people at the bar.
Housekeeping staff always very keen to clean the room ( sometimes quite early even on weekends)

title: Fantastic location, great service and clean
text: Located near Grand Central and near by plenty of places to eat. Housekeeping was great, security were very friendly,  bar was nice both on the rooftop and main floor. Room cleaned every day and always clean. Perfect place for needing a place to crash

title: Sister trip
text: My sister and I went to NY and stayed at the Pod39 hotel. Check-in and check-out was very easy and the staff was very friendly. When to early or wanting to leave luggage for the day, this was possible and feee of charge. The room was not that big, as we knew, but fulfilled our expectations. Room service and new towels every day. At the moment of our stay, they had troubles with WiFi, travelling from Europe we were very depending on WiFi which formed a kind of an issue.. after three days, WiFi was fixed and worked perfectly

title: Zentral, freundlich und sauber
text: Das Pod39 Hotel liegt mitten in Manhatten. Die Zimmer sind wirklich klein, aber in New York ist Platz eben knapp. Ich finde die Lage wiegt diese Tatsache auf. Der Check-In ging schnell und am Abreisetag konnte ich meine Koffer kostenlos bis zur Abreise unterstellen.

title: Great location, perfect place to stay
text: We love this place.  Rooms are small but have everything you need, more European than American but we weren't in the room that often really!!!  Great location, great staff, great price. Have stayed here previously and will stay again.

title: Very nice hotel, however we had a couple impacting issues
text: Overall the hotel was very nice, the rooms where clean and the staff was helpfull and friendly. However there was an issue with the wifi over the entirety of our four day stay, which impacted our overall experience, as someone from Europe who does not have any internet in the States, it was very difficult to fully enjoy our trip to the fullest. There was also an issue with the payment of the room, which was deducted twice, hopefully to be reimbursed soon.

title: My favorite place
text: always a great place to stay , been there for over 2 years now ... locations is great for me , love the new rooftop and restaurant and open area ..  actually enjoy all the Pod Hotel...  area around Pod 39 is great too

title: Pod 39: a melhor escolha sem dúvidas!
text:
Tivemos uma ótima experiência no Pod 39! Ficamos por 10 dias no hotel e nos sentimos acolhidos! O hotel é limpo, tem uma vibe jovem, seguro, com uma localização ótima (2 quadras da Grand Central) e um atendimento exemplar! Por perto tem 2 farmácias (CVS e Wallgreens), vários cafés como Dunkin, Starbucks e Le Pain Quotidien, e apesar de estar em uma área com diversas facilidades, ao mesmo tempo é uma região super tranquila e segura. Voltamos quase meia-noite da Times Square a pé e em nenhum momento tivemos medo. A limpeza é diária, basta colocar a sinalização na porta; o quarto é pequeno, mas já fomos cientes disso e em nenhum momento isso foi um problema, nos acostumamos com o espaço. Fiquei em uma beliche com meu irmão, e a cama é muito confortável e a roupa de cama também. 
O banheiro é ótimo e o chuveiro maravilhoso! No rooftop tem um bar que funciona como uma baladinha, mas em nada atrapalhou nosso sono (o isolamento acústico é muito bom!). Aliás, do nosso quarto tínhamos uma pequena vista do Empire State! 
Pela manhã, todos os dias tem café, leite (experimente o Cream!), chá e água a vontade. Esse, aliás, foi um dos fatores pra nossa escolha.  Um agradecimento especial ao pessoal da recepção: Bryan, Jamal, KG, Matthew, Eugene, e a camareira Aymee (acho que é assim o nome dela, ficamos no quarto 815 de 14 a 24 de Agosto), ela é incrível e super atenciosa! 
Trabalho há mais de 20 anos na área de atendimento e hospedagem, e fiquei muito satisfeita com a escolha do Pod 39, em nada deixaram a desejar! Parabéns a todos, não vemos a hora de voltar! 😊❤️

title: Good hotel
text: We had a nice stay in the hotel, the location was really good. We could walk to Grand Central and Bryant Park. We also enjoyed the rooftop bar, the view was really great. The service was also good, we had the opportunity to we leave our bags after check out.

title: Pod 39
text: I really enjoyed my stay at Pod 39. The staff was all very helpful and the location of the hotel is great! Take advantage of the rooftop bar and other amenities the hotel offers! If I ever visit NYC again I will be staying there again for sure!

title: Tutto perfetto!
text: Hotel situato in una posizione strategica vicino a gran central, a metro e treni, e molte zone facilmente raggiungibili anche a piedi. Zona molto tranquilla.  Hotel curato nei minimi dettagli, camere e bagni piccoli ma stra funzionali con tutto il necessario. Tutto molto pulito, ogni giorno pulizia della camera e cambio asciugamani. Sicuramente da consigliare.

title: The New York Experience
text: As goes with everything in New York, space is tight! However, if you're traveling alone or with one other person, Pod 39 provides a perfect balance of cost and comfort! I stayed in the single pod which met my needs of a bed and a bathroom for when my day of exploring was over. I had great service throughout my entire experience! Would highly recommend!

title: You get what you pay for
text: Inexpensive for NYC, so no frills, which is fine. Bedroom with glazed glass door to attached bathroom kind of gross watching each other on the toilet. We reserved two rooms. One had screeching AC, noise actually painful, and we asked for another room and they gave us one right away. Service is good.

title: Amazing location
text:
Close to almost everything, friendly staff, perfect rooftop bar.
Ping Pong tabels and pool tabel..possibility to store luggage before departure. Will visit again next time in NYC. Close to Grand central and not to far to walk to Broadway.

title: Great Pod Experience!!
text:
Perfect stay for one person!! Go for the single room... & at Pod 39, you get a private bathroom in your room. Yes, it's tiny, but space is well-used, with the combo table/shelf/closet rack piece, the desk, and the under-bed storage (big drawer & a space to store luggage). There's plenty of room for all of my stuff... & that's saying alot! I'm not known for travelling light & this time was worse as I drove to NY. The drawer & rack held all of my clothes & more. The bed was very comfy (I really need relief at the pressure points...I'm old...ish.) I kept a cooler in my room & made much use of the ice machine (which had no trouble servicing a full hotel in the heat of summer). The front-desk people were helpful & courteous in my experience. The cleaning staff on my floor were very courteous & friendly. It's a convenient walk to Grand Central, so I easily got where I needed to go each day. 
I know I'm gushing, but it's just the best deal in town for a clean, private room/bath in a nice hotel & location! I've also stayed at Pod 51 & loved it too. I was with my son, so we had a bunkbed room. There were shared hall baths on the floor. There were enough so that I never waited for one...& they're very clean. Your room key gets you into one & then you have full prviacy for toilet/shower. Otherwise, you have everything you need in your room (including a sink).
I think Pod 51 was a great option for 2 people, whereas this stay in my single at Pod 39 was great for 1 person. I agree with other reviews that the in-room baths wouldn't be so private if there are 2 of you in the room. 
LOVE the PODs!!

title: Everything we needed and nothing we didn't
text:
We stayed for 2 nights in a queen pod during the recent heat wave in NYC. The AC worked great! I like to keep the room cold when I sleep and I actually had to turn down the AC a bit. You would expect a small room to be stuffy, but it wasn't at all. It would have been nice to have a fan in the bathroom, but it wasn't a problem. 

The room was tiny but perfect for us, a couple in our 50s. It was clean, the bed and pillows very comfortable. The towels were good and plentiful. The bathroom was equipped with plenty of shampoo, conditioner and body wash. There was a small bar of soap for handwashing at the sink. There was a hairdryer too, but we didn't use it. I did use the desk to work for a few hours, but aside from that we were only there to sleep and shower. I really appreciated the free coffee available in the lobby in the mornings. 

Wifi was adequate for us. We only used it for basic internet browsing. Lighting was well thought out. Plenty of bright light with good, even coverage when you needed it and dimmers in both the bedroom and bathroom when you didn't want it bright. Reading sconces at the bed. 

I think my favorite aspect of the room was the minimal fabrics. No drapes, dust ruffles, bedcover or upholstery to collect dust and other icky stuff. Even the carpet was low-pile tiles that could easily be replaced in case of spills and stains. 

The staff is busy but friendly. We had to wait a bit to check-in while they were working behind the counter, but not a crazy long time. It's easy to get impatient after you've been traveling all day. 

We checked our bags on check-out day so we could spend more time in the city. No problems. 

Things to know: 

If there are two of you, you may want to bring one extra long charging cable (if you have one) for your phone; there was an outlet on only one side of the bed. The desk area had at least one USB charging port and a regular outlet, and some other ports I didn't pay attention to. 

If you are parking at the ICON garage, don't make a parking reservation on their website. The hotel discount only works for drive-up customers. They will valet park your car, so you must leave your key. They are really strict about the amount of time you leave your car there. If you are late picking it up, you have to pay for a whole additional day. You get 24 hours of parking for each hotel night you stay. If you start parking at 3:30 PM, you have until 3:30 PM on your hotel check-out day to retrieve your car.

title: Good value, no frills room
text: Nice hotel. Room was just right size for 1 person. Room was very basic, no frills. Decent place, very clean. Rooftop bar was nice too. Would recommend if you are traveling and want your own room. Too small for more than 1 person. Staff was friendly and helpful.

title: You are paying for the location.
text: I was expecting the rooms to be bigger. Me and my friends got a really small rooms. We used the rooms just for sleeping. I think the price we paid it’s not worth it. The location was pretty good, but the rooms disappointed me.

title: Everything you need, nothing you don't
text:
If you're like me, you don't spend your time in New York in your hotel room. It's pretty much a place to drop my bag, freshen up, shower, and sleep. I was very pleased with the price and location of this hotel. The room was clean and well appointed (I still had a spot to hang up my clothes for the theatre, and there are even drawers and luggage storage under the bed if you're traveling with a suitcase, I happened to be traveling light as this was a quick trip.)

The full pod might feel cramped if you are traveling as a couple, especially since the toilet/bathroom is a mere three feet from the bed (separated by a frosted glass sliding door). But as a solo traveler, this was everything I needed. I booked the room with a private bath, so can't speak to the shared bathroom situation firsthand. But from what I could glean, they are NOT "communal" baths like you'd see in a dorm. Instead, there are several on each floor, but they are for one person to use at a time. So they are shared, but still very much private. If you are traveling as a couple or group and are budget-conscious, the bunk or single pods utilizing the shared bathrooms seems like an excellent choice.
