The other guests were of mix of business people and tourists. There is a front door man  and another man in the lobby at night for security. In the elevator there was a badge reader that you needed to press your room card against to be allowed to press the button for your floor.  When I checked out at noon, they automatically offered to store my luggage for the rest of the day until I went to the airport. The price was moderate for NYC and good value for the money. I highly recommend this hotel and I will go back again.

title: Friendly, well located hotel. Perfect for the solo traveler
text:
The twin room is small (it IS a Pod hote), but it is clean and well appointed and they use the space well. I opted for a private bathroom. To be clear...it's more like a nook, but it's in the room and it was clean and nice. It feels a little weird, but I was the only one there, so it's fine. My one quibble was the water pressure in the shower wasn't great, but that could have been my luck, or just bad timing. It is not a deal breaker by any means.

They have a very cool looking rooftop bar, which I didn't use since it rained the whole time. But I did try the restaurant and the Tacos Pastor and Blood Margarita were great!

The location is great. It's 20 minutes walking to Port Authority and to Times Square/Theater District. 

I think the hotel is a great option for the solo traveler. It's NYC, so it's going to be a bit pricey overall.  

Just informationally...there is a Facilities fee, which they add, in my case, when you book. There is also a $30 a night security fee, which you will get back at the end. Again, not deal breakers. But just things to know ahead of time.

title: Tiny Room
text: Be aware: these rooms are very small. We stayed in a room with a queen sized bed and the room was just a bit larger than the bed. The space between the foot of the bed and the desk area was approx. 12 inches, which made going to the bathroom in the middle of the night an adventure. The room was clean and quiet, possibly because it was at the end of a hallway, away from the elevators. The fan in the bathroom didn’t work and the shampoo bottle was empty, which is not a deal breaker if you just want a cheap place to sleep. Make no mistake, this is a budget hotel.

title: Terraza cerrada
text: Hotel céntrico y con cosas positivas como su bar y cocina, lástima que la terraza que fuera de lo que más nos ayudó a elegir este hotel, estaba cerrada. Incómodo también el sonido del extractor de aire de la habitación que no se podía desconectar. Imagina las noches si eres de sueño ligero.

title: A cozy hotel, great as a base of operations
text: I purposely got away for a weekend to concentrate on my writing, and this hotel suited my needs perfectly. Whether you need a lack of distractions (like I did) or you need to use this as a place to stay while exploring the city, it’s perfect either way.  Being only a hop and a skip and a jump away from Grand Central Station itself is also an undeniable plus.

title: Great value
text:
Very functional and quiet room. Not big but clean, not fancy but suitable. Highly recommended! The rooms are really small so don't bring too much luggage ;-)
It's located close to Central Station and therefore makes trips to all areas of Manhattan easy.

title: Very convenient place.
text: The rooms were clean and very tidy. The staff at the reception were very friendly and co-operative. The hotel is close to Grand Central and very convenient to travel to any part of the city. Value for money.

title: buon hotel nei pressi della central station
text: buon hotel nei pressi della central station. Camere piccole,ma funzionali. Pulizia ottima. Bar comodo per la colazione a pagamento,anche se con poca scelta. Le stanze sulla parte posteriore sono silenziose. Bellissimo attico panoramico con bar e vista. Staff non collaborativo. Colazione da migliorare come varietà e orari : non si possono avere bevande calde dopo le 11 a.m. Alcune stanze risultano rumorose causa l'aspiratore che non si può spegnere.

title: do not give your credit card to this hotel at check in
text:
At check in, i gave my credit card for blocking amount for incidentals; it was clearly mentioned to me that the amount to be blocked is 60$ (or 100$ for cash)

they blocked 400$, see below CITI alerts
You have spent USD 125.97 on 05/05/2019, at THE POD 39 HOTEL
You have spent USD 165.16 on 04/05/2019, at THE POD 39 HOTEL
You have spent USD 105.90 on 04/05/2019, at THE POD 39 HOTEL

when highlighted to your staff, no apology beyond it is a system issue. I was asked as well in rude manner :"what do you want ...."

still trying to get my money back.

title: Good Hotel and good location
text:
The hotel is in a good location, away from the manic Times Square area but only 15 mins walk from there and the Empire State Building and plenty of Coffee shops, Deli’s and Bars in the area.
The hotel is neat, a great rooftop bar and downstairs bar and very friendly and helpful staff who are always happy to help. The rooms are compact as you’d expect in a ‘Pod’ but very clean and modern. A great stay and highly recommended as a base to explore a great city!

title: great loation
text: Rooms are small but I don't go to NYC to sit around the hotel. Staff was pleasant and the location can't be beat. It's only a few blocks from Grand Central Station so subway access is easy, you can walk to Times Square and restaurants serving many different kinds of food. A few black from the Chrysler Building, so you see it every time you go outside. It's crazy how much art there is in NYC and how good the restaurants are.

title: Härlig vistelse trots trånga rum!
text: Rent och fräscht hotell med trevlig och hjälpsam personal och härlig bar. Hotellet är bra beläget för att upptäcka Manhattan. Bra att vara förberedd på att rummen är väldigt små dock, även om man bokar de ”större” rummen.

title: Pod 39, where comfort meet kindness
text: The hotel is placed in an awesome position, near Grand Central Station and only few blocks from Times Square. Nightlife is great in all New York City, but is amazing in the Pod 39 rooftop bar!!! The staff is nice and well skilled in managing the Customer's needs. All the structure is clean, room and public spaces as well. I strongly recommend this hotel and his staff.

title: Rude/ theft
text: During my stay at the hotel , I used to smoke at the roof and take the buds with me downstairs to throw in the bin. After I left the hotel took $250 for smoking inside the room without telling me before they do. When I contacted them , the person was very very RUDE! I feel very unsafe due to the hotel using my card without my permission.

title: Absolute best value in Midtown Manhattan!
text:
The perfect hotel for a week's stay in New York! Super central and close to everything via walking or subway. The hotel staff were very friendly and accommodating, room was spotless, modern and spacious enough (given that Manhattan hotel rooms are notoriously tiny). The storage space is a little tight, but Pod provides hangers and shelves that served us just fine. As others have said, the glass bathroom doors are not the most private, but as long as you're comfortable with your roommate it's not a big issue. The beds were super comfy, and the in-room temperature controls were great as well. The room was peaceful and quiet--we barely heard any street noise or noise from the hallway/other guests. Overall, we loved this hotel--it's the kind of place that's perfect for a cozy rest before going out to see the city. If you plan on staying in your room the whole time it may be a bit cramped for you, but in New York, who wants to do that anyway?

I will definitely be recommending Pod to any friends looking for a comfortable, affordable and chic stay in NYC!

title: Great Stay
text: Pod 39 was perfect for a weekend of city exploring with a friend. Room was modern and very clean. Every body at the front desk and was very friendly and accommodating. Aloud me to check in early and also held onto my luggage after check out. The only thing that I would say about the room that wasn’t a true positive is that room was a little small but not even complaining I knew that going in, it’s a “Pod”. Stayed in one of the bunk bed pods and it was perfect for two who just needed a clean place to sleep. Location was great, plenty of life within the neighborhood (Murray Hill). Bars, restaurants, etc. Close to all the great midtown tourist sights and just down the road from from Grand Central, so super easy to jump on a subway and get anywhere needed. Will definitely be coming back.

title: Single room on 7th floor
text:
My room had a strange system to regulate water temperature: only one tap which regulates temp while the water pressure is the same. OK to wash hands, but not convenient with body 'cos you have to reach for the tap and at the beginning it starts to pour cold water on your hand.
Everything else is perfect.

title: NYC getaway
text: We had a fantastic stay in Pod39 in April 19'. Staff were very helpful & extremely friendly. Rooms were spotless and fabulously set up with everything you need. We would return to this hotel if we went to NYC again and would definitely recommend it to couples as it us in a perfect location and it's a very cool hotel.

title: Excelente hotel!
text: A localização é ótima. Próximo à estação Grand Central e com várias opções de alimentação. Quartos muito limpos e organizados. É pequeno sim, mas excelente, tudo muito limpo e organizado. O que deixou a desejar foi o atendimento das recepcionistas, pois não eram gentis.

title: They double charged us!
text: Charged in check in, again charged us in the middle of our stay and again on check out. When questioned they say it’s standard procedure and that money will be refunded within a week. Sadly it takes way longer or does not even come. They now don’t reply to my emails too. Give it a miss unless you don’t mind haggling over your credit card bill

title: Charged me extra for no reason
text: Careful of your card transactions, double check every time, I had read the review earlier but still thought it was a one off case. Guess what I got charged extra too. Now, they refuse to answer emails or concerns.

title: Posizione ideale!
text: Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel a fine marzo. Posizione ottima a pochi minuti a piedi dal Grand Central Terminal e da altre attrazioni. Stanza piccola ma pulita! I ragazzi della reception gentili. Lo consiglio!

title: Cheats, dont bother or be very careful of their card transactions.
text:
SO we had booked 5 rooms for a week in May 2018. The hotel per say was ok for New York standards, and their location is what is very good.
The staff keep changing and nobody has a clue of whats going if the shift changes.
We got charged for an extra room which is about 1500 USD!!
At first they replied to my emails, but now nobody bother to acknowledge anything and they dont even reply!

Please do not book here unless you dont mind being charged extra.

title: Buena experiencia. Si tuviese que volver, repetiría
text:
La habitación algo pequeña pero suficiente si lo único que haces es pasar el día fuera e ir a dormir. La cama es muy cómoda. 
La ubicación excelente, a 2 manzanas del metro de la Grand Central Station y muy accesible, ta bien, si quieres visitar la ciudad caminando. 
El precio caro pero como todo en New York.

title: Ok
text: Good location in Midtown. Cheap for New York. Rooms were clean with all amenities. However they are very small, smaller than we realized. It was a good job we were out all day and literally fell into bed. Was really disappointed that the rooftop wasn't open. It was one of the reasons we stayed here because it looked great on the internet. I think guests should be made aware if it's not going to be open before they book. Makes me wonder what the non refundable service charge was for exactly? Staff were friendly enough when we needed them.Our stay was okay but that's about it really. I wouldn't say more than that and to be honest I wouldn't stay again as for similar prices I have stayed in nicer. If you want a good location, affordable and just need a base for sleep then go for it.

title: Pod 39
text:
We absolutely loved this place. Great location, property and great staff. Very clean and quiet room. We WILL be staying there again. Hopefully many more times. 
 HIGHLY recommend this place!! Great neighborhood too by the way.

title: Small but very efficient rooms.
text: I really liked Pod39. The rooms are very small but extremely efficient and clean. Has everything you need. We only stayed one night, so we weren't able to go to the go to the lobby bar, which looked very cool. We would definitely stay again, hopefully when the weather is warm so we can try the roof top bar.

title: Bom custo X benefício
text: É um hotel relativamente novo, que está localizado a menos de 10min a pé da estação central. Possui bar, rooftop (que infelizmente não estava aberto durante nossa estada) e concierge. O atendimento foi muito bom. O quarto é super pequeno, mas já imaginávamos que seria assim. Pelo menos o banheiro tem um bom tamanho; a única coisa que não é agradável é a cortina em vez de box. Mas no geral foi uma boa experiência, pois a tarifa que pagamos foi compatível com o que foi recebido.

title: Functional and well located.
text:
Family holiday from the UK to experience NYC.  Very handily placed, a 10 minute walk from Grand Central Subway.  
Fast and easy check in.
Rooms (we had two) were very clean, functional and all that we needed as somewhere to crash after a long day hitting the sights.
Bar was expensive, (isn't every hotel), but good choice of beers and a huge selection of toquilla available.
We didn't eat at the hotel, we found a little deli just around the corner (Everyday Gourmet Cafe on Lexington Avenue that cooked easy fast food.
Would I stay here again - yes, for business or pleasure, this place is great.

title: Séjour concluant !
text:
Nous avons passé 5 nuits dans cet hôtel. 
Les + : propreté de la chambre/sdb et toilettes, localisation (à 5 minutes à pieds de Grand Central et donc du métro, 15 minutes de Times Square/Empire State B.), amabilité et disponibilité du personnel 
Les - : chambre très exiguë et promiscuité évidente (WC dans la sdb séparés par une vitre donnant sur la chambre), manque de rangement (très difficile d’ouvrir sa valise...), un peu bruyant (bruits de chaufferie la nuit).
Pour le temps passé dans notre chambre, nous avons trouvé que les + l’emportaient tout de même !

title: Limpio  y muy bien ubicado
text: El hotel está en una zona que todo queda cerca.  Las condiciones de limpieza son optimas. El espacio es pequño pero esta bien diseñado, tiene una azotea muy agradable y un buen restaurante con buena comida.

title: Geweldig
text: Geweldig hotel op geweldige locatie! Kleine kamer maar alles wat je nodig hebt en heel proper. Alles op wandelafstand of 5minuten wandelen tot de metro. Fijne lounge en toffe rooftopbar maken het helemaal af. De wifi werkt prima!

title: Frozen medication
text: In September my husband and I stayed at this hotel, seeing as there is no fridge in the room, I labelled my medication and the reception took responsibility for putting it in their medication fridge. They put it at the very back and it froze. I was pregnant with twins and in the early stages and the medication was to ensure I didn’t have a miscarriage as I have had 4 previously. I was furious and they didn’t even care that they put my babies lives at risk. Will NEVER go back.

title: Great hotel!
text: Great location, great atmosphere, great hotel! Would recommend. Close tot grand central terminal, time square, empire state building and subway hub. Nice staff, practical hitel with small but useful rooms. Would certainly stay at this hotel again.

title: Small but perfectly formed
text: Snug rooms but functional if you are staying to sightsee rather than rest in your room. Shower hot...bed comfy.....cleaned beautifully...friendly helpful staff....safe in room...TV....plenty if plug sockets for charging

title: Great hotel in a perfect location
text: What a great room in a perfect location and an excellent price. My single room was comfortable, cozy and had everything I needed for a week long stay. The room was modern, well equipped and clean. Shower and toilet all was well placed and perfect. A very comfortable bed and the hotel was quiet! You can't beat the Murray Hill neighborhood on the East Side for convenience  - easy walk to subway, Grand Central Station and restaurants and pubs all nearby. Love, love, love this hotel.

title: Sentralt, men utrolig små rom og små senger.
text:
Overraskende små rom, knøttsmå dobbeltsenger og badet var nesten en forlengelse av sengen . Veldig bra beliggenhet! 
Hyggelig bar og hyggelig og hjelpsom betjening. 
Mange gode restauranter i gangavstand . 
Kort vei til kommunikasjon, gangavstand til mange severdigheter og 5th.avenue..

title: Visit to New York City.
text: Excellent experience! Very friendly staff. Early check in was awesome and they held our luggage when we checked out at no extra charge so we could do more in the city before heading to Grand Central which was a few blocks away. Bar and restaurant on ground floor was convenient and a rooftop bar that unfortunately wasn’t opened yet but would have been fun. The only con was that the bathroom has frosted glass doors that don’t really close totally so not that private if you are one for privacy. Will definitely stay here again 😊

title: Péssimo!!!
text:
Além do quarto ser claustrofóbico e de não preservar nem a intimidade no banheiro, tem um daqueles sistemas de ar-condicionado que fazem ruídos semelhantes a um alarme durante a noite toda. Para brindar a péssima experiência que tive, um funcionário do hotel ainda quebrou a minha mala nova porque a deixou cair com o puxador aberto e ainda disse com uma arrogância ímpar que não poderia fazer nada quanto a isso.

Reclamei na recepção e me devolveram 90 dólares, o que não deve pagar nem pelo conserto.

Enfim... Pod 39 nunca mais.

title: No conocen la palabra cortesía; por el mismo precio hay hoteles mucho mejores
text: Hotel caro carente de todo servicio. Algunas personas del staff son amables, pero todo cuesta y mucho. Las habitaciones son apenas básicas, la limpieza es apenas suficiente. Por ese precio hay hoteles mucho mejores y que al menos incluyen una simple taza de café para los huéspedes (aquí me cobraron 3 dólres un toque de leche para mi café). Muy decepcionante la calidad del servicio.

title: Some good but quite a bit bad
text:
The positive:
- They accommodated early check-in.
- Quiet location by NY standards
- Lots of outlets in room for charging
- Nice bunk room setup

The negative:
- There was something in bathroom (sink & shower) that appeared to be mold, though I'm not a scientist (see pix)
- Some areas of room were dusty (see pix, the diff in appearance is where I dusted off with my finger)
- The great rooftop is currently advertised as an amenity on the site (see screenshot) but it's a construction zone & closed).
- They were unhelpful on late check-out. They said the room needed to be cleaned at noon for new guest but they could've maybe given another hour since cleaning didn't seem too thorough anyway.
- The room phone receiver didn't work
- Woke up very warm & stuffy ok night 2. It seems housekeeping turned A/C completely off when cleaning. It had been on the night before as well as upon check-in. I hadn't noticed they turned it off.
- There were 2 TVs, one on each bunk. They both had an odd 1 sec delay bw audio and video, pretty weird when watching something.
- Shower curtain odd. Flimsy & had no weight at the bottom so when turn on shower the steam makes it basically sweep in and attack your ankles (see pic)

title: Convenient location and very friendly environment
text: I stayed there for a week as I was in New York for work. The location is great, the staff is very friendly and rooms are clean. I'd definitely recommend it to solo travelers looking for a cozy environment.

title: Great Little Hotel
text:
Had a great stay here. Great location. Went out daily for breakfast to pick up coffee and pastries  on Lexington at either Dunkin Donut or Bagel Express or Maison Kayser (pricey for treats and coffee). 
Olaf at the front desk was terrific and helped us out several times, including helping me to get the wifi going on my phone.
Rooms are small but clean and modern. The bathroom walls are glass with half frosted glass and therefore might not be the best if you are not comfortable sharing in some circumstances.
The bar is cozy and we got free drink coupons.  Will stay here again.

title: Cozy  and Cool
text:
Arrived a few hours before check-in. The front desk people were very pleasant and helpful. We were able store our bags and head out to see the sights (right before grabbing a quick drink at the bar...the bartender was also super friendly and even fixed me my favorite drink despite not being familiar with the name). Conveniently located near Grand Central and about a 15 min walk to Times Sq and the theater district. The room was VERY small. We had the bunk bed pod (1 rm w/bath). Since it’s NYC you’re probably not going to mind the size since you’re just there to sleep. 

Pros: clean, location, friendly staff, TVs for each bunk, comfy beds

Cons: the frosted glass bathroom door. The door doesn’t leave much room for privacy. In a small space it could get awkward if you’re not REALLY comfy with your roommate!

title: Le prix d'une chambre de luxe pour une chambre de bonne.
text:
Les chambres que nous avions retenues (au vue des photos) au prix de 184$ la nuit étaient beaucoup trop exiguës nous avons du payer une rallonge de 10$ par jour pour une chambre certes plus grande sans aucun rangement avec un lit double fixe auquel il fallait accéder d'un seul coté.
De plus ces chambres sont situées à coté des ascenseurs, et elles sont très bruyantes.
Mauvais choix et images des chambres trompeuses à déconseiller formellement.

title: Great budget hotel with everything you could need
text: I stayed here with my sister for 5 nights in one of the bunk rooms. The rooms were small but perfectly functional, with everything you could need for a short stay in the city. The only thing we found was that the glass door to the bathroom (despite being frosted) meant that the bathrooms weren’t overly private! The hotel itself is in a great location only a couple of blocks from Grant Central Station where you can catch the subway to virtually anywhere. If you’re happy to walk then it only takes around 20 minutes to walk to Broadway/Times Square and not much further to Central Park. The Empire State Building is just over 5 minutes away. The hotel also has a rooftop bar and restaurant which is really handy and the staff are all really helpful and friendly. This is somewhere we would definitely stay again if we were visiting New York as it was comfortable, convenient and significantly cheaper than all the other places we had looked at.

title: Little room.... but overall good!
text: We stayed in a room with a queen bed and it was SMALL. I stayed with my boyfriend and we struggled fitting both luggages in the room and walking around. The bathroom had see through glass that’s give you a straight shot of the toilet. If you’re not okay with the person you’re staying with seeing you do your business, I wouldn’t share a room. Having a taco/margarita restaurant in the hotel was great... we got al pastor tacos to go probably every night. Was disappointed the rooftop bar wasn’t open... of course we came the week BEFORE construction was over. Overall it was a good experience, great location (also close to Central Station where you can buy food and alcohol until 10 pm) and would recommend. Just be warned, if you like privacy or need a ton of space for luggage, etc. this might not be the best place for you.

title: Confortable
text: Ha sido una estancia de 8 noches estupenda. Todo el personal ha sido muy amable con nosotros y la habitación muy confortable, es pequeña pero tiene todo lo necesario. Tambien destacaría la limpieza de todo el hotel. Sin duda recomendamos la estancia en el Pod39.

title: La grande meraviglia!
text: Ho trascorso con mia figlia 5 notti in questo albergo.Ho trovato quello che avevo letto nelle recensioni,camera piccola ma pulita, cambio delle lenzuola e asciugamani giornaliero!Ottima posizione.Note negative:il condizionatore rumoroso e per essere precisa la hall nelle foto sembra molto più grande di quello che non è! Non siamo riuscite ad andare sulla terrazza al 17 piano perché in ristrutturazione.Comunque qualità/prezzo ok! Consiglio questo albergo!

title: Great location, tiny rooms
text: This hotel is nice looking and comfortable. It is in a great location, surrounded by terrific restaurants. Grand Central Station is a short walk away. The staff is friendly, and checking in and out was easy and quick. The rooms are small and spartan, but the tech works and the bathrooms are modern and clean.

title: Good Option
text: I’d give this place 4 stars if the rooms offered even a smidge of bathroom privacy.  The door is clear sliding glass with some fogging from middle down. May as well not even be there. Other than that, the place was clean, well maintained. Staff was very helpful and professional. Great location in a safe neighborhood. Rooms are glorified closets but that’s why the price point is more affordable than most places nearby.

title: Right size in the right location
text:
The room was a single and it was small. I had a desk, a private, modern bathroom, and a place to hang my clothes. The size was adequate for my needs as I only used the room for sleeping and refreshing myself.

Everything was clean and modern. The staff was polite and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

title: A Little Gem
text:
Wanted to experience a no frills, small room hotel. Wanted to have an adventure and chose the mini bunk bed room. It was great!!! 
Staff were helpful, professional and very friendly. Our visit to NYC was to see Metropolitan Museum of Art, so this east side location was perfect. The restaurant Momosan was around the corner (I have Morimoto's cookbook and was dying to have noodles). Concierge recommended another restaurant which was excellent, Nirvana, Indian cuisine, also around the corner. We travelled by train from Vermont so we did not have a car to park. As we were out all day, the small room was not a problem. Beds were really comfortable, bathroom was a good size. Rather quiet neighborhood for NYC.

title: 48 hour Visit to New York
text:
Favorite location.  Close to Grand Central and subway.  Secure with card access required for elevator.  Fun bar areas and terrific rooftop.  

I prefer the queen pod since it feels open, offers more space than a bunk pod or single pod.  NIce hot water, clean, quiet and excellent front desk.

title: Só para dormir!
text:
O Pod 39 é um hotel conceito que fica localizado ao lado da Grand Central Station, o que é ótimo, e a poucos minutos a pé do Empire State.
É bem pequeno e os quartos são minúsculos. O banheiro é menor que minúsculo e a cortina no chuveiro é de irritar após um dia batendo perna. Após o banho, o banheiro fica inundado!
A cama é confortável, mas o quarto é tão pequeno que mal cabem 2 malas médias e as mochilas.
Tem um bar no rooftop lindo, que só descobrimos no dia do check-out. Ninguém nos avisa que tem uma balada lá,  fique esperto.
O concierge é muito atencioso e tenta te explicar sempre a melhor forma de chegar onde precisas.

title: Hotel ideal
text: La habitación con cama doble sumamente cómoda. El espacio suficiente, para una una sola persona ideal. Televisor , caja fuerte y un baño muy lindo y cómodo cubriendo todas las necesidades. Secador de pelo y amenities. Hotel muy moderno y cómodo. La ubicación en el centro cerca del subte pero a la noche no había mucho movimiento quizás pudo haber influido el frío . Volvería sin dudarlo!!! Ya que el precio muy acorde a los servicios y la atención!!

title: Posizione ottima
text: Ideale per poter raggiungere le principali attrazioni a piedi. Posto confortevole e pulito! Personale gentile. Lo consiglierei sicuramente... posto da tenere in considerazione per un b futuro viaggio.

title: Hinta/laatusuhde oli 10+
text:
Oltiin vaimon kanssa viikko Pod 39 hotellissa ja täytyy sanoa että oli lähes täydellinen. Hinta oli yli 1000€ viikko halvempi kun muut vastaavat. Huone oli äärimmäisen siisti, kiitos siivoojalle. Hitusen oli pieni, mutta kuitenkin täysin riittävä 2 ihmiselle. Ainoastaan vessa/suihku saattaa olla ongelma joillekkin. Suoraan sängystä metrin päässä oli lasiovet, vähän oli keskivaiheilla maitolasia ettei ihan läpi näe jos toinen istuu pöntöllä tai on suihkussa. Sängyt oli hyvät, huoneen lämpötila oli hyvä vaikka suihkussa oli kylmä johtuen ikkunasta. 

Hotellin sijainti oli äärimmäisen kätevässä paikassa, käytännössä pystyi kävelemään helposti Central Parkiin, Time Squarelle, Empire State Buildingille ja Flatiron buildingille. Starbucksit, halvat take away pizzapaikat ja aamupalakahvilat oli ihan nurkan takana.

Hotellilta saa oman autokyydin mennen tullen JFK:lle, suunta on 65$

Jos matkustan uudelleen New Yorkiin niin aivan varmasti valitsen Hotel Pod 39 uudelleen.

title: Une auberge de jeunesse améliorée
text:
Nous avons séjourné 5 nuits au Pod 39.
Cet hôtel est très bien placé et permet de visiter Manhattan à pied.
Le personnel est plutôt agréable.
Les parties communes sont avenantes.
Cependant les chambres sont extrêmement petites, environ 8 m2, salle de douche comprise. On ne peut donc qu’y dormir. De plus la climatisation est bruyante et on a l’impression d’avoir l’oreille contre un réfrigérateur.
Difficile aussi d’y prendre le petit-déjeuner car au bout de 3 jours ils n’avaient plus de thé et ont été incapables de se réapprovisionner !
Enfin il faut savoir que pour un prix annoncé de 165,30 $ la nuit, les taxes supplémentaires sont de 27,88 $ et on vous facture de surcroît une « facility fee » de 22,95 $, dont on ne sait pas à quoi elle correspond, mais que vous ne pouvez pas refuser, ce qui fait un total de 216,13 $ !

title: Excellent value !
text: Good atmosphere with the taqueria downstairs and the roof bar. The rooms are small but very clean (we had a room with the bunk beds and was perfect for two friends). We didn't have a lot of privacy but this is definitely a great value for money.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Muy limpio, muy bien ubicado. Excelente atención!! Muy recomendable. El precio es muy razonable, si sacas con anticipación. La grand station esta a 2 cuadras literal, y podes irte a donde quieras. La verdad muy buena experiencia

title: Bonne Localisation mais chambres très exigues
text:
La localisation sur 39th à hauteur de Lexington est top. L'accueil est sympa mais ça dépend des interlocuteurs, bonne conciergerie. Par contre les chambres sont très petites et le chauffage très bruyant. éviter les étages inférieurs au 10.
point très désagréable la salle de bain: une parois vitrée tout juste floutée sépare le lit et la salle de bain: pourquoi pas pour la douche mais pour les toilettes...
Le bar est très sympa mais les prix élevés comme partout à NYC

title: Excellent rapport qualité prix
text: Un bel accueil très agréable. Tout le personnel de l’hôtel est gentil et agréable et serviable. Un resto et un bar sympa dans l’hôtel. Une chambre, petite certes mais propre et calme, bonne literie. Très bien placé proche métro et « Grand Central ». Pas cher en comparaison d’autres hôtels aux alentours.

title: Ótimo clima , bonito e funcional
text: Perfeito para NY. Pequeno mas muito limpo. Ótima cama e chuveiro. Decoração de bom gosto. Sem filas para check in e check out. A localização também é ótima. Não fica na Times Square, mas em uma região muito boa e central.

title: Must be my third or fourth stay here, would recommend
text: Yes the rooms are small (really small) but they're clean, safe and have everything that you need. Staff are always great and check in/out is efficient. As a base for seeing NYC it's hard to beat. Never had any problems here. Nearest subway is central station (about 5 minute walk). Lots of coffee shops, fast food restaurants around.

title: Second time at Pod 39! Our spot in NYC
text: This was our second time at Pod 39. Since our first visit to NYC, this budget hotel became the best option for our visits to the big Apple. Their service and amenities are the must-have things we really need to hang out and enjoy the many different activities we can do in New York. Their location is very convenient to be close (but not to much) of the main City attractions and to explore other Manhattan neighborhoods well-known by their nightlife and restaurants. Totally recommend for people who love to explore the city by walking, by subway and public transportation

title: Clean basic hotel, great location
text: Location is great, very Central. Rooms are basic but everything you need is there. It can be noisy as rooms are close to each other. Nice rooftop and view. Good value for money if you want to stay in Manhattan.

title: More centrally located than pod 51
text: Take a careful look at the small pictures since the rooms are clean and beds comfortable but there is barely enough space to move. I wonder how they manage to clean and vaccum since miniscule. Bathroom is small but excellently clean.

title: Great budget-friendly option in the heart of NYC
text:
The rooms might be a little small, but the amenities are great. The bathrooms are a great size and towels, shampoo, hair dryer (etc) are provided. Everything was very clean and the check in/out process was so easy. One thing I love about this hotel is that they don't charge you to store your luggage if you're catching a late train/plane/bus and want to explore more the day you check out.

This hotel is great if you don't actually plan on spending a whole lot of time in the hotel and you're just using it as a home base. It's very close to Grand Central and a lot of things are walkable!

title: Good budget hotel.
text:
The hotel is in a great location, a 5 minute walk from Grand Central. Rooms are small but have all the basic facilities you will need I.e. hairdryer, shampoo, towels, TV and a safe. 

The aircon is a little loud, but easy to turn off. 

There’s a bar downstairs that sometimes has happy hour for lower priced wines and beer.

title: Perfect location and wonderful concierge
text: The rooms are small but have everything one needs.  The location is perfect.  Best of all the concierge, Kadeney, gave us wonderful suggestions for eating and getting around that made our trip even more special.

title: Bom custo benefício
text:
A localização é ótima! Perto da Grand Central Terminal, dá para ir andando até a Times. 
O quarto um pouco apertado, mas tudo novinho, bem limpo e organizado. 
O hotel possui um bar e restaurante bem legal.

title: Muito bom
text: Vale muito a pena pela localização, quarto pequeno mas bem dividido e bem limpo. Ficamos no segundo andar e alguns barulhos acabaram incomodando um pouco. Mas fomos bem atendidos por todos os funcionários.

title: Una settimana a New York
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel una settimana. Posizione ottima, comoda per tutte le zone principali.. 
Hotel e stanza sempre puliti.. al piano terra dispone di due bar, uno aperto alla mattina per colazione e l’altro aperto a pranzo e sera.. con ampia scelta di piatti e cocktail! 
Personale molto disponibile e gentile!
Consigliatissimo!

title: Mini adventure in a mini bunk
text: For a clean quiet place to rest your head in Manhattan the price can't be beat. Great neighborhood location very convenient to Grand Central station. The small size was just right for an adult and child, and the bunk with it's own tv was a major highlight for my 10-year-old.

title: Lovely stay in excellent location
text:
My daughter and I stayed here for 4 nights. upon arrival the guy with dreads from Bronxs was real cool - i didnt get your name sorry who checked us in was really friendly and polite. He explained everything about the hotel including the extra service charge which you get back after your stay.  We requested a top floor and that's what we got- room 1501 which was opposite the lift but it didn't disturb our sleep one bit. Our room was much spacious than the pics online so we were happy, and on all nights had a good nights sleep as the bed was really comfortable. the only downside was there wasn't  enough space to hang clothes - however we didnt mind leaving our clothes in our suitcases so no big deal.
We didn't eat at the hotel but the smell from the kitchen everyday was amazing  I can however recommend the cocktails 10/10.
The location is amazing as its within walking distance from Empire state building, times square, Crysler building and fifth avenue all within 20 minutes walk tops!
Our room was cleaned everyday with fresh towels. 
The hotel is definitely good value for money with loads of restaurants, bars, coffee houses, fast food joints in a great location what more could you want in NYC?!
Would definitely recommend and visit again if ever in Manhattan

title: Expected basic, was pleasantly surprised
text: I was expecting a no fuss, no frills kind of stay. I loved this hotel! They gave us a free upgrade on arrival. Rooms are small (as expected) but cleverly laid out so you're not tripping over your suitcase. I found the bed and pillows really comfortable and the rain shower was a nice touch. We were pretty tired so had dinner in the hotel one night and really enjoyed it. There's a nice lounge/sitting area to read the paper in if you're after a slow start to the day/ time out. The location is incredibly convenient to Grand Central Station.

title: Sejour inoubliable
text: Hôtel très sympa et branché (rooftop digne des séries américaines)! En plein cœur de Manhattan pas loin de Time Square (équipez vous de TRÈS bonnes baskets on marche beaucoup la bas). La literie est bonne, la chambre est propre mais très petite! Petit conseil, il y a très peu d'intimité, ne partez pas avec quelqu'un que vous voulez séduire vu la proximité des toilettes et du lit :D

title: Decepcionante
text:
Se vc pensa que as fotos ilustradas são todas do POD 39, está enganado.
Front desk foi nada atencioso na minha chegada, dia 14 à noite 
Fizeram reserva num shuttle que ia para outro aeroporto! Tive que morrer em 200 dólares de táxi para ir para o aeroporto certo!
Quarto minúsculo é caro para o Quênia oferece
Não é Barato e que sai caro!

title: Friendly staff but a totally disastrous stay.
text: At check-in the adjoining rooms we requested when booking were not available. We had to stay our first night in a room that was not adjoining with our children. The staff moved us to adjoining rooms for our second night, which was a bit of a hassle because of packing everything up and putting our bags in storage for the day. We arrived in our adjoining rooms to find that our room was flooded by a leak in the room above us and the carpet was soaking wet. There were no other rooms available and the only wet vac in the hotel was being used in the room that caused the flood. While they offered to bring the wet vac to our room after it finished upstairs, it would have been at 11 pm, much too late to be running machines in our room with our children sleeping. The staff did their best but it was a pretty miserable stay. Not a happy birthday for me as intended!

title: Small but nice
text: Stayed one night in NYC for a business function and got this last minute through Hitels.com- very small rooms but clean and quiet. Not somewhere I would stay for a couple days but for one night it was great. Shower in room was also small but clean.

title: Comfortable and Quiet
text: Enjoyable three-days stay, room was clean, with a view. The bed was comfortable, along with a private bath. Was a pleasant surprise with the staff and security, helpful and informative. Hotel was close to restaurants.

title: A box with bed & shower
text:
Well, not the worst possible option for a lone business traveler, but, you know, be prepared. The rooms are tiny and design is quite spartan, and while overall it's clean, it does leave a "cheap" impression. 

But that's not the worst part. The worst thing, by far, is the aircon. It's noisy, and when I'm saying noisy, I mean more than you can fix with a pair of earplugs. When it's on, it blows hot air into your face like a hairdryer (and no, there is no way to avoid it) and dries up the air to Sahara desert levels, when it's off the room gets rather cold with a constant drift from the window. The bed is located right under the window so that either you breathe cool air and have your feet in warmth, or you turn around and now your feet are freezing. Getting a good night sleep here is a challenge...
Hot water in the shower never quire reaches the desired temperature, which is a problem in winter.

Among the good things, wi-fi is free and very quick, apart from the aircon the noise levels are quite low, and the bed is rather comfy. Location is great as well...

But, I'd only stay here in case of a very tight budget.

title: Price and Location Can't Be Beat
text:
Stayed five nights in a Queen Pod with my bf. Location is excellent - next to Grand Central subway lines so easy to get really anywhere. Close to Midtown/Times Square/Koreatown...everything really walkable here. We also took the train (bus) to JFK and LGA and it was not too bad (not so many stairs honestly)...and we even had big bags! Convenience store on the corner and bigger CVS/Duane Reade up 2 blocks. 

The room price as you know can't be beat. The room was clean and in good condition. We didn't eat at the hotel bar - BUT we did end up at the same restaurant in the East Village by accident and had draft beers 7-10$ each. But NYC is just pricey for food, so suck it up and just pay haha.

Hotel staff was ok. Not rude, but not overly friendly. I noticed their interaction with a blind guest in the lobby which was a bit disappointing - they kind of ignored her as she was just standing there. No one came in to help her from the door which they should have to guide her.

They offer digital services through phone/computer if you connect to wifi... but we waited like 20 minutes after we requested a towel. I honestly forgot I requested them.  Also, on the first day at check in the body wash was not full. Waited 20 minutes for them to bring a new one (had to call twice).

Bed comfortable but bedding thin and pillows a bit on the softer side. Room also drafty from the windows/wall noticeably cold.

Would I come here again? Absolutely. This hotel feels a good need - not a hostel, not a full service hotel. Just a place to lay your head and that we did. 

One MAJOR complaint: No bottled water in the rooms. At the corner store that adds about 3-5$ a day for bigger bottles! The tap water came out grey and cloudy so we couldn't drink that.

title: Perfect
text: I didn’t know what to expect since the price was so cheap. The checkin was pleasant, the rooms were clean and had all the essentials needed. A clean comfortable bed, TV and a clean bathroom. Perfect. Concierge was so helpful suggesting where to eat and calling an uber when needed. Will be back for sure!

title: 利便性高し！価格帯良し！
text: 価格帯もとてもよく、グランドセントラルステーションから近く、どこへゆくのも便利な場所にあります。空港へのバス乗り場も近いので便利。ビジネスでも観光でも使えるホテルです。

title: Ubicación y limpieza
text: Relación calidad precio perfecta. Muy buena ubicación, a pocos pasos de Bryant Park y la Grand Central. Aunque la habitación es un poco pequeña (para ver NY es mas que suficiente), la limpieza es extrema. Hay un Shake Shack a pocos pasos y una delhi en la que puedes encontrar de todo y en la que siempre desayunabamos por unos 3 dolares.

title: I wouldn't know how to make it better!
text: Great price, great look, great location, great comfort and super nice staff! I should've asked for an extra blanket since I was a little cold, but when I mentioned that in my review, the front office supervisor sent me a personal email to apologize — even if it's kind of my fault I didn't even raise the issue while there. They really care.

title: Fantastic friendly clean and central.
text:
I took my daughter to NY for her 21st birthday. The bunk room was perfect! Pod 39 has so many fantastic places to eat nearby and the bar downstairs with fantastic food and cocktails is must.

The staff are just great - really helpful, day and night.

title: Perfecta ubicación
text:
Fue la primera vez que veníamos a Nueva York y priorizamos una buena ubicación a todo lo demás y la verdad que no nos equivocamos, incluso repetiría si volviera a venir.

Buen precio al pillarlo con meses de antelación y buena calidad de parte de todas las personas que nos atendieron.

No le pongo las 5 estrellas debido a lo diminuta, pero muy muy diminuta habitación y a que no tenía servicio de desayuno.

title: Estadia de Férias
text: Estivemos por 12 dias numa cápsula com 6 malas empilhadas fazendo enxoval do bebê. Haviam quartos melhores mas nos deram um c a cama encostada na parede (é a proposta e sabíamos, só não imaginávamos o Qto seria desconfortável nos esbarrarmos tempo Td). Não, não tem frigobar, não tem translado do hotel pro aeroporto e vice versa como vem na descrição aqui (pagamos $80,00 por isso (eles solicitam um táxi)!!! Higiene mais ou menos, não olhe nos cantos e não procure em baixo da cama pois vai achar. Por vezes se saíamos tarde (9h) nem cama arrumavam mesmo com aviso na porta. Janelas não vedam do frio que vem direto na cabeça! rooftop permanece fechado em inverno. Restaurante de boa fé: perdemos cartão de crédito e nos devolveram dia seguinte. Apesar disso, ótima localização a duas quadras da Grand Central estação, com ótimo Wi-Fi e próximo ao Starbucks.

title: CHRISTMAS in new york
text: I would like to thank stevie and kadeney the concierge at the pod, knowledge of new York out standing very kind and very helpful also.Had a wonderful stay its my third stay will be back again this year,and will be back I enjoy my stay.
